46009025	Uza ɗa baci dem u yain kalambale ka nala ki u tsu foɓuso ta̱ kaci ka ne tsa̱ra̱ u tsa̱ra̱ kune ku funi u ɗa wa namgba gogo . Shegai a̱tsu tsu tsu foɓuso ta̱ kaci ka tsunu tsa̱ra̱ tsu tsa̱ra̱ kune ku funi ɗa wa rongo pini hal ubana .
46009026	Ɗa gai i zuwai n sumai she a kabaru ka kulya ki . Ɗa kpam i zuwai n zuwai ucira u va̱ gba̱ tyoku u uza ɗa u tsu shila̱ka̱na̱ n adimbi a ne tsa̱ra̱ u lyai kaci , tyoku u uza ɗa u tsu ra̱ɗa̱gbusa̱ akere a ne gbani gbani wa .
46009027	N ka̱na̱ ta̱ ikyamba i va̱ n gonukoi iꞌya kagbashi ka va̱ , adama a ɗa aꞌayin a ɗa baci n kotsoi uyanka aza roku kuɓari , Kashila̱ ka ɓishinka mu kune ki wa .
46010001	Ama a va̱ , ma ciga ta̱ i ciɓa n ili iꞌya i gita̱i n isheku i tsunu aza ɗa a tonoi Musa . Kashila̱ ka tono ta̱ n ele an u suki kalishi ka walai a kapala ka le , aku u tuko le gba̱ le a upashi u Mala ma Shili a iyamba i ekpi .
46010002	Nala Kashila̱ ka lyuɓugu le a wokoi yavu atoni a Musa a asuvu a kalishi n a asuvu a kushiva̱ .
46010003	Gba̱ le a lya ta̱ ilikulya iꞌya i wuta̱i a zuba .
46010004	Gba̱ le a so ta̱ mini ma ma wuta̱i n ucira u Kashila̱ . Mini ma nala mi ma wuta̱ ta̱ a katali a zuba ka ka soku le , kpam katali ka nala ki Kawauwi ka .
46010005	Shegai gba̱ n nala aza roku a ɗa pini ushani a asuvu a le a yan ili iꞌya Kashila̱ ka panai kayanyan ka le wa . Aku a wunusa le , ikyamba i le kpam a wacinsai iꞌya a asuvu a kakamba .
46010006	Kpam ili i nala yi i gita̱ ta̱ tsa̱ra̱ u woko tsu iryoci , tsa̱ra̱ i ɓishinka tsu uciga ili i cingi tyoku ɗa ama a nala yi a yain .
46010007	Kotsu i gbashika ameli tyoku ɗa aza roku a le a yain wa . Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , “ Ama yi a yan ta̱ abiki a gbani kpam a dusuki a lyai kpam a soi . Aku a ꞌya̱nga̱i a jei . ”
46010008	Aza roku a le a yain tsishankala , adama a nala , ama azu kamanga n azu a tatsu ( 23,000 ) a ɗa a kuwa̱i a asuvu a kain ka te . Kotsu tsu yain unyushi u cingi tyoku ɗa a yain wa .
46010009	Kotsu tsu kondo Magono ma Zuba tyoku ɗa a aza roku a le a yain wa , aku aꞌali a kapusa le a wunusai .
46010010	Kpam kotsu i yain tsali tyoku ɗa aza roku a le a yain wa , kpaci ili iꞌya i zuwai Kashila̱ ka suki katsumate ka ukpa̱ ka ne ka wuna le ɗa gai la vi .
46010011	Gba̱ ili i nala yi i gita̱ ta̱ tsa̱ra̱ u woko tsu iryoci . A korongu ta̱ iꞌya tsa̱ra̱ u woko tsu kuɓari . Kpaci tsa rongo ta̱ a aꞌayin a ɗa aꞌa̱ri evu n ukotso .
46010012	Va wundya baci va̱ri n ucira , vu kirana kotsu vu rukpa̱ wa .
46010013	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci Kashila̱ ka kondo vu , kotsu vu ciɓa an nala dem wa konduso ama ɗa buwai . Kashila̱ ka tsu ka̱na̱ ta̱ kazuwamgbani ka ne , kpam u tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ ukondo vi u wura ili iꞌya va kpa̱ɗa̱ ukawunku wa . Aꞌayin a ukondo , wa na̱ka̱ vu ta̱ ucira u ɗa va fuɗa va kawunku u ɗa , kpam Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ vu ta̱ ure u ɗa va lya kaci ka ukondo vi .
46010014	Ama a va̱ , adama a nala kotsu i suma ulyaka ameli kayala .
46010015	Eɗa̱ aza a kakiri a ɗa . Yawunsukai kaci ka ɗe ko ili iꞌya ma ciga n tonuko ɗa̱ vi i mayun iꞌya .
46010016	Tsu ciɓa baci aꞌayin a ɗa Asheku a lyai ilikulya i makorishi , tsu bidya baci mako tsu cikpai Kashila̱ , mpasa n Kawauwi n ɗa tsa pece . Tsu golo baci burodi tsu takumai , ikyamba i Kawauwi iꞌya tsa̱ri upece .
46010017	Tsu pece baci burodi u te , tsu woko ɗe la vi ikyamba i te , ko an u wokoi tsa̱ ta̱ ushani .
46010018	Ciɓai n aza a Isaraꞌila , ya dem reve ta̱ an a yain uɗara̱kpa a asuɗara̱kpa , gba̱ aza ɗa a takumai inyama yi a woko ta̱ ili i te n uɗara̱kpa vi .
46010019	Tonuko ɗa ma tonuko ɗa̱ an kameli ko ilikulya iꞌya a yankai ameli uɗara̱kpa iꞌa̱ri n kalen wa .
46010020	Shegai tonuko ɗa ma tonuko ɗa̱ ili iꞌya a ɗara̱mkpai ameli , ityoni i cingi iꞌya a na̱ka̱i iꞌya , Kashila̱ wa . Kpam ma ciga i woko ili i te n ityoni i cingi wa .
46010021	Ya so a mako ma Asheku aku i doku i soi a mako ma ityoni i cingi wa . Ya lya Ilikulya i Asheku aku i doku i lyai ilikulya iꞌya a nekei ityoni i cingi wa .
46010022	Tsa ciga tsu zuwa Asheku malyon ɗa ? Tsa wundya tsa̱ n ucira u ɗa tsa ꞌyuwan Asheku bawu u yan tsu mavura ?
46010023	Aza roku a ɗe a dana ta̱ , “ Tsa fuɗa ta̱ tsa yan gba̱ ili iꞌya tsa ciga ! ” Shegai n tonuko ɗa̱ ili dem ɗa ya lobono uyan wa . I dana ta̱ , “ Tsa fuɗa ta̱ tsa yan ili iꞌya tsa ciga ! ” Shegai n tonuko ɗa̱ ili dem ɗa ya ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ wa .
46010024	Kotsu vu zami ili iꞌya ya lobono vu koshi wa . Vu zami dem ili iꞌya ya lobono ama ɗa a buwai .
46010025	Takumai inyama iꞌya a ka dengishe a kuden . Kotsu i wecike ko a ɗara̱mkpa iꞌya kameli wa , atakasuvu a ɗe a ka rongo ta̱ na̱ ndishi n shinga ,
46010026	adama a ɗa Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , “ Likimba u Asheku u ɗa kaɓolo n ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri pini a asuvu a ne gba̱ . ”
46010027	Aza ɗa bawu aꞌa̱ri Atoni a libana vu baci ulya ilikulya n ele , kpam va ciga vu yain nala , wala ba vu lyai ili iꞌya dem a na̱ka̱ vu . Kotsu vu wecike ko iꞌa̱ri n mele wa .
46010028	Shegai uza roku u tonuko vu baci , “ Ilikulya i na a neke ta̱ iꞌya a asu u kameli , ” kotsu vu lyai ilikulya i nala yi wa , ko vu yawunsa baci unyushi u ɗa wa , vu lyai iꞌya wa . Adama a ɗa uza ɗa u tonuko vu vi u yawunsa ta̱ unyushi u ɗa vu lya baci iꞌya . Niɗa a ka ka̱ngu mu uyan ili iꞌya ma fuɗa ma yan adama a ɗa ya zuwa uza roku unyushi ? Shegai uza roku u tonuko vu baci , “ Ilikulya i na a neke ta̱ iꞌya a asu u kameli , ” kotsu vu lyai ilikulya i nala yi wa , ko vu yawunsa baci unyushi u ɗa wa , vu lyai iꞌya wa . Adama a ɗa uza ɗa u tonuko vu vi u yawunsa ta̱ unyushi u ɗa vu lya baci iꞌya . Niɗa a ka ka̱ngu mu uyan ili iꞌya ma fuɗa ma yan adama a ɗa ya zuwa uza roku unyushi ?
46010029	
46010030	Ma cikpa baci Kashila̱ adama a ilikulya aku n lyai iꞌya , niɗa a ka gonuko mu uza u unyushi adama a ɗa n lyai iꞌya ?
46010031	Va lya baci , ko va so , ko kpam va yan ili i roku , yan ili dem a ure ɗa ya na̱ka̱ Kashila̱ tsupige .
46010032	Kotsu vu yain ili i roku iꞌya ya zuwa aza a Yahuda , ko Awulawa , ko kpam Atoni a Kashila̱ i woko le unyushi wa .
46010033	Yanyi tyoku ɗa n tsu yan . N ma̱tsa̱ ta̱ n zuwa ya dem pana kayanyan a ili iꞌya n yansai . N zama ili iꞌya ya tuko mu ili i shinga wa , shegai ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri i shinga a asu u ama , kotsu a tsa̱ra̱ iwauwi .
46011001	U ka̱na̱ ta̱ vu toni iryoci i va̱ , tyoku ɗa mpa n tonoi iryoci i Kawauwi .
46011002	N cikpala ɗa̱ ta̱ adama a ɗa i tsu ciɓusa ta̱ na̱ mpa maco , kpam n i toni uwenishike u ɗa n tsu yanka ɗa̱ .
46011003	Shegai n ciga ta̱ i reve ili i na : Kawauwi ka̱ ta̱ n ucira a kaci ka vali , vali wa̱ ta̱ n ucira a kaci ka uka , Kashila̱ kpam ka̱ ta̱ n ucira a kaci ka Kawauwi .
46011004	Vali ɗa baci dem u palai kaci ka ne aꞌayin a ɗa wa yan kavasu ko wa dansa akani a Kashila̱ , wa tuko ta̱ Kawauwi uwono .
46011005	Uka ɗa bawu u palai kaci ka ne aꞌayin a ɗa baci wa yan kavasu ko wa dansa akani a Kashila̱ , wa tuko ta̱ vali u ne uwono . Uka u nala vi dere ɗa wa̱ri n uka ɗa a punai kaci adama a iryoci i uwono .
46011006	Nala wa̱ri , u ꞌyuwan baci ucaca diko she a kuruwa kenji ka ne gba̱ . An u wokoi ili i uwono iꞌya a asu u uka a kiɗa̱sa yi baci kenji ko kpam a kuruwa yi ka , she u pala kaci ka ne .
46011007	Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ aꞌali tsa̱ra̱ a rotso yi , a na̱ka̱ yi kpam karinga̱ . Nala u wenike ta̱ kotsu vali u kimba̱ ili i roku a kaci ka ne wa . Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ uka tsa̱ra̱ u na̱ka̱ vali u ne karinga̱ .
46011008	Kashila̱ ka zuwa vali u kagita̱ u wuta̱ a asuvu a uka wa , shegai u zuwai uka u kagita̱ u wuta̱ a asuvu a vali .
46011009	Kashila̱ ka yan vali adama a uka wa , shegai u yan ta̱ uka adama a vali .
46011010	Adama a nala a ɗa uka wa pala kaci ka ne tsa̱ra̱ u wenike an wa̱ri a kere ka ucira u vali u ne , kpam n adama a atsumate a zuba .
46011011	Tyoku ɗa tsa̱ri utono Asheku , aka aꞌa̱ri upeci n aꞌali wa , aꞌali kpam aꞌa̱ri upeci n aka wa .
46011012	Mayun ɗa uka u kagita̱ u wuta̱i a asuvu a vali , aka kpam a matsai aꞌali a ɗa a buwai . Shegai Kashila̱ ka ka yain ili gba̱ .
46011013	Wecei kaci ka ɗe , u gan uka u yain kavasu bawu u cacai diko a kaci ka ne ? Ili i uwono iꞌya wa ?
46011014	Eɗa̱ i wene tyoku ɗa Kashila̱ ka yain likimba wa , vali wa̱ baci n kenji za̱ka̱ka̱ u tsu woko ili i uwono wa ?
46011015	Shegai uka wa̱ baci n kenji ka bululu ili i tsulobo iꞌya . Kashila̱ ka ka na̱ka̱ yi kenji nala tsa̱ra̱ ka woko yi ili i upala̱ka .
46011016	Hal n gogo‑na , ama roku a ka ciga ta̱ a nanamgbana a ukuna u na vi , shegai ma dana ta̱ a̱tsu n aꞌuwa a Atoni a ɗa a buwai kotsu tsu yan ili i roku kau wa .
46011017	Aꞌayin a ɗa i ɓolomgbonoi a asu u te , i tsu yan ili i shinga wa shegai i gono i yain i gbani . Adama a nala ma cikpala ɗa̱ a uwenishike u ɗa ma ciga n yanka ɗa̱ gogo‑na vi wa .
46011018	A kagita̱ , n pana ta̱ a da aꞌayin a ɗa baci i ɓolomgbonoi i tsu pecene ta̱ aɓon aɓon , kpam n wushuku ta̱ n ukuna u roku u ili i na yi .
46011019	Mala̱la̱ ma̱ la wa , u ka̱na̱ ta̱ i yain n aɓon kau‑kau a asuvu a ɗe , pini nala , ya dem u wene aza ɗa a ka yan ili mai .
46011020	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci i ɓolomgbonoi , i tsu wundya ta̱ Ilikulya i Asheku iꞌya ya lya , shegai nala wa̱ri wa .
46011021	Adama a ɗa aꞌayin a ɗa baci ya lya , i tsu yan ta̱ maloko i wusana̱sa gba̱ ilikulya yi , aku aza roku a woko n kambulu . Aza roku gba̱m hal a soi a gutukpa !
46011022	Iꞌa̱ n aꞌuwa a ɗe asu u ɗa ya lya kpam i soi wa ? I goro kuwa ku Atoni ku Kashila̱ ɗa ? I ne aza a unambi uwono ɗa ? Ndya u gain n tonuko ɗa̱ ? Ya wundya ma cikpala ɗa̱ an ya yansa nala ɗa ? Ma cikpala ɗa̱ wa , ko kenu !
46011023	Asheku a na̱ka̱ mu ta̱ uwenishike u ɗa n wenishike ɗa̱ : N kayin ka a nekei Asheku Yesu vi , u bidya ta̱ burodi .
46011024	U cikpa ta̱ Kashila̱ adama a burodi vi , aku u jiba̱mgba̱na̱sa̱i u ɗa u danai , “ Ikyamba i va̱ iꞌya na vi iꞌya a nekei adama a ɗe . Rongoi a uyansa nala kotsu i ciɓusa na̱ mpa . ”
46011025	Nala dem an a lyai ilikulya , aku u bidyai mako , u danai , “ Mako ma na mi kazuwamgbani ka savu ka Kashila̱ ka , nala u wenike ta̱ ukuna u maci u ɗa a shamkpai a mpasa n va̱ . Aꞌayin a ɗa baci dem i soi a mako ma na mi , uyansa nala wa zuwa ta̱ i ciɓa na̱ mpa . ”
46011026	I takuma baci burodi na kpam i soi a mako ma na , dansa ɗa iꞌa̱ri udansa Kawauwi ka kuwa̱ ta̱ . Rongoi udansa nala hal u gono .
46011027	Adama a nala uza ɗa baci u takumai burodi u Asheku ko kpam u soi a mako ma ne a ure u ɗa bawu wa na̱ka̱ yi tsupige , u yan ta̱ unyushi u cingi a ikyamba i Asheku na̱ mpasa n ne .
46011028	Ɗa gai i zuwai u gain i kondo ve kaci ka ɗe kahu i takuma burodi ko kpam i soi a mako ma ne mi .
46011029	Kpaci i reve baci kalen ka ikyamba i Asheku wa , aku i takumai burodi ko kpam i soi a mako ma ne , kaci ka ɗe ka ya ronuko ukiɗa u ugana .
46011030	Ili iꞌya i zuwai aza roku a ɗe ushani aꞌa̱ri na̱ mɓa̱la̱ kpam bawu ucira u ikyamba ɗa gai la vi , hal aza roku gba̱m a kuwa̱i .
46011031	Tsa gita̱ baci ve tsa kondo kaci ka tsunu , Kashila̱ ka yanka tsu afada wa .
46011032	Shegai Asheku a tsu yan tsu ta̱ mavura u lapula tsu , tsa̱ra̱ a makorishi a wacinsa tsu wa , aꞌayin a ɗa baci a ka wacinsa likimba .
46011033	Adama a nala ama a va̱ , aꞌayin a ɗa baci i ɓolomgbonoi tsa̱ra̱ i lyai Ilikulya i Asheku , kotsu i vanamgbana .
46011034	Kpam aza roku a ɗe aꞌa̱ baci n kambulu , gita̱i ve i lyai ilikulya a kuwa , tsa̱ra̱ aꞌayin a ɗa baci ya lya kaɓolo i ronuko kaci ka ɗe kadama a asu u Kashila̱ wa . Ma tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ ili iꞌya ya yan a ukuna u roku n tuwa̱ baci .
46012001	Ama a va̱ , gogo‑na ma koronku ɗa̱ ta̱ a kaci ka kune ku Kulu Keri ku tsu na̱ka̱sa̱ ya dem icun kau‑kau a asuvu a tsunu . Ma ciga ɗa̱ ta̱ i reve ukuna u maci a kaci ka le .
46012002	Ma ciga ta̱ i ciɓa kahu i woko Atoni a Asheku , a tono ta̱ n a̱ɗa̱ a ure u ɗa bawu u gain tsa̱ra̱ i gbashika ameli a ɗa bawu a ka dansa .
46012003	Ma ciga ta̱ i reve uza u dana baci , “ Yesu uza u una̱ u cingi ɗa ! ” Kulu Keri ku Kashila̱ ku tono n vuma u nala vi wa . Kpam uza u dana baci , “ Yesu Asheku a ɗa ! ” Kulu Keri ka koshi ku zuwa yi u dana nala .
46012004	Kune ka pini icun kau‑kau , shegai Kulu ku te ka ku tsu neke ka .
46012005	Ire iꞌya pini ushani i uyan tsugbashi , shegai gba̱ tsunu Asheku a te a ɗa tsa gbashika .
46012006	Ama a tsu fuɗa ta̱ a yain icun manyan kau‑kau , shegai Kashila̱ ka te ki ka ka tsu na̱ka̱ ya dem ucira u yain manyan nala .
46012007	Kulu ku tsu wenike ta̱ kaci ka ne a asu u Katoni dem , ku na̱ka̱ yi baci manyan ma ma ɓa̱nga̱ Atoni gba̱ .
46012008	Kulu ku Kashila̱ ku tsu na̱ka̱ ta̱ uza ucira u uyan adooki n kakiri . Kulu ku te ki ka kpam ku tsu na̱ka̱ uza roku ucira u yain kadyanshi ka ka̱ri ushaɗangi n ureve .
46012009	Kulu ku te ki ka kpam ku tsu na̱ka̱ vuma upityanangu u pige . Ku na̱ka̱ kpam uza roku ucira u ta̱na̱sa̱ ama .
46012010	Ku na̱ka̱ uza u na ucira u uyan ikunesavu , uza u niɗe kpam u na̱ka̱ yi ucira u kuɓari ku akani a Kashila̱ . Ku na̱ka̱ kpam uza roku ucira u utakpana ili iꞌya i wuta̱i a asu u Kashila̱ n iꞌya bawu i wuta̱i a asu u Kashila̱ . Kulu Keri ka ku tsu na̱ka̱ uza roku ucira u uyan kadyanshi n aletsu a roku . Ku na̱ka̱ kpam uza roku ucira u toɗugbuso ili iꞌya a dansai n aletsu a roku yi .
46012011	Kulu Keri ku te ku nala ki ka koshi ku tsu na̱ka̱ kune ku nala ki gba̱ . Aya u tsu yawunsa ko kune ku eni ka ya dem wa tsa̱ra̱ .
46012012	Ikyamba i vuma ili i te iꞌya , shegai iꞌa̱ ta̱ n apashi ushani . Ko an u wokoi apashi a ɗa pini ushani a ikyamba a ɗa a ɓolomgbonoi a wokoi ikyamba i te . Ikyamba i Kawauwi dem nala iꞌa̱ri .
46012013	Aza roku a tsunu aza a Yahuda a ɗa , aza roku kpam Awulawa . Aza roku a tsunu agbashi a ɗa , aza roku kpam agbashi a ɗa wa . Shegai Kulu Keri ku lyuɓugu tsu ta̱ ku gonuko tsu kapashi ka ikyamba i Kawauwi . Gba̱ tsunu Kulu ku te ka tsu wushai .
46012014	Mayun ɗa , ikyamba iꞌa̱ ta̱ n apashi kau‑kau , kapashi ka te ka wa .
46012015	Kune ku dana baci , “ Mpa ma̱ a kapashi ka ikyamba wa , kpaci mpa kukere ku wa , ” nala u ka̱ngu yi u woko a kapashi ka ikyamba ɗa ?
46012016	Kutsuvu ku dana baci , “ Mpa ma̱ a kapashi ka ikyamba wa , kpaci kutsuvu ka koshi ma̱ri mpa keshi ka wa , ” nala u ka̱ngu yi u woko a kapashi ka ikyamba ɗa ?
46012017	A da baci ikyamba gba̱ keshi ka , niɗa ya pana ? Kpam a da baci ikyamba gba̱ kutsuvu ka , niɗa wa tsukpa magula̱ni ?
46012018	Shegai Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ ikyamba i tsunu n apashi ushani , kpam u zuwa ta̱ kapashi dem asu u ɗa wa ciga ka .
46012019	Aꞌa̱ri a da baci gba̱ apashi a ikyamba kapashi ka te ka koshi , iꞌa̱ri ya woko ikyamba wa .
46012020	Mayun ɗa , apashi a ɗa pini ushani , shegai ikyamba i te iꞌya .
46012021	Wa yan wa keshi ka tonuko kukere , “ Va̱ri n kalen wa ! ” Ko kaci ka tonuko aꞌene , “ Iꞌa̱ri n kalen wa ! ”
46012022	Wa yan nala wa ! Apashi a ikyamba a ɗa tsa wundya yavu aꞌa̱ n ucira wa vi , a ɗa a lakai kalen cika .
46012023	Apashi a roku a ɗa pini a ikyamba i tsunu a ɗa tsu wenei yavu aꞌa̱ri n kalen cika wa , shegai tsu la ta̱ ukirana n a ɗa cika . Tsu tsu pala ta̱ apashi a ikyamba i tsunu iꞌya bawu tsa ciga a wene ,
46012024	shegai tsu tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ ta̱ a roku bawu tsu palai . Kashila̱ ka foɓuso ta̱ ikyamba i tsunu tyoku ɗa gba̱m apashi a ɗa tsu wenei yavu aꞌa̱ri n kalen wa a ɗa a wokoi n kalen cika .
46012025	U yan ta̱ nala tsa̱ra̱ u zuwa gba̱ apashi a ikyamba a yain manyan kaɓolo derere , kapashi dem ka kirana n atoku .
46012026	Kapashi ka ikyamba ka te ka pana baci ikyamba , apashi a ɗa a buwai dem a ka pana ta̱ ikyamba n eyi . A na̱ka̱ baci kapashi ka te tsupige , a ɗa a buwai gba̱ a ka za̱nga̱na̱ ta̱ kaɓolo n eyi .
46012027	Gba̱ ɗe kaɓolo , ikyamba i Kawauwi iꞌya iꞌa̱ri . Ya dem kapashi ka ikyamba ka ne ka .
46012028	Aza roku a ɗa na aza ɗa Kashila̱ ka zuwai a ikyamba i Kawauwi : aza a kagita̱ asuki a ɗa , aza a ire ntsumate , aku aza a tatsu awenishiki . Kashila̱ ka zuwai kpam aza a uyansa ikunesavu , n aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri n ucira u uta̱na̱sa̱ ama . U zuwai kpam aza ɗa a tsu ɓa̱nga̱sa̱ atoku , n aza a utono n ama . U zuwa ta̱ kpam dem aza a uyan kadyanshi n aletsu a roku .
46012029	Ya dem ɗa wa̱ri kasuki ? Ya dem ɗa u tsu dansa akani a Kashila̱ ? Gba̱ ɗa ama aꞌa̱ri awenishiki ? Ya dem ɗa wa̱ri n ucira u ɗa wa yan ikunesavu ? Mayun tani nala wa .
46012030	Ya dem ɗa wa̱ri n ucira u ɗa wa ta̱na̱sa̱ ama ? Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ gba̱ tsunu ucira u ɗa tsa fuɗa tsa dansa n aletsu kau‑kau ? Ya dem ɗa wa fuɗa wa toɗugbuso ili iꞌya a dansai n aletsu a roku ? Mayun tani nala wa .
46012031	Shegai i zuwa maluwa i tsa̱ra̱ kune ka ku lai tsulobo . Gogo‑na ma tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ ili i roku iꞌya i lakai gba̱ .
46013001	N dansa baci n aletsu a ama , ko kpam n kaletsu ka atsumate a zuba , shegai bawu ma ciga ama , kadyanshi ka va̱ ka rotso ta̱ mawura̱ ma ulapa u urim , ko kpam mawura̱ ma kalingi .
46013002	Kulu ku na̱ka̱ mu baci ucira u ɗa ma dansa akani a Kashila̱ , shegai bawu ma ciga ama , mpa ili i roku iꞌya wa . Nala kpam ma fuɗa baci ma reve ili hal dem n ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri usokongi , kpam bawu ma ciga ama , n woko ili i roku wa . Nala dem wa woko ma̱ baci n upityanangu u ɗa ma tonuko masasa ma ꞌya̱nga̱ ma gono a asu u roku .
46013003	Ko n na̱ka̱ baci aza a unambi gba̱ ili iꞌya ma̱ri n iꞌya , kpam ko n neke baci ikyamba i va̱ uɗara̱kpa u urunukpa , n ciga baci ama wa , u woko mu ta̱ ili i gbani .
46013004	Uciga wa̱ ta̱ n ahankuri n tsulobo . Uciga wa̱ri n malyon wa . Uciga u tsu dansa n ara̱ɗi wa . U tsu bidiga kaci ka ne tsupige wa .
46013005	U tsu dansa tsa̱ra̱ u nusuka ama wa . U tsu ma̱tsa̱ u tsa̱ra̱ka̱ kaci ka ne ili maco wa . U tsu yan maloko ma uyan upan wa . U tsu ciɓa n unyushi u ɗa ama roku a yanka yi wa .
46013006	U tsu yan maza̱nga̱ aꞌayin a ɗa ukuna u cingi u gita̱i wa , shegai u tsu yan ta̱ maza̱nga̱ aꞌayin a ɗa ukuna u mayun u wuta̱i a kateshe .
46013007	Uciga u tsu kotso wa , u tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ uwushukusu wa , wa̱ ta̱ n uzuwa u uma maco , kpam u tsu kawunku ta̱ maco .
46013008	Uciga u tsu ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ ta̱ hal ubana . Kune ku kadyanshi ka akani a Kashila̱ ka kotso ta̱ . Kune ku kadyanshi n aletsu a roku ka kotso ta̱ . Kune ku ureve dem ka kotso ta̱ .
46013009	Kpaci kune ku tsunu ku ureve n ucira u udansa akani a Kashila̱ ku shaɗangu wa ; shegai aꞌayin a ɗa baci u ɗa wa̱ri ushaɗangi u tuwa̱i , pini nala , u ɗa bawu wa̱ri ushaɗangi vi wa woko u gbani . Kpaci kune ku tsunu ku ureve n ucira u udansa akani a Kashila̱ ku shaɗangu wa ; shegai aꞌayin a ɗa baci u ɗa wa̱ri ushaɗangi u tuwa̱i , pini nala , u ɗa bawu wa̱ri ushaɗangi vi wa woko u gbani .
46013010	
46013011	An ma̱ri maku , n dansa ta̱ tyoku u maku , n yawunsa ta̱ tyoku u maku , n yansa ta̱ kaco tyoku u maku . An n gbonguroi , aku n a̱sa̱ka̱i uyansa tyoku ɗa maku ma tsu yansa .
46013012	Aꞌayin a na , an tsa wenishe ili i Kashila̱ , tsu wene iꞌya sarara wa , tyoku ɗa vu tsu wene kaci ka vunu vu weɓele baci madubu ma ma̱ri dusu . Aꞌayin a ka tuwa̱ ta̱ a ɗa tsa wene Kashila̱ aꞌeshi aꞌeshi . Gogo‑na ureve u va̱ kenu ɗa wa̱ri , shegai aꞌayin a nala yi ma koruso ta̱ ma reve ili gba̱ , tyoku ɗa Kashila̱ ka reve mu gba̱ gba̱ .
46013013	Ili i tatsu iꞌya pini iꞌya ya ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ : upityanangu , n uzuwa u uma , n uciga , kpam i pige a asuvu a le iꞌya uciga .
46014001	Yanyi gba̱ ili iꞌya ya yan i cigi atoku a ɗe . Kpam dem i yain n maluwa ma uwusha kune ushani ka Kulu Keri ku tsu na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ , kpam kune ka ku lakai ka ku udansa akani a Kashila̱ .
46014002	Aza ɗa a tsu dansa n aletsu kau‑kau a tsu dansa n ama ɗa bawu a ka pana wa , shegai n Kashila̱ uza ɗa u tsu pana̱ka le . A tsu dansa ta̱ ukuna u maci u ɗa wa̱ri usokongi n ucira u Kulu Keri .
46014003	Shegai aza ɗa a tsu dansa akani a Kashila̱ a tsu dansa ta̱ n ama tsa̱ra̱ a ɓa̱nga̱ le , a gbamatangu le , kpam a ta̱na̱sa̱ le atakasuvu .
46014004	Aza ɗa a tsu dansa n aletsu kau‑kau kaci ka le ka koshi a tsu ɓa̱nga̱ , shegai aza ɗa a tsu dansa akani a Kashila̱ a tsu ɓa̱nga̱ ta̱ kuwa ku Atoni gba̱ .
46014005	N dana ta̱ , wa lobono ɗa̱ ta̱ i dansa n aletsu kau‑kau gba̱ ɗe , kpam wa la ta̱ tsulobo gba̱ ɗe iꞌa̱ri i fuɗa i dansa akani a Kashila̱ . Kune ku udansa akani a Kashila̱ ku la ta̱ ka udansa n aletsu kau‑kau kalen . Kune ku aletsu ki she a tsa̱ra̱ uza ɗa wa fuɗa wa toɗugbuso kalen ka aletsu ki ɗa ka ɓa̱nga̱ gba̱ kuwa ku Atoni .
46014006	Ama a va̱ , n tuwa̱ baci ara ɗe n dansai n aletsu kau‑kau , niɗa nala wa ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ ? Nala wa ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ wa , ko kenu . Shegai n tonuko ɗa̱ baci ili iꞌya Kashila̱ ka wenike mu , ko n tonuko ɗa̱ kpam ili i ureve , ko akani a ɗa Kashila̱ ka ciga mu n dansa , ko uwenishike .
46014007	Ili iꞌya a tsu fulusa̱ tyoku u ugbali ko kpam iꞌya a tsu keme tyoku u molo ili iꞌya bawu iꞌa̱ri n uma , uza wa reve ushipa vi wa she kakemi ki ka keme karara .
46014008	Kavana ka ka tsu tono n asoje ka shika̱ baci mai wa , niɗa asoje yi a ka foɓuso ?
46014009	Nala dem uza wa fuɗa wa reve ili iꞌya va dansa wa , she vu dansa karara . Nala baci wa , n uwule u ɗa koshi va dansa .
46014010	Aletsu a ɗa pini icun kau‑kau a likimba , kpam kaletsu ka̱ la ka bawu ka̱ri n kalen wa .
46014011	Uza wa dansa baci n kaletsu ka bawu n panai , n tsu woko ta̱ kamoci .
46014012	Ya ciga baci kune ku Kulu , foloi Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ka ka ɓa̱nga̱ gba̱ kuwa ku Atoni .
46014013	Uza ɗa baci wa̱ri n kune ku kadyanshi n aletsu kau‑kau , u yain kavasu ka wa tsa̱ra̱ kune ka wa fuɗa wa toɗugbuso ili iꞌya wa dansa .
46014014	Kpaci n yan baci kavasu n aletsu kau‑kau , kulu ku va̱ ka ka yan kavasu ki , shegai n reve ili iꞌya ma dansa wa .
46014015	Ndya ma yan ? Ma yan ta̱ iꞌya gba̱ . Ma yan ta̱ kavasu a kulu , kpam ma yan ta̱ kavasu n kadyanshi ka n revei . Ma shipa ta̱ a kulu , kpam ma shipa ta̱ n kadyanshi ka n revei .
46014016	I ɓolomgbono baci ya cikpala Kashila̱ n kulu ku ɗe , ama roku a ka reve wa . A reve baci ili iꞌya ya tono wa , niɗa a ka reve a wushuku , “ Ami ” ?
46014017	Vu cikpala ta̱ Kashila̱ mai , shegai nala u ɓa̱nga̱ uza roku wa .
46014018	N cikpa ta̱ Kashila̱ an ma fuɗa ma dansa n aletsu kau‑kau ushani n la ɗa̱ .
46014019	Shegai tsu ɓolomgbono baci ulyaka Kashila̱ kayala , n da u laka ta̱ tsulobo n dansa idani i tawun iꞌya ama a panai , n u ɗa ma dansa idani azu kupa ( 10,000 ) n aletsu kau‑kau .
46014020	Ama a va̱ , a̱sa̱ka̱i uyawunsa tyoku ɗa mmuku n tsu yawunsa . Wokoi tyoku u iba̱ba̱ iꞌya bawu a yain ili i cingi . Kpam i woko aza ɗa a kuwai a uyawunsa u ɗe .
46014021	A korongu ta̱ a Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ : “ Magono ma Zuba ma dana ta̱ , ‘ Ma dansa ta̱ n ama a va̱ n aletsu kau‑kau a ɗa amoci a ka fuɗa a dansa . Shegai gba̱ n nala a ka pana̱ka mu wa . ’ ”
46014022	Kune ku kadyanshi n aletsu kau‑kau iryoci iꞌya adama a aza ɗa bawu aꞌa̱ri Atoni , shegai Atoni wa . Kune ku udansa akani a Kashila̱ ka ɓa̱nga̱ ta̱ Atoni , shegai aza ɗa bawu aꞌa̱ri Atoni wa .
46014023	Ko n nala , aza ɗa bawu aꞌa̱ri Atoni ko kpam aza ɗa bawu a revei ili i na yi , aꞌa̱ baci kaɓolo n a̱ɗa̱ asu u ɗa i ɓolomgbonoi vi , a panai ili iꞌya ya tono n aletsu kau‑kau , a ka yawunsa ta̱ yavu ijan iꞌya ɗa̱ .
46014024	Shegai ama a nala yi a pana baci ya dem wa dansa kadyanshi ka Kashila̱ , a ka reve ta̱ ele aza a unyushi a ɗa , kpam iꞌya a panai vi ya yanka le ta̱ afada .
46014025	A ka dansa ta̱ ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri usokongi a atakasuvu a le . Aku a kuɗa̱ngu a lyaka Kashila̱ kayala , a dana , “ Mayun ɗa Kashila̱ ka̱ ta̱ kaɓolo n ama a na yi . ”
46014026	Aje a va̱ , aꞌayin a ɗa baci i ɓolomgbonoi ya lya kayala , u ka̱na̱ ta̱ i yain ili adama a ɗa wa lobono uza ɗa baci dem wa̱ri pini . Nala wa̱ri uza roku u shipa baci , ko wa wenishike , ko u dansa ili iꞌya Kashila̱ ka danai , ko u dansa n aletsu kau‑kau , ko u toɗugbo ili iꞌya vuma vi u danai .
46014027	I ɓolomgbono baci , ya fuɗa ta̱ ya a̱sa̱ka̱ uza roku u dansa n aletsu kau‑kau , ko ama a re , shegai kotsu a lai ama a tatsu wa . A dansa uza u te uza u te , aku uza roku u toɗugbo ili iꞌya a ka dansa .
46014028	Shegai uza wa̱ baci la wa toɗugbo wa , u ka̱na̱ ta̱ uza ɗa wa dansa n aletsu kau‑kau vi u paɗa , aku u dansa n kaci ka ne n Kashila̱ koshi .
46014029	A̱sa̱ka̱ ama a re ko ama a tatsu a dansa akani a Kashila̱ , aku ama ɗa a buwai a kondo udyanshi vi ko wa̱ mai .
46014030	Shegai uza roku wa dansa baci akani a Kashila̱ , aku Kashila̱ ka wenikei uza roku ili i roku , uza ɗa wa dansa akani yi she u shamgba ve u a̱sa̱ka̱ uza u niɗe vi u dansa .
46014031	A̱sa̱ka̱i uza u te uza u te u dansa , tsa̱ra̱ gba̱ ɗe i rotsongusu ili i roku i tsa̱ra̱ ugbamatangu .
46014032	Ama ɗa a tsu dansa akani a Kashila̱ a tsu fuɗa ta̱ a ka̱na̱ kaci ka le a a̱sa̱ka̱ aza roku a dansa .
46014033	Kashila̱ ka ciga ta̱ ama a yain ili i ndishi n shinga n a tonomgboni , shegai kaberikete wa . Aꞌayin a ɗa baci ama a Kashila̱ a ɓolomgbonoi ulya kayala ,
46014034	aka she a paɗa bini . Kotsu i a̱sa̱ka̱ le a dansa wa , adama a ɗa Mele ma dana ta̱ aka a ka woko ta̱ aza ɗa a ka gorimuko ama .
46014035	Ili iꞌa̱ baci pini iꞌya a ka ciga a reve , she a weci aꞌali a le a gono baci kuwa . Ili i uwono iꞌya aka a dansa a asu u kaɓolo .
46014036	Kadyanshi ka Kashila̱ ara ɗe ɗa ka gita̱i wa , kpam ara ɗe ɗa koshi ka rawai wa .
46014037	Va wundya baci kaci ka vunu avu uza u udansa akani a Kashila̱ ɗa , ko kpam va̱ri n kune ku Kulu , va reve ta̱ korongu ɗa ma korongu ili iꞌya Asheku a tonuko mu n koronku ɗa̱ .
46014038	Adama a nala , kotsu i pana̱ka uza ɗa bawu u pana̱kai ili iꞌya n korongi wa .
46014039	Ama a va̱ , i yain n maluwa ma udansa akani a Kashila̱ , shegai kotsu i ka̱ngu uza ɗa wa dansa n aletsu kau‑kau wa .
46014040	Gba̱ ili iꞌya baci dem ya yan , i yain iꞌya a ure u ɗa u lobonoi kpam i tonomgbonoi mai .
46015001	Ama a va̱ , gogo‑na ma ciga ta̱ n ciɓuga ɗa̱ n Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka n yanka ɗa̱ kuɓari caupa . I wusha ta̱ ka , n upityanangu u ɗa iꞌa̱ri n u ɗa gogo‑na , i shamkpa ta̱ Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka nala ki .
46015002	Kpam Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka na ki ka ka wauwa ɗa̱ i lya baci kapala n uwushukusu n ili iꞌya n tonuko ɗa̱ . I yan baci nala wa , upityanangu u ɗe u gbani u ɗa .
46015003	N tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ ili iꞌya a tonuko mu . Ukuna u ɗa u lai kalen u ɗa na : Kawauwi ka kuwa̱ ta̱ adama a unyushi u cingi u tsunu , tyoku ɗa Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u danai .
46015004	A ciɗa̱ngu yi ta̱ , an a yain aꞌayin a tatsu , aku a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ yi n uma , tyoku ɗa Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u danai .
46015005	U wenike ta̱ kaci ka ne ara Bituru , aku u wenikei kaci ka ne a asu u Kupanamere .
46015006	An nala wurai , aku u wenikei kaci ka ne a asu u atoni a ne a ɗa a lai amangatawantawun ( 500 ) a asu u te . Ama ushani a asuvu a aza ɗa a wene yi aza roku a buwa ta̱ n uma , shegai aza a roku a kuwusa̱ ɗe .
46015007	Aku u wenikei kaci ka ne ara Yakubu , pini nala , u wenikei kaci ka ne a asu u asuki yi gba̱ .
46015008	A makorishi , aku u wenikei kaci ka ne ara va̱ , mpa uza ɗa gba̱m a matsai a aꞌayin a ɗa bawu a gain a matsa mu .
46015009	Gba̱ asuki a nala yi a la mu ta̱ . Mpa n ra̱tsa a isa̱ mu kasuki wa , kpaci n yanka ta̱ kuwa ku Atoni a Kashila̱ mavura .
46015010	Shegai ukuna u shinga u Kashila̱ u ɗa u gonuko mu ili iꞌya ma̱ri , kpam ukuna u shinga u ne utuwa̱ ara va̱ ili i gbani iꞌya wa . N ma̱tsa̱i n yain manyan hal n lai gba̱ asuki a ɗa a buwai , shegai mayun ɗa , ukuna u shinga u Kashila̱ u ɗa u yain manyan mi , mpa wa .
46015011	Adama a nala , n yanka ɗa̱ baci kuɓari ko kpam kasuki ka roku a asuvu a le ka yanka ɗa̱ kuɓari , gba̱ ili i te iꞌya tsu yain , kpam ili iꞌya i wushuki iꞌya .
46015012	Tsu yan baci kuɓari ku a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱i Kawauwi a ukpa̱ , niɗa aza roku a ɗe a ka dana akushe a ka ꞌya̱nga̱ a gono n uma wa ?
46015013	Nala mayun ɗa baci , wa wenike la vi ɗe a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ Kawauwi wa .
46015014	Kpam a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci Kawauwi wa , kuɓari ku tsunu ku gbani ka , kpam upityanangu u ɗe u gbani u ɗa .
46015015	A ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci akushe a gonoi n uma wa , Kashila̱ ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ Kawauwi wa . Shegai tsu dana ta̱ Kashila̱ ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ ta̱ Kawauwi . Adama a nala a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci akushe wa , u woko la vi ɗe kaɓan ka tsa yansa . A ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci akushe a gonoi n uma wa , Kashila̱ ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ Kawauwi wa . Shegai tsu dana ta̱ Kashila̱ ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ ta̱ Kawauwi . Adama a nala a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci akushe wa , u woko la vi ɗe kaɓan ka tsa yansa .
46015016	
46015017	Kpam a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci Kawauwi wa , upityanangu u ɗe u gbani u ɗa , kpam iꞌa̱ ta̱ a asuvu a unyushi u cingi u ɗe .
46015018	Nala mayun ɗa baci , ama ɗa a kuwa̱i cina a zuwa ɗe upityanangu u le ara ne , a ka yan le ɗe mavura .
46015019	Tsu wushuku baci n Kawauwi ka wauwa tsu a uma u naha bamu n uma u ɗa wa tuwa̱ , u gan ta̱ ama a pana tsu asuvayali kapala n ama ɗa a buwai .
46015020	Shegai ukuna u mayun vi u ɗa a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ ta̱ Kawauwi a ukpa̱ , aya gba̱m kagita̱ ka uꞌya̱nga̱ asuvu aza ɗa a ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ a gono n uma .
46015021	Gba̱ ama a kuwa̱ ta̱ adama a ili iꞌya vuma u te u yain , Ada̱mu ɗa tuko tsu ukpa̱ gba̱ tsunu . Nala dem a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱i ama a ukpa̱ adama a ili iꞌya vuma u te u yain . Kawauwi ka ka tuko tsu uma gba̱ tsunu . Gba̱ ama a kuwa̱ ta̱ adama a ili iꞌya vuma u te u yain , Ada̱mu ɗa tuko tsu ukpa̱ gba̱ tsunu . Nala dem a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱i ama a ukpa̱ adama a ili iꞌya vuma u te u yain . Kawauwi ka ka tuko tsu uma gba̱ tsunu .
46015022	
46015023	Shegai a ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ ta̱ ya dem utonomgboni . Kawauwi ka a gita̱i uꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ , aꞌayin a ɗa baci Kawauwi ka gonoi , a ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ ta̱ ama a ne gba̱ .
46015024	Nala u wura baci , aku makorishi ma likimba ma tuwa̱ . Kawauwi ka wacinsa ta̱ gba̱ atokulalu a ne icun kau‑kau , aku u gonuko Kashila̱ Tata tsugono .
46015025	Kpaci u ka̱na̱ ta̱ Kawauwi ka lyai tsugono hal u shila̱ka̱na̱ n atokulalu a ne gba̱ , aku u zuwa le a kere ka adeshikpetsu a ne .
46015026	Kpam utokulalu u makorishi u ɗa wa wacinsa u ɗa ukpa̱ .
46015027	An Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u danai Kashila̱ ka uka ta̱ ili dem a kere ka ucira u Kawauwi , a isa̱ pini Kashila̱ wa . Kpaci aya u ukai gba̱ ili a ucira u Kawauwi .
46015028	Aku u lya baci kaci ka ili gba̱ , Maku mi ma zuwa ta̱ kaci ka ne a kere ka Kashila̱ , uza ɗa u zuwai ili gba̱ a kere ka ne . Aku Kashila̱ ka lyai tsugono tsu ili gba̱ .
46015029	Niɗa ukuna u ama ɗa a lyuɓugi adama a ɗa a ka ɓa̱nga̱ akushe ? Ndya kalen ka uyan nala ? A ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci akushe wa , niɗa a ka lyuɓugusu ama adama a le ?
46015030	A ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci akushe wa gba̱ gba̱ , niɗa tsa zuwa kaci ka tsunu evu n ukpa̱ aꞌayin dem ?
46015031	Ama a va̱ , mayun n tonuko ɗa̱ , n tsu yan ta̱ evu n ukpa̱ kain dem . N tsu lapa ta̱ makamba adama a ili iꞌya Yesu Kawauwi Asheku a tsunu u yain ara ɗe , kpam ukuna u na vi dem mayun ɗa .
46015032	A ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci akushe wa , ili i shinga i eni iꞌya mu n shila̱ka̱na̱ baci n aza a Afisu aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri nnama n cingi ? Ama a tsu dansa ta̱ , cinda nala , “ A̱sa̱ka̱ tsu lyai kpam tsu soi , kpaci nakpan tsa kuwa̱ ta̱ . ”
46015033	Kotsu i a̱sa̱ka̱ ama a yinsa̱ ɗa̱ wa . A dana ta̱ , “ Aje a cingi a ka nangasa ta̱ ahali a shinga a vunu . ”
46015034	Gonukoi uyawunsa u ɗe a ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri i shinga , kpam i a̱sa̱ka̱ uyansa unyushi u cingi . Panai uwono an aza roku a ɗe bawu a revei Kashila̱ .
46015035	Uza roku wa wecike ta̱ , “ Niɗa a ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ akushe a gono n uma ? Icun i ikyamba i eni iꞌya a ka yan n iꞌya ? ”
46015036	Keci ka utengeshi ka nala vi . Vu ce baci icun a iyamba , i tsu wuta̱ wa she i kuwa̱ ve .
46015037	Kpam ili iꞌya vu cei a iyamba yi iꞌya avuku a ɗa a ka gbonguro vi wa , shegai icun i ekpi i ilya yi ko kpam icun i roku kau iꞌya vu cei .
46015038	Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ta̱ icun i nala yi ikyamba iꞌya u ɗanga̱sa̱ka yi . Icun dem i tsu gbonguro ta̱ a icun i avuku a ne .
46015039	Ikyamba i icun i ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri n uma iꞌa̱ ta̱ icun kau‑kau . Ama aꞌa̱ ta̱ n icun i ikyamba i le . Nnama kpam n i le . Nnu n adan ya dem n i ne .
46015040	Ikyamba iꞌya pini a zuba , ikyamba iꞌya kpam pini a likimba . Tsulobo tsu ikyamba i zuba tsa̱ ta̱ kau n tsulobo tsu ikyamba i likimba .
46015041	Kaara ka̱ ta̱ n tsulobo tsu ne , uwoto wa̱ ta̱ n tsulobo tsu ne , atala kpam n tsulobo tsu le kau ; a asuvu a atala yi gba̱m tsulobo tsu takpana ta̱ .
46015042	Nala wa woko a ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci akushe a gono n uma . Ikyamba i tsunu iꞌya i kuwa̱i i shamai vi , ya woko ta̱ kau a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci iꞌya , kpaci aꞌayin a nala yi ya doku ya kuwa̱ wa .
46015043	A ciɗa̱ngu baci ikyamba i tsunu , i tsu lobono wa kpam bawu ucira . A ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci iꞌya ya lobono ta̱ kpam n ucira .
46015044	Gogo‑na ikyamba i kayala , iꞌya tsa wene iꞌya , shegai a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ baci iꞌya , ya woko ta̱ ikyamba iꞌya Kulu Keri ka na̱ka̱ uma . Mayun ɗa ikyamba i kayala iꞌya pini , kpam ikyamba iꞌya Kulu Keri ka na̱ka̱ uma iꞌya pini .
46015045	Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , “ Vuma u kagita̱ Ada̱mu u wusha ta̱ uma . ” Vuma u makorishi ; wata , Kawauwi , u woko ta̱ kulu ka ka na̱ka̱ uma .
46015046	Ili iꞌya i gita̱i utuwa̱ iꞌya ikyamba i kayala , aku ikyamba i kulu i tonoi a kucina̱ .
46015047	Kashila̱ ka kenei kayala a iyamba aku u yain vuma u kagita̱ Ada̱mu . Ucun u vuma u ire vi a zuba ɗa u wuta̱i .
46015048	Ya dem a likimba wa̱ ta̱ n ikyamba tyoku u Ada̱mu . Kpam ya dem a zuba wa̱ ta̱ n ikyamba tyoku u uza ɗa u wuta̱i a zuba .
46015049	Gogo‑na naha tyoku ɗa a̱tsu tsa̱ri tyoku u Ada̱mu ɗa , vuma u iyamba , nala dem kain ka roku tsa woko tyoku u Kawauwi , vuma u zuba .
46015050	Ama a va̱ , ma ciga ɗa̱ ta̱ i reve ikyamba i tsunu i na iꞌya iꞌa̱ri n inyama na̱ mpasa ya shama ta̱ . Nala u wenike ta̱ ya uwa a tsugono tsu Kashila̱ tsa bawu tsa̱ri n utyoku wa .
46015051	Gogo‑na ma wenike ɗa̱ ta̱ ili i usokongi iꞌya Kashila̱ ka wenike tsu : Aza roku a tsunu a ka kuwa̱ wa , shegai a fula̱ baci kavana ka makorishi , Kashila̱ ka savaɗa tsu ta̱ gba̱ n uyan u aꞌeshi rapu , hal u lai gba̱m uwura u ili bal . Kpaci a fula̱ baci kavana , a ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ ta̱ akushe , kpam a ka doku a ka kuwa̱ wa , pini nala , gba̱ tsunu tsa wusha ta̱ ikyamba i savu . Gogo‑na ma wenike ɗa̱ ta̱ ili i usokongi iꞌya Kashila̱ ka wenike tsu : Aza roku a tsunu a ka kuwa̱ wa , shegai a fula̱ baci kavana ka makorishi , Kashila̱ ka savaɗa tsu ta̱ gba̱ n uyan u aꞌeshi rapu , hal u lai gba̱m uwura u ili bal . Kpaci a fula̱ baci kavana , a ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ ta̱ akushe , kpam a ka doku a ka kuwa̱ wa , pini nala , gba̱ tsunu tsa wusha ta̱ ikyamba i savu .
46015052	
46015053	Kpaci ikyamba i kayala i tsunu iꞌya i tsu kuwa̱ kpam i shama , a ka savaɗa ta̱ iꞌya a gonuko iꞌya ikyamba i zuba iꞌya bawu ya kuwa̱ .
46015054	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci nala gita̱i , kpam a savaɗai ikyamba i kayala i tsunu iꞌya ya kuwa̱ , a gonukoi iꞌya ikyamba i zuba iꞌya bawu ya kuwa̱ , aku a makorishi Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u woko mayun : “ A wacinsa ɗe ukpa̱ ! Ulya u kaci a ukpa̱ u shaɗangu ɗe ! ”
46015055	“ Nte asu u ɗa ukpa̱ u lyai kaci vi ? Nte kpam mataɗatsu ma ukpa̱ ma ma tsu zuwa mɓa̱la̱ mi ? ”
46015056	Unyushi u cingi u ɗa u tsu zuwa ukpa̱ u tsa̱ra̱ ucira u utuko mɓa̱la̱ , kpam ucira u unyushi u cingi Mele ma .
46015057	Shegai tsu cikpa ta̱ Kashila̱ an u a̱sa̱ka̱i Asheku a tsunu Yesu Kawauwi u na̱ka̱ tsu ulya u kaci a ukpa̱ .
46015058	Ama a va̱ aza ɗa ma ciga , adama a ɗa Kashila̱ ka yain nala , shamgbai n ucira . Kotsu i a̱sa̱ka̱ ili i roku i gba̱ɗa̱ ɗa̱ hal i loko ɗa̱ wa . Zuwai kaci ka ɗe i woko ayain a manyan maco aꞌayin a ɗa baci ya yan manyan ma Asheku , kpaci i reve ta̱ manyan ma ya yan adama a Asheku ma gbani ma wa .
46016001	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci ya wushika ama a Kashila̱ kune , kotsu i yain tyoku ɗa n tonukoi aꞌuwa a Atoni a ɗa aꞌa̱ri a Galatiya .
46016002	Kain ka kagita̱ ka aꞌayin a shindere dem u ka̱na̱ ta̱ i foɓo ikebe i roku a ikengi a ili iꞌya i tsa̱ra̱i . Zuwai iꞌya adama a kune . I yan baci nala , ya rongo ubana n i goni tsa̱ra̱ i wushi iꞌya aꞌayin a ɗa baci n rawai wa .
46016003	Ɗanga̱sai Atoni a roku a bidya ikebe yi ubana a Urishelima . N rawa baci ma na̱ka̱ le ta̱ ukanikorongi u ɗa wa wenike an i wushuki n ele .
46016004	U lobono baci n bana dem , tsa yan ta̱ nwalu mi kaɓolo .
46016005	Ma kyawunsa baci a Masidaniya , ma bana ta̱ n kondo ɗa̱ .
46016006	Gaawan ma dusuku ta̱ n a̱ɗa̱ aꞌayin a re , ko gba̱m hal ubana makorishi ma aꞌayin a kuta̱nu . Aku i ɓa̱nga̱ mu n ka̱na̱ ure ubana asu u ɗa dem ma bana .
46016007	N rawa baci ara ɗe gogo , ma ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ wa . Wa̱ri wa laka mu ta̱ n ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ a ure kahu n rawa ara ɗe , tsa̱ra̱ n tuwa̱ baci n ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ n a̱ɗa̱ Asheku a wushuku baci .
46016008	Shegai ma shamgba ta̱ pini na a Afisu hal Abiki a Kain ka Amangarenkupa a wura .
46016009	Kpaci a kukpunka̱ mu ta̱ ure u pige u uyan manyan ma shinga , kpam ama ushani a ka na̱ka̱sa̱ ta̱ kaci , ko an u wokoi aza roku ushani a ka yan ta̱ tsilala n a̱tsu .
46016010	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci Timoti rawai , wusha ni mai . Wa yan ta̱ manyan ma Asheku tyoku u va̱ .
46016011	Kotsu i a̱sa̱ka̱ uza roku u goro yi wa . Na̱ka̱ ni una̱ u shinga u ɗe kpam i ɓa̱nga̱ yi u ka̱na̱ ure wa gono baci utuwa̱ ara va̱ . Ma vana yi ta̱ n aza roku a gono .
46016012	Gogo‑na , a ukuna u utoku u tsunu Apolo . N tonuko yi ta̱ u ɓolomgbono n atoku aꞌayin a ɗa baci a ka tuwa̱ ɗa̱ ukondo , shegai u ciga u yain nala aꞌayin a na wa . U tsa̱ baci kabala , wa bana ta̱ .
46016013	Rongoi ufoɓusi . Ka̱na̱i upityanangu u ɗe gbam-gbam . Kotsu i pana uwonvo wa . Yanyi ucira .
46016014	Yanyi manyan ma ɗe gba̱ n uciga .
46016015	I reve ta̱ Isitifanu n aza a kuwa a ne alya a gita̱i a wokoi Atoni a Akataya , kpam a neke ta̱ kaci ka le tsa̱ra̱ a gbashika ama a Kashila̱ . Ama a va̱ ma folo ɗa̱ ,
46016016	i toni ama a na n aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri tyoku u le i yain manyan n ele i pana̱ka le .
46016017	N pana ta̱ kayanyan an n wenei Isitifanu , n Fara̱tunata , n Akaiku . A ɓa̱nga̱ mu ta̱ adama a ɗa bawu iꞌa̱ri pini .
46016018	A gbamatangu mu ta̱ cika , n reve ta̱ dem nala a yanka ɗa̱ . Kpam u ka̱na̱ ta̱ i na̱ka̱ icun i ama a nala yi tsupige .
46016019	Aꞌuwa a Atoni a ɗa aꞌa̱ri pini na a uyamba u Asiya a ka sukunku ɗa̱ ta̱ idyani i le . Akila n Bilikisu kaɓolo n ama a Kashila̱ a ɗa a tsu gawunsusa a kuwa ku le , a ka sukunku ɗa̱ ta̱ idyani i le a asuvu a kala ka Asheku .
46016020	Gba̱ Atoni a Asheku a ka sukunku ɗa̱ ta̱ idyani i le . Dana̱sai atoku a ɗe mai .
46016021	Mpa Bulus uza ɗa korongi idyani i na yi n kukere ku va̱ .
46016022	N yan ta̱ kavasu Kashila̱ ka yanka uza ɗa baci dem bawu wa ciga Asheku una̱ . Kpam a̱sa̱ka̱ Asheku a tuwa̱ gogo .
46016023	A̱sa̱ka̱ ukuna u shinga u Asheku Yesu u rongo n a̱ɗa̱ .
46016024	Ma ciga ta̱ gba̱ uza ɗa wa̱ri uza u Yesu Kawauwi .
47001001	Mpa Bulus , Kashila̱ ka ka cigai ka ɗanga̱sa mu n woko kasuki ka Yesu Kirisiti Kawauwi . Timoti wa̱ ta̱ pini kaɓolo na̱ mpa aꞌayin a ɗa n korongi ukanikorongi u na vi . Kuwa ku Atoni ku Kashila̱ ka ka̱ri a ilyuci i Korintiya ka ma koronku , n gba̱ aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri ama a Kashila̱ a kapashi ka Akataya .
47001002	A̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ Tata u tsunu n Yesu Asheku Kawauwi a na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ukuna u shinga na̱ ndishi n shinga .
47001003	Cikpai Kashila̱ eyi uza ɗa wa̱ri Tata u Asheku a tsunu Yesu Kawauwi ! Kashila̱ Tata aya uza ɗa wa̱ri n iyali kpam n una̱ka̱ ndishi n katakasuvu .
47001004	U tsu na̱ka̱ ta̱ ndishi n katakasuvu aꞌayin a ɗa baci tsa̱ri a asuvu a kadambula , tsa̱ra̱ tsu na̱ka̱ aza roku ndishi n katakasuvu . Aꞌayin a ɗa baci aza roku aꞌa̱ri a asuvu a kadambula , tsa fuɗa ta̱ tsa na̱ka̱ le icun i ndishi n katakasuvu n nala n ɗa Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ tsu vi .
47001005	Mayun ɗa wa̱ri an tsa pana ikyamba cika adama a Kawauwi . Mayun ɗa kpam tsu tsu tsa̱ra̱ ndishi n katakasuvu cika adama a Kawauwi .
47001006	Tsu pana baci ikyamba , tsa zuwa ta̱ uma u ɗa Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ndishi m atakasuvu n iwauwi adama a upana u ikyamba u nala vi . Aꞌayin a ɗa baci dem Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ tsu ndishi n katakasuvu , tsa̱ra̱ tsu gbamatangu ɗa̱ ɗa . Kpam i fuɗa i kawunku n ahankuri a upana u ikyamba vi .
47001007	Uzuwa u uma u tsunu ubana ara ɗe wa̱ ta̱ n ucira , kpaci tsu reve ta̱ i pana baci ikyamba tyoku ɗa a̱tsu tsu panai , ya wusha ta̱ ndishi n katakasuvu tyoku ɗa a̱tsu tsu wushai .
47001008	Ama a va̱ , tsa ciga ta̱ i reve tyoku ɗa tsu panai ikyamba a uyamba u Asiya . A zuwuka tsu ta̱ ukuna u ɗa u lai ucira u tsunu , hal tsu takpai uma gba̱m tsa yan uma kpam wa .
47001009	Mayun ɗa , tsu zuwa ta̱ tsa kuwa̱ . Shegai ukuna u nala u zuwa tsu ta̱ tsu gita̱ uwushuku n Kashila̱ , shegai kaci ka tsunu wa , kpaci aya u tsu ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ akushe .
47001010	Kashila̱ ka wauwa tsu ta̱ aꞌayin a ɗa tsu yain evu n ukuwa̱ vi , tsu reve ta̱ kpam wa lya kapala n uwauwusa tsu .
47001011	Wa wauwa tsu ta̱ kpaci eɗa̱ ya ɓa̱nga̱sa̱ tsu ta̱ an ya yansa̱ka tsu kavasu . Adama a nala , Kashila̱ ka wushuku ta̱ kavasu ka ɗe . Wa zuwuka tsu ta̱ una̱ u shinga , kpam ama ushani a ka cikpa yi ta̱ adama a ili iꞌya u yanka tsu .
47001012	Tsu ciɓa baci n ili iꞌya tsu yain , tsu tsu dana ta̱ tsu yan ta̱ maza̱nga̱ an bawu tsu yain ukuna u gbani . Kain dem tsu tsu rongo ta̱ mai , kpam tsu tsu sokonku ɗa̱ ko ili wa . Ukuna u shinga u Kashila̱ u ɗa u zuwai uyan ili i nala yi gba̱ , ugboji u likimba u ɗa wa . Tsu rongo ta̱ mai ko nte wa , hal gai u ka̱na̱ baci n a̱ɗa̱ .
47001013	An tsu koronku ɗa̱ vi , tsu yan ta̱ kadyanshi n a̱ɗa̱ karara , tsu sokonku ɗa̱ ko akani a te wa . Adama a nala , n zuwa ta̱ uma ya reve ta̱ gba̱ iꞌya tsu korongi . I tsa̱ ta̱ i revei ili i roku a ili iꞌya tsa tono , shegai tsu zuwa ta̱ uma ubana kapala ya reve ta̱ iꞌya mai mai , tsa̱ra̱ kain ka Yesu Asheku a tsunu ka yan baci , ya yan ta̱ maza̱nga̱ adama a tsunu , a̱tsu kpam tsu yain maza̱nga̱ adama a ɗe . An tsu koronku ɗa̱ vi , tsu yan ta̱ kadyanshi n a̱ɗa̱ karara , tsu sokonku ɗa̱ ko akani a te wa . Adama a nala , n zuwa ta̱ uma ya reve ta̱ gba̱ iꞌya tsu korongi . I tsa̱ ta̱ i revei ili i roku a ili iꞌya tsa tono , shegai tsu zuwa ta̱ uma ubana kapala ya reve ta̱ iꞌya mai mai , tsa̱ra̱ kain ka Yesu Asheku a tsunu ka yan baci , ya yan ta̱ maza̱nga̱ adama a tsunu , a̱tsu kpam tsu yain maza̱nga̱ adama a ɗe .
47001014	
47001015	N reve ta̱ ukuna u na vi mai , ɗa gai i zuwai ma̱ri n foɓusoi ma tuwa̱ n kyawan ɗa̱ ve n kagita̱ ki , nala Kashila̱ ka zuwuka ɗa̱ una̱ u shinga kpaci ma̱ri ma tuwa̱ ta̱ ara ɗe kure .
47001016	Ma̱ri ma ciga ta̱ n ɓatsa n kyawan ɗa̱ aꞌayin a ɗa n wurai ubana a uyamba u Masidaniya n aꞌayin a ɗa kpam ma wura ugono . Aku iꞌa̱ri i ɓa̱nga̱ mu kpam i soku mu a nwalu n va̱ ubana a kaɓon ka Yahuda .
47001017	N reve ta̱ ya wecike ta̱ ili iꞌya i ɓishinka mu uyan iꞌya n foɓusoi vi . Kadyanshi ka uvurusa̱ aꞌene ka ma yanka ɗa̱ wa . Gogo‑na n woko la vi ɗe tyoku u ama a likimba aza ɗa a ka dana ukuna aku a gono a kpa̱ɗa̱ u ɗa ushaɗangu ?
47001018	I reve ta̱ gai Kashila̱ uza ɗa i wushuku n eyi ɗa , nala dem u gan ta̱ i reve an tsu tsu dana “ Eye ” aku tsu gono tsu dana “ Aꞌa ” kute wa .
47001019	Kpaci Yesu Maku ma Kashila̱ u tsu dana “ Eye ” aku u gono u dana “ Aꞌa ” kute wa , shegai u tsu rongo ta̱ n katakasuvu ka te . Aya uza ɗa mpa n Sila n Timoti tsu yanka ɗa̱ kadyanshi a kaci ka ne .
47001020	Kpaci aya u shaɗangi gba̱ kazuwamgbani ka Kashila̱ . Adama a nala a ɗa tsu tsu dana “ Ami ” tsu na̱ka̱ baci Kashila̱ tsupige a asuvu a kala ka Kawauwi .
47001021	Ciɓai , Kashila̱ ka ka tsu zuwa ɗa̱ hal n a̱tsu dem tsu yain ucira a asu u Yesu . Kashila̱ ki aya dem u ɗanga̱sa tsu .
47001022	U kaara tsu ta̱ kugyan tsa̱ra̱ u wenike an a̱tsu ama a ne a ɗa koshi . U zuwuka tsu ta̱ dem Kulu ku ne a asuvu a atakasuvu a tsunu tyoku u uzuwamgbana tsa̱ra̱ u wenike tsu an ili i roku iꞌa̱ri a utuwa̱ .
47001023	Kaɓan ka baci ma yanka ɗa̱ an n danai n ꞌyuwan ugono a Korintiya vi adama a ɗa bawu ma ciga n yan ɗa̱ mavura , a̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ ka yan mu mavura .
47001024	Ili iꞌya ya wushuku n iꞌya , iꞌya tsa tonusuko ɗa̱ wa . Tsu reve ta̱ iꞌa̱ ta̱ n upityanangu u ucira , adama a nala a ɗa iꞌa̱ri n ucira . Tsa ciga ta̱ tsu yain manyan kaɓolo n a̱ɗa̱ tsa̱ra̱ i shaɗangu n maza̱nga̱ .
47002001	N tonuko ta̱ kaci ka va̱ , “ Ma doku ma tuwa̱ ara ɗe wa , kpaci an n tuwa̱i ara ɗe caupa vi n zuwa ta̱ gba̱ ɗe unamgbukatsuma̱ . ”
47002002	Shegai ma zuwa ɗa̱ baci unamgbukatsuma̱ , ya wa zuwa mu n pana kayanyan ? Eɗa koshi , kpam eɗa aza ɗa n zuwai unamgbukatsuma̱ .
47002003	Iꞌya gai i zuwai n koronku ɗa̱ nala a ukanikorongi u ɗa n sukunku ɗa̱ vi . Ma ciga n kyawan ɗa̱ wa , kpaci ugawunsa n a̱ɗa̱ wa zuwa mu ta̱ ukpa̱ɗa̱ u upana u kayanyan . Kpam eɗa ama ɗa u gain i zuwa mu upana u kayanyan . Ili iꞌya i zuwai ma ciga n pana kayanyan iꞌya tsa̱ra̱ eɗa̱ dem i pana kayanyan .
47002004	Aꞌayin a ɗa n koronku ɗa̱ caupa vi , ma̱ ta̱ n kadambula n ukpa̱ɗa̱ u upana u kayanyan a asuvu a katakasuvu ka va̱ hal n koronku ɗa̱ n meshi a aꞌeshi a va̱ cika . N koronku ɗa̱ tsa̱ra̱ n zuwa ɗa̱ unamgbukatsuma̱ wa , shegai koronku ɗa n koronku ɗa̱ tsa̱ra̱ i reve an ma ciga ɗa̱ cika .
47002005	Uza roku a asuvu a ɗe u zuwa mu baci unamgbukatsuma̱ , mpa u zuwai utyoku u va̱ wa . Gba̱ ɗe ɗa u zuwai unamgbukatsuma̱ , kpam ya dem wa̱ ta̱ n tyoku ɗa wa pana u ɗa . Ma ciga n dansa cika wa .
47002006	Uɓolomgbono u kaci u ɗa aza roku a ɗe ushani a yain a yan yi mavura ma ma gain a na̱ka̱ yi vi , ma rawa ta̱ .
47002007	Shegai gogo‑na u gan ta̱ i cimbusuka̱ yi i na̱ka̱ yi ndishi n katakasuvu tsa̱ra̱ kotsu i zuwa yi u rongo n unamgbukatsuma̱ hal upityanangu u ne u rukpa̱ wa .
47002008	Ma folo ɗa̱ , wenike ni an ya ciga yi .
47002009	Koronku ɗa ma koronku ɗa̱ tsa̱ra̱ n kondo ɗa̱ , kpam n wene ko ya pana uwenishike u va̱ .
47002010	I cimbusuka̱ baci vuma nala vi , mpa dem n cimbusuka̱ yi ta̱ . N cimbusuka̱ yi baci ( an baci unyushi wa̱ri pini ) , yan ɗa n yain nala tsa̱ra̱ n yanka ɗa̱ ukuna u shinga a ucira u Kawauwi .
47002011	Tsa̱ra̱ Kanangasi ka lyai kelime n u la tsu ugboji wa , kpaci tsu reve ta̱ afoɓi a Kanangasi utuwa̱ ara tsunu .
47002012	An n rawai a Taruwasa tsa̱ra̱ n yain kuɓari ku Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka Kawauwi , n cina ta̱ cina Asheku a foɓuso ɗe ure adama a manyan mi .
47002013	Shegai n dambula ta̱ cika , kpaci n wene utoku u tsunu Taitu wa . Pini nala , n tonukoi aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri pini vi , “ U yan tsu ben . ” Aku n lazai ubana a Masidaniya .
47002014	Tsu cikpa ta̱ Kashila̱ cika ! Aya u zuwa tsu tsu woko agbashi a ne kpam u tonoi n a̱tsu a kapala adama a ulya u kaci u Kawauwi . Kashila̱ ka ɓa̱nga̱ tsu ta̱ dem tsu tamburuka ureve u Kawauwi ko nte wa tyoku u ili i magula̱ni .
47002015	Uma u tsunu wa̱ ta̱ tyoku u magula̱ni ma Kawauwi ka na̱ka̱ Kashila̱ , ma kpam ma tambura a asu u ama ɗa Kashila̱ ka wauwusa hal n ama ɗa a ka kuwusa̱ .
47002016	A asu u aza ɗa a ka kuwusa̱ , magula̱ni mi ma woko le ɗe ka̱wa̱n ka ukpa̱ . Shegai a asu u aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri n uma , magula̱ni mi ma woko le ɗe magula̱ni ma uma . Ya wa fuɗa wa canga ara̱ji a ukuna u nala vi ?
47002017	Tsa̱ tyoku u ama ɗa a tsu yan kuɓari ku kadyanshi ka Kashila̱ tsa̱ra̱ a tsa̱ra̱ ikebe wa . Nala tsa̱ri wa . Shegai uma̱tsi u ɗa tsa̱ri u uwoko atsumate a Kashila̱ , kpam a asuvu a ucira u Kawauwi tsu tsu dansa ta̱ akani yi a kapala ka Kashila̱ .
47003001	Gogo‑na gita̱ ɗa tsa gita̱ ucikpala kaci ka tsunu ? Ama roku a rawa ta̱ n ikanikorongi i icikpali ko kpam a zuwa ɗa̱ i koronku le ikanikorongi i icikpali yi . U gan tsu yain n ikanikorongi nala ?
47003002	Shegai eɗa ukanikorongi u tsunu , kpam iꞌa̱ ta̱ a asuvu a atakasuvu a tsunu tsa̱ra̱ ya dem u yain ka̱neshi u reve kpam iꞌya u yain ka̱neshi vi .
47003003	I wenike ta̱ a kateshe an eɗa ikanikorongi iꞌya Kawauwi ka korongi aku a̱tsu tsu bankai iꞌya . Kulu Keri ku Kashila̱ Uza u Uma ku korongu ɗa̱ ta̱ a asuvu a atakasuvu a tsunu , shegai a iwara̱ka ko agbagala a ɗa a yain n atali wa .
47003004	Tsa fuɗa ta̱ tsa dana nala adama a ucira u upityanangu u tsunu a kapala ka Kashila̱ adama a Kawauwi .
47003005	Dana ɗa tsu danai tsa fuɗa tsa yan manyan ma nala mi n kaci ka tsunu wa . Kashila̱ ka ka zuwai tsu fuɗai tsu yain gba̱ iꞌya tsu yain vi .
47003006	U zuwa tsu ta̱ tsu fuɗa tsu woko agbashi a kazuwamgbani ka savu ka ne ka ka wuta̱i a asu u Kulu Keri . Kazuwamgbani ka savu ki Mele ma a korongi wa , kpaci Mele ma a korongi ma tsu tuko ta̱ ukpa̱ , shegai Kulu ku tsu tuko ta̱ uma .
47003007	Mele ma cau a atali a ɗa a tsu korongu ma , kpam a tsu wene ta̱ tsupige tsu Kashila̱ a aꞌayin a nala yi . Aza a Isaraꞌila a fuɗa a ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ n a wundi upetiwaꞌeshi u Musa wa , kpaci wa laɗa ta̱ cika , ko an u wokoi ulaɗa vi u ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ wa . Adama a nala , Mele ma ma wokoi manyan ma ne utuko u ukpa̱ u ɗa , kpam ma̱ri n tsupige nala ,
47003008	tsupige tsu manyan ma Kulu Keri tsu la ta̱ tsupige tsu Mele . Ko nala wa ?
47003009	Manyan ma ma tsu tuko ama ukiɗa̱ga u ugana n mavura ma̱ baci n tsupige , manyan ma ma tsu zuwa ama a woko ama a maci a kapala ka Kashila̱ ma yan ta̱ n tsupige tsa tsa la nala vi .
47003010	Mayun ɗa an tsupige tsu kazuwamgbani ka cau tsu woko ɗe ili i gbani , kpaci katyashi ka tsupige tsu savu ka la ta̱ ka cau .
47003011	Mele ma̱ ta̱ n tsupige tsa tsu kporoi . Shegai tsupige tsu kazuwamgbani ka savu tsu la ta̱ ucira , kpaci tsa kporo wa .
47003012	Tsa dansa ta̱ bawu uwonvo , kpaci adama a nala a ɗa tsa̱ri n uzuwa u uma .
47003013	Tsa̱ tyoku u Musa wa . Upetiwaꞌeshi ne u laɗa ta̱ , shegai u pala ta̱ u ɗa tsa̱ra̱ u zuwa aza a Isaraꞌila a lyai kelime n uwene katyashi ki n ka kpori wa .
47003014	Ama yi a ryagbaja ta̱ , kpam ili i roku i tsu ka̱ngu le ta̱ uwene ukuna u mayun aꞌayin a ɗa baci a yain ka̱neshi u Mele . Kawauwi ka koshi ka fuɗa ka takpa le ili iꞌya i ka̱ngu le uwene vi .
47003015	Ko n gogo‑na , a yan baci ka̱neshi u Mele ma Musa , ili iꞌya pini i tsu ka̱ngu le atakasuvu .
47003016	Shegai aꞌayin a ɗa baci dem uza kpatalai ubana a asu u Asheku , she u takpa yi ili iꞌya i ka̱ngu yi vi .
47003017	Asheku a nala yi aya Kulu . Kpam asu ɗa baci dem Kulu ku Magono ma Zuba ka̱ri , ku tsu na̱ka̱ ta̱ utsa̱ra̱ u kaci .
47003018	Adama a nala ipetiyaꞌeshi i tsunu iꞌa̱ kpam upali wa , tsa̱ra̱ tsu wenike tsupige tsu Magono ma Zuba . Kpam Kulu ku Magono ma Zuba ka yan baci manyan a asuvu a tsunu , tsa woko ta̱ tyoku u ne aku tsu wenike tsupige tsu ne cika .
47004001	Kashila̱ n upana u iyali u ne , u na̱ka̱ tsu ta̱ manyan ma na mi tsa̱ra̱ tsu yain . Ili iꞌya i zuwai bawu tsa wowo iꞌya la vi .
47004002	Tsu ꞌyuwan ta̱ uyan ili i uwono ko kpam iꞌya iꞌa̱ri usokongi . Tsu tsu yinsa̱ ko uza wa , kpam tsu tsu savaɗa uwenishike u Kashila̱ wa . Ukuna u mayun u ɗa koshi tsu tsu dansa a kapala ka Kashila̱ , tsa̱ra̱ ama a wushuku an tsa̱ri ama a maci .
47004003	Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka tsa yansa kuɓari ka̱ baci ukimbi , a asu u aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri a ure u ukpa̱ ɗa ka̱ri ukimbi .
47004004	Kanangasi ; wata , uza cingi uza ɗa wa lya tsugono tsu likimba u na u rumba̱na̱sa̱ ta̱ atakasuvu a le , pini nala , a wushuku n akani a ɗa tsa yansa kuɓari a kaci ka tsupige tsu Kawauwi wa . A ka wene katyashi ka pige ka ka wakana ara le wa , kpam a reve an Kawauwi ka rotsoi Kashila̱ wa .
47004005	Aꞌayin a ɗa tsa kyawunsa n tsu yanyi kuɓari ku Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka Kashila̱ ki , kuɓari ku kaci ka tsunu ka tsa yansa wa , shegai ku Yesu Kawauwi an wa̱ri Asheku . A̱tsu agbashi a ɗe a ɗa adama a ili iꞌya Yesu yanka tsu .
47004006	Kashila̱ ka ka danai , “ A̱sa̱ka̱ katyashi ka wakana a asuvu a karimbi ! ” U zuwa tsu ta̱ tsu reve an katyashi ka na ki katyashi ka tsupige tsu Kashila̱ ka , ka tsu tsu wene a upetiwaꞌeshi u Yesu Kawauwi .
47004007	Kuzuwate ku ucanga ku na ki a asu u Kashila̱ ɗa tsu tsa̱ra̱i ka , shegai tsa̱ri ta̱ tyoku u mgbodo n cin a asu u ɗa kuzuwate ku ucanga ki ka̱ri . Nala u wenike ta̱ an ucira u pige vi a asu u Kashila̱ ɗa u wuta̱i , shegai ara tsunu wa .
47004008	A uka tsu a asuvu a awuya cika , shegai a fuɗa a minjara tsu wa . Ko tsu reve baci kpam ili iꞌya tsa yan wa , tsu tsu bula̱ uzuwusa uma an ili i shinga i roku ya gita̱ wa .
47004009	A zuwa tsu ta̱ tsu panai ikyamba cika , shegai Kashila̱ ka a̱sa̱ka̱ tsu wa . A tsu gbashangu tsu ta̱ a iyamba , shegai gba̱ n nala a wacinsa tsu wa .
47004010	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci tsa pana ikyamba nala , ikyamba i tsunu i tsu wenike ta̱ tyoku ɗa Yesu panai ikyamba aꞌayin a ɗa u kuwa̱i vi . Pini nala , ama a ka wene ta̱ uma u Yesu a asuvu a ikyamba i tsunu .
47004011	Nala wa̱ri , kain dem tsu tsu reve ta̱ gaawan a ka wuna tsu ta̱ adama a ɗa tsa gbashika Yesu . Pini nala , ama a ka wene ta̱ uma u Yesu a asuvu a ikyamba i tsunu iꞌya ya kuwa̱ .
47004012	Tsu wushuku ta̱ tsu moɗono n ukpa̱ , tsa̱ra̱ eɗa̱ i tsa̱ra̱ uma .
47004013	A korongu ta̱ a Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ , “ Dansa ɗa ma dansa an u wokoi n wushuki . ” Uwushuku u te u ɗa tsa̱ri n u ɗa , kpam dansa ɗa tsa dansa an u wokoi tsu wushuki .
47004014	Kashila̱ ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ ta̱ Yesu Asheku a asuvu a ukpa̱ . Tsu reve ta̱ kpam an Kashila̱ ka tuwa̱ ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ tsu n Yesu . Kashila̱ ka bidya tsu ta̱ kaɓolo n a̱ɗa̱ kpam tsu shamgba a kapala ka ne .
47004015	Gba̱ ukuna u na vi adama a ukuna u shinga u ɗe u ɗa . Tyoku ɗa ama ushani aꞌa̱ri ulya kelime n uwusha ukuna u shinga u Kashila̱ , nala dem aꞌa̱ri ulya kelime n ucikpa Kashila̱ , Kashila̱ kpam ka̱ri a udoku uwusha tsupige cika .
47004016	Ili iꞌya gai i zuwai bawu tsa bula̱ uzuwa uma iꞌya gai la vi . Ko an u wokoi ikyamba i tsunu ya kuwusa̱ , kain dem kulu ku tsunu ku tsu tsa̱ra̱ ta̱ ucira u savu .
47004017	Upana u ikyamba u ɗa tsa pana gogo‑na wa̱ gan wa , kpam wa ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ wa . Shegai wa ɓa̱nga̱ tsu ta̱ tsu tsa̱ra̱ tsupige tsa tsu lai upana u ikyamba vi cika , kpam tsupige tsi tsa yan n utyoku wa .
47004018	Tsu zuwa aꞌeshi a tsunu a ili iꞌya tsa wene wa , shegai a ili iꞌya bawu tsa wene . Ili iꞌya tsa wene vi ya ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ wa , shegai ili iꞌya bawu tsa wene vi ya yan n utyoku wa .
47005001	Tsu reve ta̱ a wa̱sa̱ baci katani ka tsa rongo na vi ; wata , tsu kuwa̱ baci tsu a̱sa̱ka̱i ikyamba i na yi , Kashila̱ ka foɓusuko tsu ta̱ kuwa ka tsa rongo a zuba . Asu u ɗa eyi foɓusoi n kaci ka ne kpam bawu wa kotso .
47005002	Tsu wowo ɗe n ikyamba iꞌya tsa̱ri n iꞌya gogo‑na , adama a nala tsu ma̱tsa̱ ɗe a uka tsu ikyamba i savu a zuba tyoku u aminya a savu .
47005003	Aꞌayin a nala tsa rongo kpam kataɓa wa , kpaci tsa uka ta̱ ikyamba i savu a zuba .
47005004	An tsa rongo n ikyamba i na yi tsa̱ ta̱ ushaɗangi n kadambula kpam tsa pana ta̱ ikyamba . Shegai uwowi u tsunu u zuwa tsu tsu cigi ukpa̱ aku tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ ikyamba i na yi wa . Tsa ciga ta̱ tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ ikyamba i cau yi , kpaci tsa wusha ta̱ ikyamba iꞌya bawu ya kuwa̱ .
47005005	Kashila̱ ka n kaci ka ne u foɓuso tsu adama a nala yi , kpam u na̱ka̱ tsu Kulu Keri tsa̱ra̱ ku woko tsu uzuwamgbana u ɗa wa wenike an uma u savu u na vi mayun ɗa .
47005006	Adama a nala kain dem tsu rongo n atakasuvu a ucira . Tsu reve ta̱ aꞌayin a ɗa baci tsa̱ri n uma a ikyamba i na yi , tsa̱ a kuwa ku te n Asheku wa .
47005007	Tsa tono ta̱ ili iꞌya tsu wushuki n iꞌya , shegai tsu tono ili iꞌya tsu wenei wa .
47005008	Adama a nala a ɗa n danai tsa̱ ta̱ n atakasuvu a ucira . Tsu la ta̱ uciga tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ ikyamba i na yi tsa̱ra̱ tsu bana a kuwa a asu u Asheku tsu rongo ɗe .
47005009	Tsa̱ baci n uma pini na a ikyamba i na yi , ko kpam tsa̱ baci bawu uma , uciga u tsunu tsu yanka yi ili iꞌya wa pana kayanyan u la ta̱ ili iꞌya i buwai gba̱ .
47005010	Ili iꞌya i zuwai iꞌya , kain ka roku gba̱ tsunu tsa shamgba ta̱ a kapala ka Kawauwi kpam u yanka tsu afada . Ya dem a asuvu a tsunu wa wusha ta̱ katsupi ka ili iꞌya u yain aꞌayin a ɗa wa̱ri n uma a ikyamba i na yi , ko iꞌa̱ baci mai ko icingi .
47005011	Adama a ɗa tsu revei an tsa pana uwonvo u Asheku ɗa i zuwai tsu ma̱tsa̱i tsa̱ra̱ ama a kpatala a gono a asu u ne . Kashila̱ ka reve ta̱ tyoku ɗa tsa̱ri mayun , tsa ciga ɗa̱ ta̱ i reve tyoku ɗa tsa̱ri .
47005012	Tsa ciga tsu doku tsu wenike ɗa̱ ara̱ɗi a kaci ka ili iꞌya tsa̱ri wa , shegai tonuko ɗa tsa tonuko ɗa̱ ili iꞌya tsa̱ri tsa̱ra̱ i yain maza̱nga̱ adama a tsunu . Pini nala , ɗa ya tsa̱ra̱ ili iꞌya ya dana a kaci ka aza ɗa a tsu wenike ara̱ɗi a kaci ka ili iꞌya ama roku a tsu dansa a kaci ka le , shegai aꞌa̱ ama a maci a kapala ka Kashila̱ wa .
47005013	U woko baci yavu ijan iꞌya tsa suma , tsa̱ra̱ u tuko Kashila̱ tsupige ɗa . U woko baci kpam yavu tsa̱ n ugboji u tsunu , nala kpam tsa̱ra̱ tsu ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ ɗa .
47005014	Iꞌya baci dem tsa yan , yan ɗa tsa yan iꞌya kpaci uciga u Kawauwi u ɗa wa tono n a̱tsu . Tsu wushuku ta̱ an uza roku ; wata , Kawauwi ka kuwa̱i adama a ko ya wa , adama a nala tsu wushuku ta̱ an gba̱ tsunu tsu kuwa̱i .
47005015	U kuwa̱ ta̱ tsa̱ra̱ u wauwa ko ya wa , tsa̱ra̱ aza ɗa a wushai uma u savu adama a ne , a rongo kpam uma u ɗa ele a ka pana kayanyan koshi wa . Shegai a rongo uma u ɗa Kawauwi ka pana kayanyan , uza ɗa kuwa̱i kpam a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ yi tsa̱ra̱ u wauwa le .
47005016	Adama a nala a ɗa tsu a̱sa̱ka̱i ubidisa atoku tyoku ɗa likimba u yawunsai a kaci ka le . Caupa , tsu tsu yawunsa ta̱ a kaci ka Kawauwi tyoku ɗa likimba u tsu yan , shegai gogo‑na nala wa̱ri wa .
47005017	Uza ɗa baci ɓolomgbonoi kaci n Kawauwi , Kashila̱ ka gonuko yi ta̱ vuma u savu . Ukuna u cau a kaci ka ne u kotso ɗe , kpam i puwa̱n ɗe . Ko ndya wa i ne Kashila̱ ka gonuko iꞌya ɗe i savu .
47005018	Kashila̱ ka ka yain ili i na yi gba̱ , u tuko tsu evu n eyi adama a ili iꞌya Kawauwi ka yain . U na̱ka̱ tsu manyan ma utuko ama evu n eyi .
47005019	Akani a tsunu yi a ɗa , Kashila̱ ka tukuso ta̱ ama evu n eyi a akere a Kawauwi . Kashila̱ ka tsu ciɓusa unyushi u cingi u le wa . U na̱ka̱ tsu ta̱ kpam akani a ndishi n shinga a na yi .
47005020	Kashila̱ ka zuwa tsu ta̱ tsu woko aza a manyan a una̱ u Kawauwi , kpam u woko ta̱ yavu folo ɗa wa folo ɗa̱ i pana kadyanshi ka tsa tono . Adama a Kawauwi a ɗa tsa dansa , kpam tsa folo ɗa̱ ta̱ i a̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ ka tuko ɗa̱ evu n eyi .
47005021	Kawauwi ka yan unyushi u cingi wa ko kenu ! Shegai Kashila̱ ka gonuko yi uza u unyushi u cingi adama a tsunu , tsa̱ra̱ Kawauwi ka gonuko tsu ama a maci a asu u Kashila̱ .
47006001	Tsu yan ta̱ manyan kaɓolo n Kashila̱ , kpam tsa folo ɗa̱ ta̱ kotsu i wushi ukuna u shinga u ne gbani wa .
47006002	U dana ta̱ a Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ , “ Aꞌayin a rawa baci a ɗa ma wenike ɗa̱ asuvayali , ma pana ta̱ kavasu ka ɗe . Kain ka iwauwi n ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ ta̱ . ” Mayun ɗa , Kashila̱ ka̱ ta̱ ufoɓusi u ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ gogo‑na . Ara kain ka iwauwi ka .
47006003	Tsa ciga aza roku a ꞌyuwan manyan mi wa , adama a nala tsa ciga iꞌya tsa yan i zuwa aza roku a rukpa̱ wa .
47006004	Iꞌya baci dem tsa yan , tsu tsu ciga ta̱ tsu wenike a̱tsu agbashi a mayun a Kashila̱ a ɗa . Tsu kawunku ta̱ gba̱ upana u ikyamba n ahankuri .
47006005	A lapa tsu ta̱ . A zuwusa tsu ta̱ a kuwa ku aꞌali . Kakuma̱ ka ama ka pana tsu ta̱ upan hal a ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱sa̱i atakasuvu a ama . Tsu yan ta̱ manyan hal tsu ɗukpa̱i . Roku tsu tsu lavuta wa . Roku kpam tsa tsa̱ra̱ ilikulya wa .
47006006	Tsu wenike ta̱ kaci ka tsunu a̱tsu agbashi a Kashila̱ a ɗa , kpaci tsu nangasa kaci ka tsunu n tsicingi wa , tsa̱ ta̱ n ureve u ɗa Kashila̱ ka tsu na̱ka̱ . Tsu tsu yan tsali wa . Tsu tsu yansa̱ka ta̱ ama ukuna u shinga . Tsa̱ ta̱ n ucira u Kulu Keri , kpam tsa ciga ta̱ ama mayun mayun .
47006007	Kadyanshi ka mayun ka tsa yansa kuɓari , kpam Kashila̱ ka ka na̱ka̱ tsu ucira vi . Tsa̱ ta̱ n ukuna u maci u ɗa u woko tsu yavu burundu n mara̱ga̱ ma tsa ciga adama a kuvon .
47006008	Kashila̱ ka tsa gbashika ama a ka na̱ka̱sa̱ tsu baci karinga̱ , ko a goruso tsu baci . Kashila̱ ka tsa gbashika ama a ka cikpala tsu baci , ko a ka na̱ka̱sa̱ tsu baci aꞌala a cingi . Ama a bidya tsu ta̱ aza a kaɓan , shegai kain dem ukuna u mayun u ɗa tsa dansa .
47006009	Ya dem reve tsu ta̱ , shegai a gonoi a ka yanka tsu yavu a reve tsu wa . Tsa rongo yavu ukpa̱ wa̱ evu , shegai a̱tsa na , hal n gogo‑na tsa̱ ta̱ n uma . Tsu pana ta̱ ikyamba cika , shegai a wuna tsu wa .
47006010	Kain dem tsu tsu rongo ta̱ n maza̱nga̱ , ko a asuvu a aꞌayin a upana u ikyamba . Aza a unambi a ɗa tsa̱ri , shegai tsu zuwai ama ushani a yain utsa̱ri a asuvu a upityanangu . Tsa̱ n ili wa , shegai mayun ɗa wa̱ri an tsa̱ri n ko ndya wa .
47006011	Eɗa̱ aza a Korintiya , tsu dansa ta̱ n a̱ɗa̱ karara . Atakasuvu a tsunu a shaɗangu ta̱ n uciga u ɗe .
47006012	Tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ ɗa̱ uciga wa , shegai eɗa̱ i a̱sa̱ka̱ tsu ta̱ uciga .
47006013	Ma dansa ta̱ n a̱ɗa̱ tyoku ɗa ma dansa na̱ mmuku n va̱ . Wenike tsu uciga tyoku ɗa a̱tsu tsu wenike ɗa̱ .
47006014	Kotsu i yain manyan kaɓolo a asu u te n aza ɗa bawu a wushuki n Kawauwi wa . Ukuna u shinga n u cingi wa rongo kaɓolo wa . Katyashi n karimbi a ka rongo kaɓolo a asu u te wa .
47006015	Niɗa Kawauwi n Kanangasi a ka walamgbana ? Niɗa uza ɗa wushuki n Kawauwi wa walamgbana n uza ɗa bawu u wushuki ?
47006016	Kuwa ku Kashila̱ ka walamgbana n ameli wa , ko kenu . Kpam a̱tsa kuwa ku Kashila̱ Uza u Uma . Kashila̱ ka dana ta̱ , “ Ma dusuku ta̱ n ele aku n zuwa kuwa ku va̱ a asu u ɗa aꞌa̱ri . Ma woko ta̱ Kashila̱ ka le , ele kpam a ka woko ta̱ ama a va̱ . ”
47006017	Adama a nala , Magono ma Zuba ma dana ta̱ , “ Wuta̱i a asuvu a le i peci kaci ɗe n ele . Kotsu i sawa ili iꞌya Mele ma danai iꞌa̱ n ashinda̱ wa , tsa̱ra̱ n wushi ɗa̱ . ”
47006018	Magono ma Zuba , Uza u Ucira Gba̱ u dana ta̱ , “ Ma woko ta̱ Tata u ɗe , eɗa̱ kpam ya woko ta̱ mmuku n va̱ . ”
47007001	Aje a va̱ , Kashila̱ ka ka yansa̱ka tsu kazuwamgbani ka na ki . Adama a nala tsu sumai ili iꞌya ya zuwa tsu nangasa ikyamba n aꞌulu a tsunu n icaɗi . Tsu na̱ka̱i Kashila̱ tsupige , aku tsu ma̱tsa̱i tsu yain gba̱ iꞌya tsa yan tsu woko tyoku u ne dere .
47007002	Kukpunka̱ tsu atakasuvu a ɗe ! Tsu nusuka ko uza wa . Tsu nangasa kpam upityanangu u uza wa . Tsu ryafa ko uza wa .
47007003	Dana ɗa n danai nala an ma ciga n zuwuka ɗa̱ unyushi wa . Ma̱ri n tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ caupa an tsu tsu rongo ɗa̱ uciɓusa , ko ndya baci tani ya gita̱ .
47007004	N wushuku ta̱ n a̱ɗa̱ gba̱ gba̱ . Kain dem n tsu rongo ta̱ n maza̱nga̱ adama a ɗe . I gbamatangu mu katakasuvu . Ko an u wokoi ma̱ri ushaɗangi n kadambula , i zuwa mu ta̱ ma pana kayanyan .
47007005	An tsu rawai a uyamba u Masidaniya , tsu tsa̱ra̱ uwunvuga wa . Tsu cina ta̱ kadambula ukyawin n a̱tsu . Tsu shila̱ka̱na̱sa̱i n atokulalu , kpam tsa moɗono n uwonvo a atakasuvu a tsunu .
47007006	Shegai Kashila̱ ka ka tsu na̱ka̱ a aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri n kadambula ndishi ma atakasuvu , u na̱ka̱ tsu ta̱ ndishi ma atakasuvu aꞌayin a ɗa Taitu tuwa̱i ara tsunu .
47007007	Mayun tsu pana ta̱ kayanyan an tsu gawunsai n Taitu , shegai gba̱ ili iꞌya i zuwai tsu panai kayanyan cika iꞌya an i gbamatangu yi katakasuvu . U tonuko tsu ta̱ an ya ciga mu uwene kpam hal ukuna u ɓa̱la̱ ɗa̱ n ukuna u ɗa i yain . U tonuko mu ta̱ tyoku ɗa i ma̱tsa̱i i da ya ciga i ɓa̱nga̱ mu . An n panai nala , n pana ta̱ kayanyan cika .
47007008	Ko ukanikorongi u va̱ u nangasa ɗa̱ baci katsuma̱ , ukuna u ɓa̱la̱ mu an n korongi u ɗa wa . A kagita̱ ukuna wa ɓa̱la̱ mu ta̱ an u nangasa ɗa̱ katsuma̱ , shegai unamgbukatsuma̱ u ɗe u ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ wa .
47007009	Gogo‑na kpam ma̱ ta̱ n maza̱nga̱ . Maza̱nga̱ ma ma yan an n nangasa ɗa̱ katsuma̱ wa , shegai unamgbukatsuma̱ u ɗe u zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ i savaɗai ahali a ɗe . Adama a nala tsu shita̱ngu ɗa̱ wa , ko kenu .
47007010	Kpaci Kashila̱ ka fuɗa ta̱ ka yan manyan n unamgbukatsuma̱ u tsunu u ɓa̱nga̱ tsu tsu kpatala tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ unyushi u cingi tsu tsa̱ra̱ iwauwi . Ukuna wa ɓa̱la̱ tsu n unamgbukatsuma̱ u nala vi wa . Shegai unamgbukatsuma̱ vi a kaci ka ukuna u likimba u ɗa baci , wa tuko ta̱ ukpa̱ .
47007011	Zuwai aꞌeshi a asu u unamgbukatsuma̱ u nala vi u ɗa Kashila̱ ka ciga ɗa̱ i pana u yain a asuvu a ɗe . U zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ i gonuko ugboji . U zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ ya ciga i wenike an bawu iꞌa̱ri n unyushi . U zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ upan n uwonvo . U zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ ya ciga i wene mu . U zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ i ma̱tsa̱ i ɓa̱nga̱ aza roku . U zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ uciga u uyan uza ɗa nusai mavura dere . Ukuna u nala u zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ i wenike kaci ka ɗe kabirya ɗa̱ wa .
47007012	Korongu ɗa n korongi ukanikorongi u na vi tsa̱ra̱ i wene , a kapala ka Kashila̱ , tyoku ɗa iꞌa̱ri ufoɓusi i pana̱ka tsu . Korongu ɗa n korongi adama a uza ɗa nusai wa , ko adama a uza ɗa a nusukai wa .
47007013	Ili iꞌya gai i zuwai tsu gbamai asuvu iꞌya gai la vi . Ko an u wokoi tsa̱ri n ugbami u asuvu , tsu la ta̱ upana kayanyan an Taitu wa̱ri dem n upana kayanyan , kpaci i wenike ta̱ an bawu wa̱ri n ili iꞌya ya ɓa̱la̱ yi .
47007014	Tsu tonuko yi ta̱ tyoku ɗa tsu panai kayanyan adama a ɗe , kpam i wenikei an n yain dere . Gba̱ iꞌya tsu tonuko ɗa̱ vi mayun ɗa , kpam i wenikei Taitu ili iꞌya tsu danai a kaci ka ɗe ki mayun ɗa .
47007015	Pini nala , uciga u ne ubana ara ɗe u lya ta̱ kelime n ugbonguro , aꞌayin a ɗa baci u ciɓai tyoku ɗa gba̱ ɗe i pana̱kai udani u ne , n tyoku ɗa i wusha yi n uwonvo n uje u ikyamba .
47007016	Ma̱ ta̱ n maza̱nga̱ an ma fuɗa ma wushuku n a̱ɗa̱ gba̱ gba̱ .
47008001	Aje a va̱ , tsa ciga ta̱ i reve tyoku ɗa Kashila̱ ka wenikei ukuna u shinga u ne a aꞌuwa a Atoni a uyamba u Masidaniya .
47008002	A pana ta̱ ikyamba kpam n unambi cika , shegai maza̱nga̱ ma le ma kotso wa , kpam a na̱ka̱ ta̱ ili iꞌya i lai iꞌya a ka ciga le a na̱ka̱ .
47008003	A̱sa̱ka̱ gai n tonuko ɗa̱ , a na̱ka̱ ta̱ tyoku ɗa a ka fuɗa hal gba̱m u lai ushani . Ko uza u tonuko le a yain nala wa .
47008004	Shegai a rongo tsu ufolo tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ le dem a ɓa̱nga̱ ama a Kashila̱ aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri a Urishelima .
47008005	Tsu yawunsa gba̱m a ka fuɗa a ka na̱ka̱ nala wa ! A gita̱ ta̱ a na̱ka̱i kaci ka le a asu u Asheku , aku ara tsunu . Ili iꞌya Kashila̱ ka ciga iꞌya la vi .
47008006	Taitu ɗa gita̱ ɗa̱ uwenishike una̱ka̱ , adama a nala tsu folo yi u doku u gono ara ɗe u ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ tsa̱ra̱ i koruso ili iꞌya i gita̱i vi .
47008007	I yan ta̱ ko ndya wa mai hal gba̱m i pasa̱kai cika : Iꞌa̱ ta̱ n upityanangu kpam iꞌa̱ ta̱ uyan u kadyanshi ka shinga . Iꞌa̱ ta̱ dem n ureve , kain dem ya ciga i ɓa̱nga̱ , kpam ya ciga tsu cika . Adama a nala , tsa ciga ɗa̱ ta̱ i yain ukuna u shinga vi mai a asu u una̱ka̱ yaa .
47008008	Shegai dana ɗa n danai she i na̱ka̱ ko bawu ya ciga wa , ko an u wokoi aꞌuwa a Atoni a roku a ka ciga ta̱ a yain nala . Ure u roku u ɗa dem u ɗa ya wenike uciga u maci .
47008009	I reve ta̱ ukuna u shinga u Yesu Kawauwi Asheku , i reve ta̱ an Kawauwi ka̱ri n utsa̱ri , shegai adama a ɗe u woko ta̱ uza u unambi , tsa̱ra̱ adama a unambi u ne eɗa̱ i tsa̱ra̱ utsa̱ri .
47008010	Adooki a va̱ a ɗa na : Naɓalu eɗa aza a kagita̱ aza ɗa i cigai i na̱ka̱ , kpam eɗa aza a kagita̱ a ɗa i na̱ka̱i vi .
47008011	Gogo‑na , ma ciga ta̱ i koruso manyan ma i gita̱i uyan vi . Wenikei an ya fuɗa ya koruso manyan mi n maloko tyoku ɗa i gita̱i ma . Na̱ka̱i a asuvu a ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri n iꞌya .
47008012	Ya ciga baci i na̱ka̱ , wa yan n kalen ko ndya i na̱ka̱i wa , kpaci Kashila̱ ka la ta̱ uciga i na̱ka̱ a asuvu a ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri n iꞌya , shegai i na̱ka̱ ili iꞌya bawu iꞌa̱ri n iꞌya wa .
47008013	Ma ciga i na̱ka̱ ili ushani hal i woko bawu ili , aku i rongo a upana ikyamba an bawu iꞌa̱ri n ili wa . Ma ciga ta̱ uza ɗa baci dem wa̱ri pini u zuwa kukere dere .
47008014	Gogo‑na naha , iꞌa̱ ta̱ n ili ushani . Ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri n iꞌya ya fuɗa ta̱ ya ɓa̱nga̱ aza ɗa bawu aꞌa̱ri n ili . Aku ubana a kapala a tuwa̱ baci a tsa̱ra̱i , aku a ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ dem aꞌayin a ɗa baci bawu iꞌa̱ri n iꞌya , pini nala , she i woko una̱ u te .
47008015	Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , “ Uza ɗa baci ɓolongi ili ushani , i tsu pasa ili iꞌya wa ciga wa , shegai uza ɗa baci ɓolongi kenu , wa namba ili wa . ”
47008016	N cikpa ta̱ Kashila̱ an u zuwai Taitu wa ciga ɗa̱ tyoku ɗa ma ciga ɗa̱ .
47008017	Taitu wushuku ta̱ u yain ili iꞌya tsu tonuko yi u yain . Wa̱ ta̱ n maluwa cika ma wa ciga u tuwa̱ ara ɗe , tun bawu tsu tonuko yi gba̱m nala .
47008018	Aya la tsa suku kaɓolo n utoku uza ɗa wa̱ri Katoni , uza ɗa kpam gba̱ Atoni a ka cikpala adama a manyan ma ne a asu u uyan kuɓari ku Kadyanshi ka Shinga .
47008019	Atoni yi a ɗanga̱sa yi ta̱ dem u bana kaɓolo n a̱tsu tsa na̱ka̱ baci kune ku na ki . Yan ɗa tsa yan manyan ma na mi tsa̱ra̱ tsu na̱ka̱ Asheku tsupige , kpam tsu wenike an tsa ciga tsu ɓa̱nga̱ cika .
47008020	Kpaci tsa ciga ko uza u ka̱na̱ tsu n unyushi u tyoku ɗa tsu na̱ka̱i kune ku pige ku na ki wa .
47008021	Shegai tsa ciga ta̱ tsu yain ili iꞌya Asheku a ka pana kayanyan n ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri dere a aꞌeshi a ama .
47008022	Tsa suku ta̱ dem vuma roku kaɓolo n ama a re a nala yi . Kain dem vuma na wa̱ ta̱ ufoɓusi adama a uɓa̱nga̱ . U wenike tsu ta̱ nala a ure kau‑kau , kpam gogo‑na dem wa la ta̱ uciga uɓa̱nga̱ . Kpaci u wushuku ta̱ n a̱ɗa̱ cika .
47008023	Uza roku u wecike baci Taitu , i dana utoku u va̱ u ɗa uza ɗa wa yan manyan na̱ mpa tsa̱ra̱ u ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ . Aꞌuwa a Atoni a suku ta̱ ama a na yi ara ɗe , kpam a tuko ta̱ tsupige a asu u Kawauwi .
47008024	Wenike le uciga , tsa̱ra̱ gba̱ aꞌuwa a Atoni a reve an tsu yain dere a asu u maza̱nga̱ n iꞌya tsu yain adama a ɗe .
47009001	N wene ili iꞌya ya zuwa mu n koronku ɗa̱ adama a kune ka i foɓusoi ya na̱ka̱ ama a Kashila̱ yi wa .
47009002	N reve ta̱ ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa ya ciga i ɓa̱nga̱ . Ma̱ ta̱ n maza̱nga̱ adama a nala yi , kpam ma̱ ta̱ a utonusuko ama a asuvu a Masidaniya n da eɗa̱ Atoni a ɗa iꞌa̱ri a Akataya , i foɓuso ta̱ tun naɓalu tsa̱ra̱ i na̱ka̱ . Adama a uma̱tsa̱ u ɗa i ma̱tsa̱i ya ciga i na̱ka̱ vi , u zuwa ta̱ aza roku aza a Masidaniya a ka ciga dem a na̱ka̱ .
47009003	Shegai mpa pini ma sukunku ɗa̱ atoku a nala yi tsa̱ra̱ kadyanshi ka tsunu a kaci ka ɗe ka woko ka gbani wa . Ma ciga ta̱ i foɓuso , kpaci n tonuko le ta̱ i foɓuso ɗe .
47009004	Ma pana ta̱ uwono , eɗa̱ kpam dem ya pana ta̱ uwono , mpa n Atoni a roku a Masidaniya tsu tuwa̱ baci tsu cina ɗa̱ bawu afoɓi , cina n tonuko le tani ɗe i foɓuso ɗe !
47009005	Ɗa n wenei yavu wa gan ta̱ n suku atoku a nala yi a kapala ka va̱ a wene kune ka i yain kazuwamgbani ki i foɓuso ta̱ ka . Nala wa wenike ta̱ an n ucigi u ɗe u ɗa i na̱ka̱i , shegai mpa n ma̱tsa̱ ɗa̱ wa .
47009006	Ma ciga ta̱ i reve , uza u ce baci ili kenu , ili kenu iꞌya wa kapa . Uza ɗa baci kpam u cei ili ushani , wa kapa ta̱ ili ushani .
47009007	Adama a nala ya dem u yawunsa tyoku u kakuma̱ ka ili iꞌya wa na̱ka̱ . Kotsu vu na̱ka̱ ili wa , ikyamba i vunu i ꞌya̱nga̱ baci vu na̱ka̱ wa . Kotsu vu na̱ka̱ ili wa , va wene baci yavu ma̱tsa̱ ɗa a ka ma̱tsa̱ vu vu na̱ka̱ . Kpaci Kashila̱ ka la ta̱ uciga uza ɗa u na̱ka̱i n ipeli .
47009008	Kashila̱ kpam ka zuwuka ɗa̱ ta̱ una̱ u shinga u ɗa u lai ili iꞌya i nambai . Pini nala , ɗa kain dem ya yan n ili ushani , kpam i yain n iꞌya kaberikete hal i na̱ka̱sa̱ adama a manyan ma shinga gba̱ .
47009009	Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ : “ Gbani ɗa vuma u maci u tsu na̱ka̱ aza a unambi kune , kpam ukuna u maci u ne wa̱ ta̱ pini bawu utyoku . ”
47009010	Kpaci Kashila̱ ka ka tsu na̱ka̱ kacimbi icun , u na̱ka̱ kpam ilikulya . Wa doku ta̱ ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri n iꞌya kakuma̱ , tsa̱ra̱ i tsa̱ra̱ iꞌya ya na̱ka̱ ushani a asu u uyan ukuna u shinga .
47009011	Wa kukpa̱ ta̱ ure kau‑kau u ɗa wa zuwa ɗa̱ i yain utsa̱ri tsa̱ra̱ i yansa kune yaa . Pini nala , ɗa ama ushani a ka cikpa Kashila̱ aꞌayin ɗa baci tsu na̱ka̱ le kune ku ɗe .
47009012	Pini nala , ili i shinga i re ya gita̱ ta̱ , ili iꞌya ama a Kashila̱ a nambai a ka tsa̱ra̱ ta̱ iꞌya , ama a ka cikpa ta̱ kpam Kashila̱ n maza̱nga̱ .
47009013	Ya rongo ta̱ a una̱ka̱ Kashila̱ tsupige kpaci i na̱ka̱ ta̱ yaa . I wushuku ta̱ n akani a kaci ka Kawauwi , kpam i pana̱ka ta̱ a ɗa an i na̱ka̱i Atoni a Urishelima yaa hal n Atoni a ɗa a buwai .
47009014	Gogo‑na alya pini a ka yanka ɗa̱ kavasu , kpam a ka ciga ɗa̱ uwene , adama a ukuna u shinga u pige u ɗa Kashila̱ ka yanka ɗa̱ .
47009015	A̱sa̱ka̱i tsu cikpai Kashila̱ adama a kune ka u na̱ka̱ tsu gbani .
47010001	Mpa Bulus uza ɗa wa folo ɗa̱ vi , kpam n mata̱nu n tsishinga tsu Kawauwi tsa ma folo ɗa̱ . Aza roku a dana ta̱ , aꞌayin a ɗa baci ma̱ri kaɓolo n a̱ɗa̱ n tsu gajara̱kpa ikyamba wa , aku n rongo n asuvu a shen aꞌayin a ɗa baci bawu ma̱ri evu n a̱ɗa̱ .
47010002	Aꞌayin a ɗa n doku n tuwa̱ ɗa̱ ukondo , u ka̱na̱ ta̱ n yanka aza ɗa a ka wundya tsa tono ta̱ ukuna u likimba asuvu a shen . Ma ciga i zuwa mu n yanka ɗa̱ nala wa .
47010003	A likimba ɗa tsa̱ri , shegai kushulu ku tsunu una̱ u te ɗa ka̱ri n tyoku ɗa aza likimba a ka yansa wa .
47010004	Tsu tsu shila̱ka̱na̱ n iwunukatsu icun iꞌya aza a likimba a tsu shila̱ka̱na̱ka̱ wa . Iwunukatsu i tsunu iꞌa̱ ta̱ n ucira u ɗa u wuta̱i a asu u Kashila̱ u ɗa wa wacinsa ucira u asu kau‑kau u utokulalu .
47010005	Tsu tsu wacinsa ta̱ kananamgbani n gba̱ icun i ara̱ɗi a ɗa a ka ɓishinka uza ureve Kashila̱ . Tsu tsu ka̱na̱ ta̱ uyawunsa u gbani u ama , aku tsu zuwa le a pana̱ka Kawauwi .
47010006	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci i wenikei ya pana̱ka ɗe Kawauwi gba̱ gba̱ , pini nala , aku tsu rongo ufoɓusi adama a ɗa tsa yanka aza ɗa bawu a ka pana̱ka Kawauwi mavura .
47010007	Gogo‑na ili iꞌya ya wene n aꞌeshi koshi iꞌya ya wundya . Shegai u gan ta̱ i ciɓa an tsa̱ri aza a Kawauwi tyoku ɗa dem aza a ara̱ɗi a nala a tsu dana ele aza a Kawauwi a ɗa aꞌa̱ri .
47010008	Mayun ɗa wa̱ri an tsu tsu dansa n agoni a kaci ka ucira u ɗa Asheku a na̱ka̱ tsu tsa̱ra̱ tsu ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ , shegai adama a ɗa tsa varangu ɗa̱ wa . N tsu pana uwono adama a ukuna u nala wa .
47010009	Aꞌayin a ɗa n koronku ɗa̱ vi , ma ciga i yawunsa yavu uwonvo u ɗa ma ciga n zuwa ɗa̱ i pana wa .
47010010	Aza roku a da , “ Ikanikorongi i Bulus iꞌa̱ ta̱ n ucira kpam n kalen cika , shegai wa̱ baci kaɓolo n a̱tsu , u tsu yan n ucira wa . Kpam kadyanshi ka ne ka tsu yan n kalen wa . ”
47010011	Ma ciga ta̱ a reve ukuna u roku : Gogo‑na naha tsa̱ kaɓolo n a̱ɗa̱ wa , ɗa i zuwai tsu korongi ukuna u na vi a ikanikorongi . Shegai aꞌayin a ɗa baci tsa̱ri kaɓolo n a̱ɗa̱ , tsa wenike ta̱ ucira vi tyoku ɗa tsu wenikei u ɗa a ikanikorongi yi .
47010012	Tsa kawan tsu bidya kaci ka tsunu una̱ u te n aza ɗa a tsu yawunsa kaci ka le aꞌa̱ ta̱ n kalen wa . A tsu boluko ta̱ kaci ka le ure u ura̱tsana̱ka aku a ra̱tsana̱ka kaci ka le n u ɗa . A tsu gawuntangu ta̱ kaci ka le n ko ndya wa tyoku ɗa ele aꞌa̱ri . Nala wa wenike ta̱ an bawu a revei ili .
47010013	Shegai a̱tsu tsa yan ara̱ɗi a kaci ka ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri a kateshe n manyan ma Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ tsu tsu yain wa . Ara̱ɗi a ɗa koshi tsa yan a ɗa a manyan ma Kashila̱ ka suku tsu tsu yain , kpam eɗa̱ dem iꞌa̱ ta̱ a asuvu a manyan ma nala mi .
47010014	Ara̱ɗi yi a wura tyoku ɗa u gain tsu yain a ɗa wa , a̱tsa gba̱m aza a kagita̱ aza ɗa a tuko ɗa̱ Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka Kawauwi .
47010015	Tsu tsu yan ara̱ɗi adama a ili iꞌya aza roku a yain i woko yavu a̱tsa tsu yain iꞌya wa . Shegai tsu zuwa ta̱ uma upityanangu u ɗe wa gbama ta̱ hal u zuwa manyan ma tsunu ara ɗe ma lyai kelime cika .
47010016	Tsa ciga ta̱ tsu ba tsu yain Kadyanshi ka Shinga ki a asu u mɓa̱ri mɓa̱ri . Tsa ciga tsu yain ara̱ɗi n manyan ma aza roku a yain a asu u le wa .
47010017	Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ dana ta̱ , “ Va ciga baci vu yain ara̱ɗi , she vu yain a ɗa a ili iꞌya Asheku a yain . ”
47010018	A kaci ka uza ɗa wa cikpala̱sa kaci ka ne kpam , u tsu tsa̱ra̱ icikpali wa . Shegai Magono ma Zuba ma wushunku baci uza , vuma nala vi aya wa tsa̱ra̱ icikpali i mayun .
47011001	Ma ciga ta̱ i yanka mu ahankuri aꞌayin a ɗa baci n yain maku ma utengeshi . Mayun n folo ɗa̱ ta̱ i yanka mu ahankuri .
47011002	Ma kirana ta̱ n a̱ɗa̱ cika tyoku ɗa Kashila̱ ka kirana n a̱ɗa̱ . Iꞌa̱ ta̱ tyoku u maku ma uka ma bawu ma revei vali , uza ɗa a yankai kazuwamgbani ka iyolo i vali u te koshi ; wata , Kawauwi ka la vi n kaci ka ne .
47011003	Shegai gogo‑na ma pana ta̱ uwonvo u ɗa a ka puwunsa̱ atakasuvu a ɗe tsa̱ra̱ i a̱sa̱ka̱ utono Kawauwi mayun mayun n uwulukpi , tyoku ɗa kali ka yinsa̱i Hawa n ugboji u cingi u ne .
47011004	Tsu tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ ukuna u Yesu , kpam i wushai Kulu Keri , i wushuki kpam n akani a tsunu . Shegai i a̱sa̱ka̱i aza roku a tonuko ɗa̱ ukuna u roku kau n u Yesu . Gogo‑na ufoɓusi u ɗa iꞌa̱ri i wushi kulu ku roku ɗe kau , i wushi kpam akani a roku .
47011005	N wene aza ɗa a ka isa̱ kaci ka le “ asuki a pige ” a la mu wa .
47011006	Gaawan n tsu dansa karkar tyoku u le wa , shegai n reve ta̱ ili iꞌya ma dansa . Tsu yan ta̱ gba̱ iꞌya tsa yan tsu wenike ɗa̱ ili i na yi mai .
47011007	N zuwa ɗa̱ i tsupa mu adama a Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka n yanka ɗa̱ kuɓari wa . N gonuko ta̱ kaci ka va̱ kenu , aku n na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ tsupige . An n yain nala vi , n nusa ?
47011008	An aꞌuwa a Atoni a roku a ka na̱ka̱sa̱ mu ikebe , u woko ta̱ yavu bokuso ɗa ma bokuso ikebe yi tsa̱ra̱ n gbashika ɗa̱ .
47011009	N namba baci ili aꞌayin a ɗa ma̱ri n a̱ɗa̱ , n tsu tonuko ɗa̱ i ɓa̱nga̱ mu wa . Atoku a ɗa a wuta̱i a Masidaniya a tuwa̱i pini na , a na̱ka̱ mu ta̱ gba̱ ili iꞌya ma ciga . N taɓa ɗa̱ ufolo i ɓa̱nga̱ mu wa , kpam ma folo ɗa̱ wa .
47011010	Ko uza wa̱ la a asuvu a uyamba u Akataya uza ɗa wa ɓishinka mu uyansa kadyanshi a kaci ka ili i nala wa . N dana ta̱ kpam nala adama a ukuna u mayun u Kawauwi u ɗa wa̱ri a asuvu a va̱ .
47011011	N dana baci ma ciga n zuwuka ɗa̱ ara̱ji wa , u woko yavu ma ciga ɗa̱ wa ? Nala wa . Ko Kashila̱ ka reve ta̱ ma ciga ɗa̱ .
47011012	Kpam ma lya ta̱ kelime n uyan ili iꞌya ma yan gogo‑na vi , kpaci ma ciga ta̱ n ɓishinka ama a nala utsa̱ra̱ u ili iꞌya a ka yanka ara̱ɗi . A ciga ta̱ a dana manyan ma a ka yanka ara̱ɗi yi ma̱ ta̱ una̱ u te n ma tsunu .
47011013	Ama a na yi asuki a kaɓan a ɗa . Manyan ma le ma a tsu yanka kaɓan , aku a gonukoi kaci ka le tsa̱ra̱ a rotso asuki a mayun a Kawauwi .
47011014	Shegai mpa n yan majiyan ma ili i nala wa ! Ko Kanangasi ka gonuko ta̱ kaci ka ne tsa̱ra̱ u rotso katsumate ka zuba ka katyashi .
47011015	Adama a nala , tsu yan majiyan an agbashi a Kanangasi a gonukoi kaci ka le a rotso agbashi a ɗa a ka yan manyan ma ukuna u shinga wa . Shegai a makorishi a ka tsa̱ra̱ ta̱ mavura dere n ili iꞌya a yain .
47011016	A̱sa̱ka̱ n doku n tonuko ɗa̱ : Ko uza kotsu u wundi yavu mpa katengeshi ka wa . Shegai nala baci ya wundya , she i pana̱ka mu tyoku ɗa ya pana̱ka katengeshi , mpa dem aku n yain ara̱ɗi kenu .
47011017	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci ma cikpala kaci ka va̱ nala , tyoku u Asheku u ɗa n tsu dansa wa , shegai tyoku u katengeshi .
47011018	Ama ushani a ka yan ta̱ ara̱ɗi a kaci ka ili iꞌya a yain a likimba . Adama a nala mpa dem ma yan ta̱ ara̱ɗi .
47011019	Eɗa̱ aza ɗa ya wundya yavu iꞌa̱ n ugboji , i tsu pana ta̱ kayanyan ka upana kadyanshi ka atengeshi .
47011020	I tsu yan ta̱ gba̱m ahankuri n aza ɗa a tsu gonuko ɗa̱ agbashi a le , ko a ryafusa ɗa̱ , n aza ɗa a tsu yinsa̱sa̱ ɗa̱ . I tsu yan ta̱ dem ahankuri n aza ɗa a tsu wundya yavu a la ɗa̱ , ko aza ɗa a tsu ɓasa̱sa ɗa̱ .
47011021	N tsu pana ta̱ uwono n dana tsa̱ n ucira u ɗa tsa yan nala wa . A ka yan baci ara̱ɗi , mpa dem ma yan ta̱ , shegai utengeshi u ɗa uyan nala vi .
47011022	A dana baci ele kagali ka Ibirahi ka , mpa dem uza u kagali ka Ibirahi ka . Ele aza a Isaraꞌila a ɗa baci , mpa dem nala . Ele mmuku n tsikaya m Ibirahi n ɗa baci , mpa dem nala .
47011023	Ele agbashi a Kawauwi a ɗa baci , wa woko mu ta̱ utengeshi n dansa baci nala . Shegai tyoku ɗa ma gbashika yi u la ta̱ tyoku ɗa ele a ka gbashika yi . N yan ta̱ manyan cika ma ma lai ma le . A zuwusa mu ta̱ a kuwa ku aꞌali hal u lai tyoku ɗa a zuwusa le . Malapa ma a lapusa mu ma la ta̱ ma a lapusai ele . N yansa ta̱ evu n ukpa̱ aꞌayin ushani .
47011024	Aza a Yahuda a bawan mu ta̱ n kajaɓu hal kamankupa n kuci . Kutawun ka gba̱m a bawan mu nala .
47011025	Aza a Roma a lapusa mu ta̱ n alangu , kutatsu ka gba̱m a yanka mu nala . A taɓa mu ta̱ uvara̱sa n atali tsa̱ra̱ a wuna . N so ta̱ nwalu a kpatsu , kpatsu ku ta̱sa̱ ta̱ na̱ mpa hal kutatsu . N taɓa ta̱ urukpa̱ a mini n kuvuli hal ubana kuvuli ku roku .
47011026	Nwalu n kakuma̱ mi , n tsu zuwa mu ta̱ n yain evu n ukpa̱ adama a uwaya u mini n adama a aza a maga̱la̱ka̱ . N yan ta̱ evu n ukpa̱ adama a ama a va̱ , aza a Yahuda , kpam hal n Awulawa . N tsu yan ta̱ evu n ukpa̱ a ilyuci ilyuci , n a kakamba , hal n mala dem . N yan ta̱ dem evu n ukpa̱ adama a aza ɗa a danai ele Atoni a ɗa , shegai Atoni a ɗa wa .
47011027	N yan ta̱ manyan cika hal n togbolukoi , aꞌayin ushani n tsu lavuta gba̱m wa . N tsu ronguso ta̱ n kambulu n kakuli , kpam aꞌayin ushani n tsu tsa̱ra̱ ilikulya wa . N soso ta̱ kuta̱nu kpaci ma̱ n aminya a uꞌuka cika wa .
47011028	Hal n ara gai , kain dem u tsu woko ta̱ yavu va da n canga ta̱ ucanga u ara̱ji kpaci n tsu ɓa̱la̱ ta̱ asuvu adama a aꞌuwa a Atoni .
47011029	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci bawu aza roku aꞌa̱ri n ucira , n tsu woko ta̱ dem bawu ucira . Asuvu a tsu suɗugba mu ta̱ aꞌayin a ɗa baci n wenei a yinsa̱i uza roku tsa̱ra̱ u yain unyushi .
47011030	U ka̱na̱ baci n cikpala kaci ka va̱ , ma yan ta̱ nala adama a ili iꞌya i zuwa mu n woko bawu ucira .
47011031	Kashila̱ ka reve ta̱ kaɓan ka ma yan wa . Aya Kashila̱ n Tata u Yesu Kawauwi Asheku , uza ɗa a ka cikpala hal ubana bawu utyoku .
47011032	An ma̱ri a Damasuka , uza ɗa wa̱ri gomuna aꞌayin a ɗa Arita wa lya tsugono , wa̱ri u ciga ta̱ u ka̱na̱ mu , adama a nala , u zuwa ta̱ aza a uwundya ukyawan a ilyuci yi .
47011033	Shegai aje a va̱ a zurala̱kpa mu a asuvu a mabana a ilinuku i kasaga ka ilyuci ki . Tyoku ɗa n lai a akere a gomuna yi ɗa la vi .
47012001	U ka̱na̱ ta̱ n yain ara̱ɗi , ko an u wokoi ko kalen ma lya pini wa , shegai a̱sa̱ka̱ n yain a ɗa adama a kuwene n ili iꞌya Asheku a wenike mu .
47012002	Ayen kupa n a nishi a ɗa a wurai , Kashila̱ ka wusha ta̱ Katoni ka Kawauwi ka roku a asu u uwunvugusa a zuba u Kashila̱ aꞌayin a roku . N reve wa , ko ikyamba i ne iꞌya i walai , ko kpam kulu ku ne , shegai Kashila̱ ka reve ta̱ .
47012003	N doku n dana , n reve ta̱ a bidya ta̱ vuma u na ubana a asu u uwunvugusa a zuba .
