Shegai ko ikyamba i ne iꞌya i banai a zuba vi ko kulu ku ne ka koshi ku banai n reve wa , Kashila̱ ka ka revei . U pana ta̱ kadyanshi ka roku ka bawu wa fuɗa wa toɗugbo , n ili iꞌya bawu Kashila̱ ka a̱sa̱ka̱ uza dana . N doku n dana , n reve ta̱ a bidya ta̱ vuma u na ubana a asu u uwunvugusa a zuba . Shegai ko ikyamba i ne iꞌya i banai a zuba vi ko kulu ku ne ka koshi ku banai n reve wa , Kashila̱ ka ka revei . U pana ta̱ kadyanshi ka roku ka bawu wa fuɗa wa toɗugbo , n ili iꞌya bawu Kashila̱ ka a̱sa̱ka̱ uza dana .
47012004	
47012005	Adama a nala ma yan ta̱ ara̱ɗi adama a vuma na vi , shegai ma yan a ɗa adama a kaci ka va̱ wa , she ili iꞌya ya zuwa mu n reve an bawu ma̱ri n ucira .
47012006	Ma̱ri ma ciga baci n yanka kaci ka va̱ ara̱ɗi , wa woko mu utengeshi wa , kpaci ma̱ri ma dansa ta̱ ukuna u mayun . Ma yan a ɗa adama a kaci ka va̱ wa . Ma ciga ama a na̱ka̱ mu tsupige tsa tsu lai tsu ili iꞌya a wenei ma yan ko n danai wa .
47012007	U gan n woko n ara̱ɗi a kaci ka ili i pige i pige iꞌya Kashila̱ ka wenike mu wa . Ɗa gai i zuwai u na̱ka̱ mu mɓa̱la̱ n pana ikyamba yi , tyoku ɗa kawana ka tsu sapa ikyamba . U woko yavu katsumate ka Kanangasi ka ka zuwa mu n pana ikyamba , u ɓishinka mu kpam uyan ara̱ɗi .
47012008	N folo ta̱ Asheku hal kutatsu tsa̱ra̱ u takpa mu ukuna u na vi .
47012009	Shegai u tonuko mu , “ Ukuna u shinga u va̱ u rawa vu ta̱ . Aꞌayin a ɗa baci bawu va̱ri n ucira , ucira u va̱ u tsu shaɗangu ta̱ ara vunu . ” Adama a nala , gogo‑na ma̱ ta̱ n maza̱nga̱ ma ma yan ara̱ɗi adama a ɗa bawu ma̱ri n ucira , ucira u Kawauwi u yain manyan ara va̱ .
47012010	Adama a ɗa wa woko ukuna u shinga a asu u Kawauwi u ɗa baci ma namba ucira , ko ama a ka tonusuko mu baci kagbani , ma yan ta̱ maza̱nga̱ . Ma namba baci ili adama a ɗa wa woko ukuna u shinga a asu u Kawauwi , ko a ka yansa mu baci mavura , ma yan ta̱ maza̱nga̱ . A ka zuwusa mu baci n pana ikyamba adama a ɗa Kawauwi ka tsa̱ra̱ ukuna u shinga , ma yan ta̱ maza̱nga̱ . Kpam aꞌayin a ɗa baci dem n nambai ucira , aꞌayin a nala a ɗa ma tsa̱ra̱ ucira cika .
47012011	Tyoku u katengeshi u ɗa ma dansa , shegai eɗa i zuwa mu ma dansa nala . Eɗa i gain ya dansa ukuna u maci a kaci ka va̱ . Ko ma̱ baci ili i roku wa , aza ɗa a danai ele “ asuki a pige ” a ɗa vi a la mu wa .
47012012	Aꞌayin a ɗa ma̱ri kaɓolo n a̱ɗa̱ vi , n rongo ta̱ n ahankuri kpam n yansa ta̱ manyan ma ucira n iryoci n ili iꞌya ya tuko ikunesavu iꞌya i gain kasuki ka mayun ka yain .
47012013	Adama a nala , i wusha ta̱ ili iꞌya aꞌuwa a Atoni a ɗa a buwai a wushai . Ili i te iꞌya i takpanai : N gonuko kaci ka va̱ n woko ɗa̱ kala̱nda̱m wa . Yanka numu ahankuri !
47012014	Mpa pini ma foɓuso tsa̱ra̱ n tuwa̱ n kyawan ɗa̱ ukyawan u tatsu . Shegai hal n ara ma boluko ɗa̱ kala̱nda̱m wa . Eɗa ma ciga , shegai ikebe i ɗe wa . Mmuku n ɗa n gain a foɓo ikebe adama a ubidya ara̱ji a isheku i le wa , shegai isheku i bidya ara̱ji a mmuku n le .
47012015	Adama a nala , ma̱ ta̱ n maza̱nga̱ ma ma na̱ka̱ ko ndya wa i va̱ adama a ɗe , hal gba̱m n kaci ka va̱ dem . Ya jebe uciga u ɗa ya ciga mu vi an u wokoi n la ɗa̱ uciga ?
47012016	Aza roku a ɗe a wushuku ta̱ an bawu n woko ɗa̱ kala̱nda̱m . Shegai , hal n gogo‑na alya pini a ka yawunsa yavu ugboji u ɗa n yain n yanka ɗa̱ kaɓan tsa̱ra̱ n wanda ɗa̱ .
47012017	Ama ɗa n sukunku ɗa̱ vi , uza roku wa̱ pini uza ɗa ryafa ɗa̱ ?
47012018	N folo ta̱ Taitu tuwa̱ ara ɗe , kpam n tutsuku yi ta̱ kaɓolo n Katoni ka roku . Shegai u ryafa ɗa̱ wa . Eɗa̱ dem n kaci ka ɗe i reve ta̱ an mpa n eyi ko ndya wa una̱ u te u ɗa iꞌa̱ri tsu , kpam uyawunsa u ɗa tsu u te .
47012019	Gaawan ya dana ta̱ dana ɗa tsu danai gba̱ nala tsa̱ra̱ tsu wenike an tsa̱ri ama a maci . Nala wa . Tsu tsu dansa ta̱ tyoku ɗa Kawauwi ka ciga tsu tsu dansa a kapala ka Kashila̱ . Eɗa̱ aje a tsunu a ɗa , kpam ko ndya baci tsa yan , yan ɗa tsa yan iꞌya tsa̱ra̱ tsu zuwa ɗa̱ i gbama .
47012020	Kpaci ma pana ta̱ uwonvo u ɗa n tuwa̱ ɗa̱ baci ukyawan , ahali a ɗe a kpa̱ɗa̱ mu uyankpa , kpam adama a nala , ahali a va̱ dem a ka yankpa ɗa̱ wa . Ma pana ta̱ uwonvo u ɗa ma cina ɗa̱ n i nanamgbani , ko n i yanyi malyon ma ili iꞌya ama aꞌa̱ri n iꞌya . Ma pana ta̱ uwonvo u ɗa ma cina ɗa̱ n asuvu a shen , ko kpam ya ciga̱ka kaci ka ɗe ko ndya wa . Ma pana ta̱ dem uwonvo u ɗa ma cina ɗa̱ n i tonusuki ama kagbani , ko n i yanyi ndyami . Kotsu kpam gai n cina ɗa̱ n i yanyi ara̱ɗi , ko ya rongo kaberikete bawu i ka̱na̱i kaci wa .
47012021	Mayun ɗa ma pana uwonvo u ɗa n tuwa̱ baci gaawan Kashila̱ ka va̱ ka gonuko mu ta̱ kenu adama a ɗe . Kpam ma sa̱ ta̱ adama a aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri a ka yansa unyushi u cingi bawu a kpatalai a a̱sa̱ka̱i ukuna u ashinda̱ u le , n tsishankala , n ukuna u uwono .
47013001	Ma tuwa̱ ta̱ ara ɗe utuwa̱ u tatsu . Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ da , “ U ka̱na̱ ta̱ ama a re ko ama a tatsu a reve n ukuna u ɗa a ka̱na̱i vuma n u ɗa mayun ɗa . ”
47013002	An n doki n tuwa̱i ara ɗe utuwa̱ u ire , n rono ta̱ aza ɗa a ka yansa unyushi u cingi atsuvu . Gogo‑na dem an bawu ma̱ri evu n a̱ɗa̱ , ma doku ta̱ ma dana u ɗa : Aꞌayin a ɗa baci n doku n tuwa̱i ara ɗe , ko uza wa la a asuvu a mavura wa .
47013003	Ma wenike ɗa̱ ta̱ an mayun ɗa Kawauwi ka dansa a una̱ u va̱ . An wa yansa manyan ara ɗe , u yansa ma bawu ucira wa , shegai wa̱ ta̱ n ucira .
47013004	Mayun ɗa u rongoi bawu ucira aꞌayin a ɗa a wandamgbana yi , shegai gogo‑na n ucira u Kashila̱ u ɗa wa rongo . A̱tsu dem tsa̱ n ucira wa , tyoku ɗa Kawauwi ka rongoi a mawandamgbani . Shegai ya wene ta̱ an tsa tuwa̱ tsu rongo n ucira u Kashila̱ , tyoku ɗa Kawauwi ka rongo .
47013005	Vecei kaci ka ɗe mai , i kondo kaci ka ɗe i wene ko iꞌa̱ pini uka̱ni n iꞌya i wushuki vi . I lya baci ukondo vi , ya reve ta̱ an Yesu Kawauwi wa̱ri a asuvu a ɗe . I reve baci an Yesu wa̱ri a asuvu a ɗe wa , i rukpa̱ ɗe ukondo vi .
47013006	Ma zuwa ta̱ uma i wene an bawu a̱tsu tsu rukpa̱i ukondo vi .
47013007	Tsu yan ta̱ kavasu ubana a asu u Kashila̱ kotsu i yain ili i cingi wa . Yan ɗa tsa yan kavasu nala tsa̱ra̱ ama a wene an tsa̱ri mai wa , shegai tsa̱ra̱ u zuwa ɗa̱ i yain ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri mai , ko u woko baci yavu a̱tsu tsu rukpa̱ ukondo vi .
47013008	Ili iꞌya koshi tsa yan iꞌya , iꞌya ya zuwa tsu tsu tutsuku ukuna u maci kelime . Tsa yan ili iꞌya ya ka̱ngu u ɗa wa .
47013009	Ko an u wokoi bawu tsa̱ri n ucira , tsa̱ ta̱ n maza̱nga̱ an eɗa̱ iꞌa̱ri n ucira . Tsu yan ta̱ kavasu adama a ɗa ya lapula i woko mai .
47013010	Koronku ɗa ma koronku ɗa̱ ili i na yi kahu n rawa la . Yan ɗa n yain nala tsa̱ra̱ n tuwa̱ baci , ili iꞌa̱ la iꞌya ya zuwa mu n ɓarana ɗa̱ n ucira wa ma dansa baci n a̱ɗa̱ n ucira u ɗa Asheku a na̱ka̱ mu . U na̱ka̱ mu ucira vi adama a ɗa ma varangu ɗa̱ wa , shegai adama a ɗa ma ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ .
47013011	Gogo‑na ama a va̱ , ma kotso ɗe ukanikorongi u na vi . N tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ : Yanyi maza̱nga̱ ! Savaɗai ahali a ɗe . Kiranai n iꞌya n tonuko ɗa̱ . Rongoi n katakasuvu ka te n ko ya wa . I rongo kaɓolo na̱ ndishi n shinga . Pini nala , Kashila̱ ka uciga n ka ndishi n shinga ka rongo ta̱ n a̱ɗa̱ .
47013012	Damamgbana̱sai a asuvu a uciga u Atoni .
47013013	Gba̱ Atoni a ɗa aꞌa̱ri pini na a ka sukunku ɗa̱ ta̱ idyani i le .
47013014	A̱sa̱ka̱ ukuna u shinga u Yesu Kawauwi Asheku , n uciga u Kashila̱ , na̱ ndishi n kaɓolo n Kulu Keri a rongo n a̱ɗa̱ gba̱ .
48001001	Mpa Bulus uza ɗa u korongi ukanikorongi u na ubana a asu u aꞌuwa a Atoni a ɗa aꞌa̱ri a kaɓon ka Galatiya . Mpa kasuki ka . Ama ɗa a ɗanga̱sa mu wa , u wuta̱ tani a asu u vuma wa . Yesu Kirisiti Kawauwi ɗa u ɗanga̱sa mu n kaci ka ne . U yan ta̱ nala kaɓolo n Kashila̱ Tata uza ɗa u ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ yi a ukpa̱ . Gba̱ ama a tsunu pini na a ɓolomgbono ta̱ na̱ mpa a asu u usuku idyani i na yi . Mpa Bulus uza ɗa u korongi ukanikorongi u na ubana a asu u aꞌuwa a Atoni a ɗa aꞌa̱ri a kaɓon ka Galatiya . Mpa kasuki ka . Ama ɗa a ɗanga̱sa mu wa , u wuta̱ tani a asu u vuma wa . Yesu Kirisiti Kawauwi ɗa u ɗanga̱sa mu n kaci ka ne . U yan ta̱ nala kaɓolo n Kashila̱ Tata uza ɗa u ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ yi a ukpa̱ . Gba̱ ama a tsunu pini na a ɓolomgbono ta̱ na̱ mpa a asu u usuku idyani i na yi .
48001002	
48001003	A̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ Tata u tsunu n Asheku Yesu Kawauwi a na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ukuna u shinga na̱ ndishi n shinga .
48001004	Kawauwi ka kuwa̱ ta̱ adama a unyushi u cingi u tsunu , dere tyoku ɗa Kashila̱ Tata u tsunu u foɓusoi , tsa̱ra̱ u wutukpa̱ tsu a likimba u tsicingi u na a asu u ɗa tsa̱ri gogo‑na .
48001005	Ɗa i zuwai gba̱ tsupige tsu Kashila̱ tsa , gba̱ aꞌayin hal ubana bawu utyoku . Ami .
48001006	N yan ta̱ majiyan cika an i lazai i kpatala̱kai Kashila̱ kucina̱ . U ɗanga̱sa ɗa̱ ta̱ adama a tsishinga tsu Kawauwi . Shegai gogo‑na ya tono ɗe akani a roku kau .
48001007	Mayun ɗa akani a roku aꞌa̱ la wa , she Kadyanshi ka Shinga , shegai ama roku a ɗa pini a ka damgbara̱sa ɗa̱ . A ka ciga ta̱ a savaɗa Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka Kawauwi ka woko ili i roku ɗe kau .
48001008	A̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ ka yanka uza ɗa baci dem wa yan kuɓari ku ili i roku kau n akani a tsunu utuwa̱ ara ɗe una̱ u cingi ! A̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ ka yain nala , ko a̱tsu n kaci ka tsunu ka baci tsa̱ri n akani a roku kau , ko katsumate ka zuba ka baci ka tuwa̱i n akani a roku kau .
48001009	N dana ta̱ u ɗa , kpam ma doku ta̱ ma dana : Uza roku u yan baci kuɓari ku kadyanshi ka Kashila̱ kau n ka i gita̱i i wushai , a̱sa̱ka̱ una̱ u cingi u Kashila̱ u rukpa̱ a kaci ka vuma u nala vi .
48001010	Ama ɗa ma ciga n zuwa a pana kayanyan wa . Kashila̱ ka ma ciga n zuwa u pana kayanyan . Ya wundya ama ɗa ma ciga n zuwa a cigi mu ? Nala baci ma̱ri ma yansa , ma woko kagbashi ka Kawauwi wa .
48001011	Ama a va̱ , ma ciga ta̱ i reve an Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka n yanka ɗa̱ kuɓari ki ka ama a yain ka wa .
48001012	N tsa̱ ka a asu u uza wa . Uza wa̱ la u wenishike mu ka wa . Yesu Kawauwi ɗa u wenishike mu uwenishike u na vi .
48001013	I reve ta̱ tyoku ɗa ma̱ri n rongoi an ma tono ure u aza a Yahuda . N zuwa ta̱ Atoni a Kashila̱ a panai ikyamba , kpam ma ciga n wacinsa le .
48001014	Aza a Yahuda a ɗa pini aza ɗa tsa̱ri usaun u te , shegai n la ta̱ aza roku ushani a utono mele ma nkoshi n cau n tsunu . Ma̱ri n ma̱tsa̱ ta̱ uciga n yain nala .
48001015	Shegai tun kahu a matsa mu , Kashila̱ ka ɗanga̱sa mu ta̱ . U yan ta̱ nala adama a tsishinga tsu ne .
48001016	Aku aꞌayin a tuwa̱i a ɗa u wenike mu Maku ma ne , tsa̱ra̱ n yain kadyanshi ka ne a asu u Awulawa . Aꞌayin a nala yi , n folo uza u na̱ka̱ mu adooki wa .
48001017	N bana a Urishelima n cina aza ɗa a gita̱i a wokoi asuki kahu mpa n woko kasuki wa . Ili iꞌya n yain iꞌya n banai a Arabi n dusuki ve ɗe . Aku n gonoi a Damasuka .
48001018	An ayen a tatsu a wurai , aku n banai a Urishelima tsa̱ra̱ n kondo Bituru , kpam n rongo ta̱ pini aꞌayin kupa n a tawun .
48001019	N wene ta̱ dem Yakubu , vangu u Asheku , shegai aꞌayin a nala yi n wene asuki a ɗa a buwai vi wa .
48001020	N tsina ta̱ a kapala ka Kashila̱ , kaɓan ka mu wa .
48001021	An a yain aꞌayin kenu , aku n yain nwalu ubana a uɓongu u Suriya n uɓongu u Kilikiya dem .
48001022	Aꞌayin a nala yi , Atoni a kaɓon ka Yahuda kotsu a reve mu wa .
48001023	Kadyanshi ka a ka dansa a kaci ka va̱ ka a panai koshi ama a ka dansa , a da , “ Vuma ɗa wa̱ri wa yansa tsu mavura ɗa gai na vi , kpam wa ciga u wacinsa Atoni . Shegai gogo‑na aya wa tonusuko ama a toni akani yi . ”
48001024	Aku a cikpalai Kashila̱ adama a va̱ .
48002001	An ayen kupa n a nishi a wurai , aku n doki n gonoi a Urishelima , Bara̱naba n Taitu a tono mu ta̱ .
48002002	N yan ta̱ nala kpaci Kashila̱ ka wenike mu ta̱ kuwene , u tonuko mu n gono ɗe . Mpa ɗe , n dansa ta̱ n azapige a Atoni utyoku u le . Ma ciga ta̱ n zuwa le a reve akani a ɗa ma̱ri utonusuko Awulawa . Ma ciga ta̱ a kondo manyan ma va̱ ko ma̱ dere . Ma̱ baci dere wa , manyan ma va̱ ma woko ta̱ ma gbani .
48002003	Kpam an a panai ili iꞌya n tonuko le , a wushuku ta̱ . A ma̱tsa̱ gba̱m Taitu uza ɗa soku mu vi u ba u kiɗa kacombi wa , ko an u wokoi Kawulawa ka .
48002004	Atoni a kaɓan a roku a uwa ta̱ a asuvu a tsunu ukpawunsi . A tuwa̱ ta̱ tyoku u aza a kakyawunsa tsa̱ra̱ a reve utsa̱ra̱ u kaci u ɗa Yesu Kawauwi u na̱ka̱ tsu . A ka ciga a gonuko tsu agbashi . Ama a nala yi a zuwa ta̱ tsu dansa ukuna u ukiɗa u kacombi .
48002005	Shegai tsu ꞌyuwain , tsu pana̱ka le wa , ko kenu . Tsa ciga ta̱ ukuna u maci u Kadyanshi ka Shinga u rongo n a̱ɗa̱ .
48002006	( Aza ɗa ama a bidyai ele ili i roku iꞌya , ko ndya baci aꞌa̱ri , ili i te iꞌya ara va̱ , kpaci Kashila̱ ka̱ n kuɗyangi wa . ) Adama a nala a fuɗa a savaɗa Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka n yain kuɓari wa .
48002007	A wene ta̱ Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ mu ta̱ manyan ma uyan kuɓari ku Kadyanshi ka Shinga a asu u Awulawa , dere tyoku ɗa u na̱ka̱i Bituru manyan a asu u aza a Yahuda .
48002008	Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ta̱ Bituru ucira u uyan manyan ma kasuki a asu u aza a Yahuda . Nala dem u na̱ka̱ mu ucira u uyan manyan ma kasuki a asu u Awulawa .
48002009	Yakubu , n Bituru , n Yahaya ( aza ɗa ama a revei aꞌa̱ri n kalen cika ) a wene ta̱ Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ mu ta̱ kune ku pige ku nala ki , kpam a wushai Bara̱naba na̱ mpa tyoku u ayain a manyan kaɓolo n ele . A gbamatangu tsu asuvu tsu lyai kapala n uyan kuɓari a asu u Awulawa , nala kpam ele dem a ka lya kapala n manyan ma le a asu u aza a Yahuda .
48002010	Ili iꞌya a tonuko tsu tsu yain iꞌya tsu ciɓa n aza a unambi , kpam ili iꞌya ma̱ri n ma̱tsa̱i uyansa iꞌya la vi !
48002011	Kain ka te , an Bituru tuwa̱i a Antakiya , n ɓongo yi ta̱ a kapala ka Atoni kpaci u yansa ta̱ ili iꞌya bawu i gain .
48002012	Ili iꞌya i gita̱i iꞌya na : An u gita̱i u rawai , u lyasa ta̱ kaɓolo n Awulawa a ɗa aꞌa̱ri Atoni . Aku Yakubu suki Atoni a ɗa aꞌa̱ri aza a Yahuda a roku a Antakiya . An a rawai , Bituru doku u lya kpam ilikulya kaɓolo n ele wa , kpaci wa pana ta̱ uwonvo u ili iꞌya ama a nala yi a ka dana a kaci ka ne .
48002013	Nala dem atoku a ne Atoni aza a Yahuda a tono yi n uyansa ili i maci i kaɓan , hal gba̱m n Bara̱naba tono le dem n uyansa ili iꞌya bawu i gain i na yi .
48002014	An n wenei a ka tono kpam ukuna u mayun u Kadyanshi ka Shinga wa , aku n dansai n Bituru a kapala ka le gba̱ . N danai , “ Bituru , avu uza u Yahuda u ɗa , shegai vu yain tyoku u Kawulawa , tyoku u uza u Yahuda wa . Nala baci , niɗa va ciga vu zuwa Awulawa a toni Mele ma aza a Yahuda ?
48002015	“ Mpa n avu aza a Yahuda a ɗa a ilimaci , shegai aza a unyushi u cingi tyoku u Awulawa wa .
48002016	Shegai gba̱ n nala , tsu reve ta̱ tsu woko ta̱ dere a kapala ka Kashila̱ a asu u upityanangu n Yesu Kawauwi , shegai a asu u uyansa ili iꞌya Mele ma danai wa , kpaci uza wa̱ la wa woko dere a kapala ka Kashila̱ a asu u utono Mele wa . Adama a nala tsu wushuku ta̱ n Yesu Kawauwi , tsa̱ra̱ Kashila̱ ka gonuko tsu tsu woko dere adama a upityanangu n Kawauwi .
48002017	“ Aza roku a bidya baci a̱tsu aza a unyushi u cingi a ɗa adama a ɗa tsu pityanangi n Kawauwi tsa̱ra̱ u gonuko tsu tsu woko dere a kapala ka Kashila̱ , nala u wenike an Kawauwi ka zuwa tsu tsu yain unyushi u cingi an bawu tsu tonoi mele ma roku ɗa ? Aꞌa , nala wa̱ri wa !
48002018	Shegai n gono baci n tonoi Mele ma n ꞌyuwain vi , ma nusuka ta̱ Kashila̱ mayun .
48002019	N tono ta̱ Mele kpam a asu u utono Mele vi u ɗa n kuwa̱i , kpam nala zuwa mu ta̱ n rongo n Kashila̱ .
48002020	A wandamgbana mu ta̱ kaɓolo n Kawauwi . Gogo‑na mpa kpam ma̱ri n uma wa , Kawauwi ka ka̱ri n uma a asuvu a va̱ . Aꞌayin a ɗa ma̱ri a ikyamba pini na a likimba n wushuku ta̱ n Maku ma Kashila̱ . U ciga mu ta̱ kpam u nekei kaci ka ne u kuwa̱i tsa̱ra̱ n yain uma .
48002021	Ma̱ a asuvu a ama ɗa a ꞌyuwain ukuna u shinga u Kashila̱ wa . Kashila̱ ka wusha tsu baci a asu u Mele , ukpa̱ u Kawauwi gbani ɗa la vi . ”
48003001	Eɗa̱ atengeshi aza a Galatiya ! Ya la̱pa̱na̱sa̱ ɗa̱ n ada̱bu a ne ? N wenike ɗa̱ ta̱ karara ili iꞌya i zuwai Yesu Kawauwi kuwa̱i a mawandamgbani .
48003002	Ma yan ɗa̱ ta̱ keci ku te : I wusha Kulu Keri a asu u utono Mele ɗa ? Aꞌa , nala wa ! Kulu Keri ku cipa̱ ɗa̱ ta̱ adama a ɗa i wushuki n akani a ɗa i panai ukuna u Kawauwi .
48003003	Iꞌa̱ n ugboji wa ɗa ? Iꞌa̱ri i gita̱ ta̱ urongo n Kawauwi a Kulu Keri , shegai gogo‑na ya ciga ta̱ i koruso n ucira u kaci u ɗe .
48003004	I pana ta̱ ikyamba cika adama a Kadyanshi ka Shinga . Ma ciga u ɗa u woko u gbani wa .
48003005	An Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ Kulu ku ne kpam aꞌayin a ɗa u yansai ikunesavu i ne a asuvu a ɗe , u yan nala adama a ɗa ya tono Mele ma Musa ɗa ? Nala wa ! U yan ta̱ nala adama a ɗa i wushuki n akani a Kawauwi a ɗa i panai .
48003006	Ili iꞌya Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u danai iꞌya na : “ Ibirahi pityanangu ta̱ n Magono ma Zuba , adama a nala a ɗa Kashila̱ ka gonuko yi u woko vuma u maci a kukere ku ne . ”
48003007	Nala u wenike ta̱ mmuku ma Ibirahi n maci alya aza ɗa a pityanangi n Kashila̱ .
48003008	Caupa , Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , Kashila̱ ka gonuko ta̱ Awulawa a woko dere adama a upityanangu u le . Kashila̱ ka zuwamgbana̱ka ta̱ Ibirahi caupa , an u danai , “ Gba̱ ama a likimba , Kashila̱ ka yanka le ta̱ una̱ u shinga adama a vunu . ”
48003009	Nala u wenike ta̱ la vi uza ɗa baci dem wa̱ri n upityanangu , wa tsa̱ra̱ ta̱ kapashi ka ne a una̱ u shinga u ɗa a zuwukai Ibirahi adama a upityanangu u ne .
48003010	Uza ɗa baci dem wa yawunsa yavu utono u Mele wa zuwa yi u woko mai n Kashila̱ , wa wusha ta̱ una̱ u cingi u Kashila̱ . Kpaci Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , “ Uza ɗa baci dem bawu wa tono gba̱ ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri a asuvu a Tagara̱da u Mele , wa wusha ta̱ una̱ u cingi u Kashila̱ . ”
48003011	Wa wuyana uwene an uza wa̱ la wa woko dere a kapala ka Kashila̱ a asu u utono Mele wa , kpaci Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , “ Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ta̱ uma a asu u uza ɗa wa̱ri n upityanangu . ”
48003012	Ili iꞌa̱ la i gawain utono u Mele n upityanangu wa , kpaci Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , “ Uza ɗa baci u wushuki n Mele , u ka̱na̱ ta̱ u yansa tyoku ɗa ma danai . ”
48003013	Shegai Kawauwi ka wutukpa̱ tsu ta̱ a asuvu a una̱ u cingi u ɗa Mele mi ma yain . An a wandamgbana yi , u wusha ta̱ una̱ u cingi u ɗa wa̱ri u gain u tuwa̱ ara tsunu . Kpaci Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , “ Kashila̱ ka yanka ta̱ uza ɗa baci dem a wandamgbanai a maɗanga una̱ u cingi . ”
48003014	Adama a ɗa Yesu Kawauwi yain nala , Kashila̱ ka zuwuka ta̱ Awulawa una̱ u shinga tyoku ɗa u yankai Ibirahi kazuwamgbani , nala kpam dem a̱tsu Atoni tsu wushai Kulu Keri ka Kashila̱ ka yain kazuwamgbani adama a upityanangu .
48003015	Ama a va̱ , a̱sa̱ka̱ n wenike ɗa̱ tyoku ɗa tsa rongo : Ama a yan baci kazuwamgbani tyoku ɗa u gain , uza wa̱ la wa cimbusa̱ ko u savaɗa ka wa . Ili i te iꞌya n kazuwamgbani ka Kashila̱ ka na .
48003016	Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ kazuwamgbani ka na ki ara Ibirahi n a asu u kumaci ku ne . U yan ka a asu u amaci ushani wa , shegai a asu u ku te , kpam ka Kawauwi .
48003017	Ili iꞌya ma dansa̱ka iꞌya na : Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ kazuwamgbani n Ibirahi kpam u zuwamgbanai wa shamkpa ka . An ayen amangatawanishi n kamankupa ( 430 ) a wurai , aku u na̱ka̱i Mele . Mele ma nala mi ma savaɗa kazuwamgbani ki wa . U yan baci nala , ma wacinsa ta̱ kazuwamgbani ka u yain n Ibirahi .
48003018	Mele mi ma na̱ka̱ tsu baci una̱ u shinga u ɗa Kashila̱ ka zuwamgbana̱kai Ibirahi , ma wura ta̱ la vi kazuwamgbani ki . Shegai ma yan nala wa , kpaci Kashila̱ ka zuwuka ta̱ Ibirahi una̱ u shinga gbani a asu u kazuwamgbani ka u yain .
48003019	Ndya i zuwai Kashila̱ ka yain Mele ? U yan ta̱ ma kpaci ama a ka yansa ta̱ unyushi u cingi . U yan ta̱ Mele hal uza ɗa u danai wa tuwa̱ vi u tuwa̱ . U zuwa ta̱ atsumate a zuba a na̱ka̱ Musa Mele ma ne , aku Musa na̱ka̱i aza a Isaraꞌila . Nala Musa wokoi kaꞌuwi ka mere .
48003020	Kaꞌuwi ka mere ki u tsu dansa ta̱ n aɓon a re gba̱ , shegai Kashila̱ aya u yain kazuwamgbani ka nala ki utyoku u ne .
48003021	Kashila̱ ka kpa̱ɗa̱ la vi ushamkpa kazuwamgbani ka ne an u na̱ka̱i Mele mi ? Nala wa , ko kenu ! A ka tsa̱ra̱ baci uma u ɗa bawu wa̱ri n utyoku a asu u Mele , aꞌa̱ri a ka woko ta̱ mai n Kashila̱ a asu u utono Mele mi .
48003022	Shegai Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u tonuko tsu ta̱ unyushi u cingi u sira ta̱ ya dem , kpaci u kpa̱ɗa̱ ta̱ utono u Mele . Adama a nala , ure u ɗa Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ uza ili iꞌya u zuwamgbanai u ɗa uza u pityanangu baci n Yesu Kawauwi .
48003023	Mele mi ma ma gbagirya tsu yavu aza a kuwa ku aꞌali , hal ubana aꞌayin a ɗa tsa tsa̱ra̱ upityanangu .
48003024	Mele mi ma ma̱ri uzapige u tsunu , hal utuwa̱ u Kawauwi . Kpam an Kawauwi ki ka tuwa̱i u gonuko tsu ta̱ tsu wokoi dere a kapala ka Kashila̱ an tsu wushuki n eyi .
48003025	Gogo‑na an tsu pityanangi n eyi , Mele ma lya kpam tsugono tsu tsunu wa .
48003026	Eɗa̱ mmuku n Kashila̱ n ɗa gba̱ ɗe adama a ɗa i pityanangi n Yesu Kawauwi .
48003027	Kpam an a lyuɓugu ɗa̱ , dere ɗa wa̱ri yavu Kawauwi ka i ukai tyoku ɗa i tsu uka aminya .
48003028	Upityanangu n Yesu Kawauwi u ɗa u gonukoi ya dem una̱ u te n utoku u ne : ko avu uza u Yahuda ɗa baci ko Kawulawa , kagbashi ko uza ɗa bawu wa̱ri kagbashi , vali ko uka , ya dem una̱ u te ɗa n utoku u ne .
48003029	Adama a nala , avu uza Kawauwi ɗa baci , gogo‑na a kaɓon ka kumaci ka Ibirahi ka va̱ri , kpam a ka na̱ka̱ vu ta̱ agadu a ɗa Kashila̱ ka zuwamgbanai .
48004001	Ma wenike ɗa̱ ta̱ iryoci : maku ma kenu ma baci tata u ne u kuwa̱i wa tono n utsa̱ri u ɗa tata u ne u da wa woko u ne vi wa . Wa̱ ta̱ tyoku u kagbashi ko an u wokoi aya n utsa̱ri vi gba̱ .
48004002	Ama ɗa a ka kirana n eyi n utsa̱ri vi alya a ka tono n ili gba̱ , hal she maku mi ma gbonguro u rawa tyoku ɗa tata vi danai .
48004003	Nala dem wa̱ri n a̱tsu . Tyoku u mmuku u ɗa tsa̱ri , kpam ucira kau‑kau u likimba u na wa lya ta̱ tsugono a kaci ka tsunu .
48004004	Shegai an aꞌayin a yain derere , aku Kashila̱ ka suki Maku ma ne , kpam uka u ɗa u matsa yi . U tono ta̱ Mele mi ,
48004005	tsa̱ra̱ u wutukpa̱ tsu a asuvu a Mele mi , kpam tsa̱ra̱ tsu woko mmuku n Kashila̱ .
48004006	An u wokoi eɗa̱ mmuku n Kashila̱ n ɗa , u suku ta̱ Kulu ku Maku ma ne a atakasuvu a ɗe , kpam Kulu ki ku isa̱i , “ Tata , Tata u va̱ . ”
48004007	Adama a nala gogo‑na avu kagbashi ka kpam wa ; maku ma Kashila̱ ma va̱ri , kpam gba̱ ili iꞌya wa̱ri n iꞌya adama a mmuku n ne , i vunu iꞌya dem .
48004008	Aꞌayin a ɗa bawu i revei Kashila̱ , iꞌa̱ri i woko ta̱ agbashi a ili i ameli , kpam ili i nala yi Kashila̱ ka wa , ko kenu .
48004009	Shegai gogo‑na an i revei Kashila̱ , ko kpam u gan ta̱ n dana an Kashila̱ ka reve ɗa̱ . Niɗa ya doku i gono i woko agbashi a ucira kau‑kau u likimba u na iꞌya bawu iꞌa̱ri n ucira , kpam bawu kalen ?
48004010	Hal gba̱m i tsu ciɓusa ta̱ aꞌayin a abiki a ameli , n iwoto i roku , n abiki a aꞌayin a manyan kau‑kau , n ayen a roku .
48004011	N pana ta̱ uwonvo , an aꞌayin a ɗa n yain manyan ara ɗe a woko ɗe a gbani .
48004012	Ama a va̱ , n folo ɗa̱ ta̱ i rongo n utsa̱ra̱ u kaci , tyoku ɗa ma rongo . Kpaci n woko ta̱ tyoku ɗa eɗa̱ Awulawa iꞌa̱ri ; wata , ma̱ ta̱ n utsa̱ra̱ u kaci a Mele . An n gita̱i n yanka ɗa̱ kuɓari , i nusuka mu wa .
48004013	I ciɓa ta̱ an bawu ma̱ri n alafiya aꞌayin a ɗa n gita̱i n tuko ɗa̱ Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka Kawauwi .
48004014	Ko an u wokoi maɓa̱la̱ ma va̱ ma zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ kadambula , gba̱ n nala i wenike mu magori wa kpam i ꞌyuwan mu wa . A una̱ u nala , i ryabusa mu yavu katsumate ka zuba ka Kashila̱ ka . I ryabusa mu yavu Yesu Kawauwi ɗa n kaci ka ne .
48004015	Mayun ma fuɗa ta̱ ma dana , a da baci ya fuɗa ya foɗo aꞌeshi a ɗe i na̱ka̱ mu iꞌa̱ri ya foɗo ta̱ . Shegai gogo‑na nte kpam kayanyan ka i panai adama a va̱ yi ?
48004016	N gono n woko utokulalu u ɗe ɗa , an n tonuko ɗa̱ ukuna u mayun vi ?
48004017	Awenishiki a kaɓan a nala yi a ka yansa ili i na adama a ukuna u shinga u ɗa ya tsa̱ra̱ wa . Ciga ɗa a ka ciga tsa̱ra̱ a lyai kaci ka ɗe i toni le . Ciga ɗa a ka ciga a peci ɗa̱ na̱ mpa tsa̱ra̱ i gonuko ugboji u ɗe ara le .
48004018	Gogo‑na u lobono ta̱ an ya ciga i yain ili i shinga , kpam u la ta̱ tsulobo an ya yansa nala aꞌayin a ɗa bawu ma̱ri n a̱ɗa̱ .
48004019	Shegai gba̱ n nala , mmuku n va̱ aza ɗa ma ciga , wa̱ ta̱ yavu mɓa̱la̱ ma ilimaci n ɗa ma pana adama a ɗe tyoku u caupa , mɓa̱la̱ mi kpam ma lya ta̱ kapala hal she ama a wene Kawauwi a asuvu a ɗe .
48004020	Aꞌa̱ri a dana gba̱m ma̱ pini la n a̱ɗa̱ gogo‑na , tsa̱ra̱ ma̱ri n dansa n a̱ɗa̱ ben . Shegai gogo‑na n dambula ta̱ adama a ukuna u na vi .
48004021	Aza roku a ɗe hal n ara a ka ciga ta̱ a woko a kere ka Mele . Tonuko numu , i reve ili iꞌya Mele mi ma danai ɗa ?
48004022	Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u dana ta̱ , Ibirahi wa̱ ta̱ na̱ mmuku ma aꞌali n re . Mma u uza u te kagbashi ka , mma u uza u ire kpam kagbashi ka wa .
48004023	Maku ma kagbashi mi , a matsa yi ta̱ tyoku ɗa a cuwana̱kai a tsu matsa . Shegai uza ɗa bawu wa̱ri kagbashi ki u matsa ta̱ adama a kazuwamgbani ka Kashila̱ ka yain n Ibirahi .
48004024	Gba̱ ili i na yi ya wenishike ta̱ ili i roku : Aka a re yi aꞌa̱ ta̱ tyoku u kazuwamgbani ka re a mere ma Kashila̱ n ama a ne . Kazuwamgbani ka te ka Mele ma Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱i Musa a Masasa ma Sinai , kpam ama ɗa a tonoi kazuwamgbani ki aꞌa̱ ta̱ tyoku u agbashi . Mma ɗa a tsu isa̱ Hajara kagbashi ki wa̱ ta̱ tyoku u kazuwamgbani ka nala ki .
48004025	Aya iryoci i Masasa ma Sinai a Arabi . Kpam gogo‑na ilyuci i Urishelima iꞌa̱ ta̱ tyoku u Masasa ma Sinai , kpaci ilyuci yi n ama a ne ndishi n tsugbashi n ɗa a ka yan a asuvu a Mele .
48004026	Shegai Saratu , uza ɗa bawu wa̱ri kagbashi , aya iryoci i Urishelima u zuba . Kpam aya mma u tsunu .
48004027	Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u yan ta̱ kadyanshi a kaci ka ne , “ Za̱nga̱na̱ , avu madari ma uka ! Avu uza ɗa bawu kotsu vu panai mɓa̱la̱ ma ilimaci , gita̱ ishipa vu yain ikeni adama a ipeli . Kpaci mmuku n madari n la ɗe mmuku ma uka u ɗa wa̱ri n vali kakuma̱ . ”
48004028	Ama a va̱ , eɗa̱ mmuku n Kashila̱ n ɗa adama a kazuwamgbani ka ne , tyoku ɗa Ishaku wa̱ri .
48004029	Aꞌayin a nala yi , Ismaꞌilu , uza ɗa a matsai tyoku ɗa a cuwana̱kai , u foroi Ishaku , uza ɗa a matsai adama a Kulu ku Kashila̱ . Nala dem wa̱ri gogo‑na .
48004030	Shegai ndya Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u danai a ukuna u nala ? U dana ta̱ , “ Lokoi kagbashi ka ka̱ri uka vi n maku ma ne dem . Maku ma kagbashi ka ka̱ri uka vi kotsu u wushi kaɓon ka agadu a tata u ne wa . Maku ma uka u ɗa bawu wa̱ri kagbashi aya wa wusha a ɗa gba̱ . ”
48004031	Ama a va̱ , a̱tsa mmuku ma uka ɗa bawu wa̱ri kagbashi ki , shegai ma kagbashi ka ka̱ri uka wa .
48005001	Tsa̱ ta̱ n utsa̱ra̱ u kaci gogo‑na , kpaci Kawauwi ka gonuko tsu ta̱ tsu wokoi yaa . Adama a nala , shamgbai n ucira . Kotsu i savaɗa i woko agbashi a Mele kpam wa .
48005002	Panai ! Mpa Bulus , mpa ma tonuko ɗa̱ ukuna u na vi : I a̱sa̱ka̱ le baci a kiɗa ɗa̱ acombi , u woko ta̱ la vi Kawauwi ka̱ kpam n kalen ara ɗe wa , ko kenu .
48005003	N tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ n ucira , uza ɗa baci dem a kiɗai kacombi , u ka̱na̱ ta̱ u toni Mele mi gba̱ .
48005004	Kpam vu ma̱tsa̱ baci vu zuwa Kashila̱ ka gonuko vu vu woko dere a asu u utono u Mele mi , vu kasa ɗe la vi kaci ka vunu asu u Kawauwi kpam vu ꞌyuwan ɗe la vi uwusha tsishinga tsu Kashila̱ .
48005005	Kulu ku zuwa tsu ta̱ tsu reve an mayun ɗa Kashila̱ ka wusha tsu tyoku u aza a maci adama a ɗa tsu wushuki n Kawauwi .
48005006	Avu Katoni ka Yesu Kawauwi ka baci , ko a kiɗa vu kacombi ko bawu a kiɗai u lamgbana wa . Shegai ili iꞌya i lai kalen iꞌya , upityanangu u ɗe u zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ ya ciga ama .
48005007	Tyoku ɗa iꞌa̱ri ya tono Kawauwi wa̱ri ta̱ dere , hal ubana aꞌayin a ɗa uza roku u zuwa ɗa̱ i kpatala̱kai ukuna u mayun .
48005008	Kpam mayun ɗa , vuma nala vi uza u Kashila̱ u ɗa wa , uza ɗa ɗanga̱sa ɗa̱ vi .
48005009	Maku ma yisti ma zuwa ta̱ iburodi ushani i shita . Wata , maku ma uwenishike u kaɓan ma ra̱tsa ta̱ ma yinsa̱ ama ushani .
48005010	Shegai n pityanangu ta̱ n Asheku , ya wushuku n awenishiki a kaɓan a nala yi wa , shegai ya tono ta̱ ili iꞌya n danai . Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ uza ɗa vurusa̱ ɗa̱ aꞌene mavura , ko ya tani baci wa̱ri .
48005011	Ama a va̱ , n lya baci kapala n kuɓari u ka̱na̱ ta̱ ama a kiɗa acombi , ndya i zuwai aza a Isaraꞌila a ka zuwusa mu upana u ikyamba maco ? A da baci kuɓari ki ka ma yansa , a una̱ u ɗa ma yan kuɓari ku ukpa̱ u Kawauwi , ma̱ri ma nususuka le wa .
48005012	Aꞌa̱ri a dana gba̱m aza ɗa a ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱sa̱ ɗa̱ atakasuvu a ukuna u ukiɗa u acombi vi , acombi a de a ɗa a kiɗai wa , aꞌa̱ri a wutukpusa̱ dem asanda a le .
48005013	Ama a va̱ , Kashila̱ ka isa̱ ɗa̱ ta̱ tsa̱ra̱ i woko yaa ! Shegai kotsu i a̱sa̱ka̱ utsa̱ra̱ u kaci u nala u woko ɗa̱ kabala ka utono uciga u unyushi u cingi u ɗe wa . A una̱ u nala , cigamgbanai kpam i gbashika atoku .
48005014	Mele mi gba̱ una̱ u te u ɗa n udani u na vi : “ Ciga uza u karen u vunu tyoku ɗa va ciga kaci ka vunu . ”
48005015	Kotsu i kirana , kawa i lya baci kapala n usukuta̱ atoku , ya wacinsa ta̱ kaci ka ɗe gba̱ .
48005016	Adama a nala n tonuko ɗa̱ : a̱sa̱ka̱i Kulu ku toni n a̱ɗa̱ , kotsu i toni maluwa ma ukuna u cingi u ɗe wa .
48005017	Kulu ki n uciga u ili i kaci i ɗe atokulalu a ɗa . A tsu rongo ta̱ kushulu maco , adama a nala ya yan ili iꞌya ya ciga i yain wa .
48005018	Shegai Kulu ka tono baci n a̱ɗa̱ , Mele ma lya tsugono a kaci ka ɗe wa .
48005019	Ya dem reve ta̱ ili iꞌya uciga u unyushi u cingi wa̱ri : U tsu zuwa ta̱ tsishankala , u tsu zuwa ta̱ uyansa ili i uwono , u tsu zuwa ta̱ kpam uyawunsa a kaci ka tsishankala .
48005020	Uciga u uyan unyushi u cingi u tsu zuwa ta̱ dem ugbashika ameli . U tsu zuwa ta̱ tsukunu . Uciga u uyan unyushi u cingi u tsu zuwa ta̱ dem makovugo . U tsu zuwa ta̱ ama a shila̱ka̱na̱sa̱ . U tsu zuwa ta̱ a yamgbana malyon . U tsu zuwa ta̱ uyansa u upan . U tsu zuwa ta̱ uciga u kaci . Uciga u uyan unyushi u cingi u tsu zuwa ta̱ kpam upece a asu u ama . U tsu zuwa ta̱ ama a pecene aɓolo aɓolo .
48005021	Uciga u uyan unyushi u cingi u tsu zuwa ta̱ uciga u ili i ama . U tsu zuwa ta̱ ama kuso hal she ma maka le . U tsu zuwa ta̱ ama a bansa a asu u abiki a ɗa bawu ama a tsu ka̱na̱ kaci ka le . Kpam u tsu zuwa ta̱ uyansa ili i cingi i roku icun kau‑kau . Ma̱ri n rono ɗa̱ ta̱ atsuvu caupa , kpam ma doku ta̱ ma rono ɗa̱ atsuvu : aza ɗa a ka yansa ili i na yi a ka wusha una̱ u shinga u tsugono tsu Kashila̱ wa .
48005022	Shegai Kulu ku Kashila̱ ka tono baci n a̱tsu , ku tsu na̱ka̱ ta̱ ilimaci i na : Ku tsu tuko ta̱ macigamgbani . Ku tsu tuko ta̱ ipeli . Ku tsu tuko ta̱ ndishi n shinga . Ku tsu tuko ta̱ kpam ahankuri . Kulu ku Kashila̱ ku tsu tuko ta̱ maɓa̱nga̱mgba̱ni . Ku tsu tuko ta̱ uyansa ukuna u shinga . Ku tsu zuwa ta̱ ama a woko aza ɗa a ka wushuku n ele .
48005023	Ku tsu zuwa ta̱ ama a woko n uvakunku u kaci , n uka̱na̱ u kaci . Mele ma̱ la ma ma danai ili i na yi i kpa̱ɗa̱ ulobono wa .
48005024	Aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri aza a Yesu Kawauwi , a a̱sa̱ka̱ ɗe ure u unyushi u cingi u le n u uyawunsa n uciga u ukuna u cingi .
48005025	Adama a ɗa Kulu ku na̱ka̱ tsu uma u savu , a̱sa̱ka̱ tsu yain ili iꞌya ku danai tsu yain .
48005026	Kotsu tsu yain ara̱ɗi , ko tsu ragi atoku , ko kpam tsu yamgbana malyon wa .
48006001	Ama a va̱ , uza roku a asuvu a ɗe wa yansa baci unyushi u cingi , eɗa̱ aza ɗa iꞌa̱ri n ucira a asuvu a Kulu i gonuko vuma nala vi a ure u shinga . Shegai i yain u ɗa ben . Kotsu i kirana , tsa̱ra̱ eɗa̱ dem i cigi i yain icun i ili i cingi i nala yi wa .
48006002	Ɓa̱nga̱i atoku aꞌayin a ɗa baci aꞌa̱ri n ucanga u ara̱ji . I yan baci nala , ya yan ɗe la vi ili iꞌya Kawauwi ka ciga ɗa̱ i yain .
48006003	Uza roku wa wundya baci eyi wa̱ri n kalen kpam nala tani wa̱ri wa , kaci ka ne ka koshi wa yinsa̱ .
48006004	A̱sa̱ka̱ ya dem weɓele nwalu n ne . Dere ɗa baci ma̱ri yi , u lapa makamba n manyan ma ne . Shegai kotsu u ra̱tsana̱ka manyan ma ne n ma ama wa .
48006005	U ka̱na̱ ta̱ ya dem u canga ucanga u ne .
48006006	Uza ɗa baci dem wa rotsongusu uwenishike u Kashila̱ , u peci gba̱ ili i shinga iꞌya wa̱ri n iꞌya n kawenishiki ka ne .
48006007	Kotsu i yinsa̱ kaci ka ɗe wa : kotsu i wene yavu ya fuɗa ya yanka Kashila̱ majari wa . Ama a tsu kapa ta̱ ili iꞌya a cei .
48006008	Uza ɗa baci u cei a asu u uyawunsa u cingi u uciga u kaci u ne , uyawunsa u cingi u ne wa zuwa yi ta̱ u kuwa̱ . Shegai uza u ce baci tsa̱ra̱ u zuwa Kulu ku pana kayanyan , ka na̱ka̱ yi ta̱ uma u ɗa bawu wa̱ri n utyoku .
48006009	Kotsu tsu wowo n uyan ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri i shinga wa , tsa ca ta̱ uma u ɗa bawu wa̱ri n utyoku aꞌayin a ɗa a gain , tsu a̱sa̱ka̱ baci wa .
48006010	Adama a nala , a̱sa̱ka̱ tsu yanka ya dem ili i shinga aꞌayin a ɗa baci tsa̱ri n kabala , hal gai aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri atoku a tsunu Atoni .
48006011	I wene ta̱ iɗyani i pige iꞌya n yain an n koronku ɗa̱ n kukere ku va̱ .
48006012	Aza ɗa a tsu ciga a zuwa aza a Yahuda a pana kayanyan , alya a ka ma̱tsa̱ ɗa̱ i kiɗa acombi . A ka pana ta̱ uwonvo u ɗa aza a Yahuda a ka zuwa le upana u ikyamba , mawandamgbani ma Kawauwi ma baci koshi a ka tono .
48006013	Aza ɗa a kiɗai acombi yi , ele kaci ka le a tono Mele mi wa , shegai a ciga ta̱ a kiɗa ɗa̱ acombi tsa̱ra̱ a yain ara̱ɗi adama a ili iꞌya a ma̱tsa̱ ɗa̱ i yain .
48006014	Mpa gai , ma ciga n yain ara̱ɗi a ili i roku wa , she ukpa̱ u Asheku a tsunu Yesu Kawauwi a mawandamgbani . Adama a mawandamgbani ma nala mi , n tsu yansa kpam ili tyoku ɗa aza a likimba u na a tsu yansa wa . Kpam a reve ko ndya i zuwai n tsu yansa nala wa .
48006015	Wa̱ri n kalen wa ko a kiɗa vu kacombi , ko bawu a kiɗa vu . Ili i kalen iꞌya vuma wushi uma u savu a asu u Kashila̱ .
48006016	Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ta̱ ndishi n shinga a asu u aza ɗa a tonoi akani a na , kpam wa zuwuka le ta̱ una̱ u shinga . Wata , ama a nala yi alya ama a maci a Kashila̱ .
48006017	Ili iꞌya i bidyai n gogo‑na , kotsu i a̱sa̱ka̱ ko uza u damgbara̱sa mu n ukuna u nala wa . Alani a ɗa ma̱ri n a ɗa a ikyamba i va̱ a rawa ta̱ a wenike an uza u Yesu u ɗa ma̱ri .
48006018	Ama a va̱ , a̱sa̱ka̱ ukuna u shinga u Asheku Yesu Kawauwi ka tsunu u rongo n a̱ɗa̱ gba̱ . Ami .
49001001	Mpa Bulus , uza ɗa wa korongu ukanikorongi u na vi . Kasuki ka Yesu Kirisiti Kawauwi ka ma̱ri , kpaci Kashila̱ ka ka cigai ka ɗanga̱sa mu n woko nala . Ama a uwulukpi a Kashila̱ a ɗa aꞌa̱ri a Afisu alya ma koronku , aza ɗa kain dem Yesu Kawauwi ɗa aꞌa̱ri a utono .
49001002	A̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ Tata u tsunu n Asheku Yesu Kawauwi a na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ukuna u shinga na̱ ndishi n shinga .
49001003	Tsu cikpalai Kashila̱ Tata u Asheku a tsunu Yesu Kawauwi . Aya u zuwuka tsu una̱ u shinga a asu u ɗa u na̱ka̱ tsu gba̱ ukuna u shinga u ɗa u wuta̱i a zuba , tsa̱ra̱ u ɓa̱nga̱ uma u tsunu a asuvu a kulu . U yan ta̱ nala an u ɓolomgbono tsu n Kawauwi .
49001004	Tun kahu Kashila̱ ka yain likimba , u ɗanga̱sa tsu ta̱ tsu woko ama a ne a asu u ɗa u ɓolomgbono tsu n Kawauwi . Yan ɗa u yain nala tsa̱ra̱ tsu rongo sarara bawu ili iꞌya i nangasai atakasuvu a tsunu a kapala ka ne . Kpam tsa̱ra̱ kotsu ili i roku i cingi i rongo a asuvu a tsunu iꞌya ya zuwa yi u ka̱na̱ tsu n unyushi wa .
49001005	Kpaci Kashila̱ ka ciga tsu ta̱ tun caupa , u yawunsa ta̱ u gonuko tsu mmuku n ne a asu u ili iꞌya Yesu Kawauwi yain . Kashila̱ ka pana ta̱ kayanyan an u yain nala , kpam nala dem wa ciga u yain iꞌya .
49001006	Adama a nala , tsu cikpala yi ta̱ an u yanka tsu ukuna u shinga u pige . Gbani ɗa u yanka tsu ukuna u shinga vi , a asuvu a Kawauwi uza ɗa wa ciga .
49001007	A asuvu a Kawauwi tsu woko ta̱ fa̱a̱ adama a mpasa ma ukpa̱ u ne , kpam ɗa gai i zuwai tsu tsa̱ra̱i ucimbusa̱ u unyushi u cingi vi . Nala Kashila̱ ka wenike tsu an ukuna u shinga u ne wa̱ri u pige ,
49001008	kpam u wenike tsu ta̱ u ɗa cika . Kpaci Kashila̱ ka̱ ta̱ n kakiri , kpam n ureve u ili ,
49001009	u yan ta̱ ili iꞌya wa ciga u yain . U wenike tsu ta̱ ili iꞌya u sokongi iꞌya u foɓusoi u yain a akere a Kawauwi .
49001010	Aꞌayin a yan baci , afoɓi a ne a ɗa u ɓolomgbono ko ndya wa a zuba n likimba kaɓolo n magono ma te mi ; wata , Yesu Kawauwi .
49001011	Kashila̱ ka ɗanga̱sa tsu ta̱ tsu woko ama a ne a asu u ɗa u ɓolomgbono tsu n Kawauwi . Tun caupa ɗa u yawunsai u yain nala , ɗa gai u yain iꞌya vi , kpam u zuwa ta̱ ko ndya wa i woko tyoku ɗa wa ciga .
49001012	U yan ta̱ nala tsa̱ra̱ a̱tsu aza a Yahuda aza ɗa tsa̱ri aza a kagita̱ ka uzuwa uma ara Kawauwi , tsu zuwa ama a cikpala Kashila̱ , kpaci wa̱ ta̱ n tsupige .
49001013	Kpam nala dem wa̱ri ara ɗe . I pana ta̱ Kadyanshi ka Shinga , kpam Kadyanshi ka Shinga ki ka ka wauwa ɗa̱ . I wushuku ta̱ n Kawauwi , kpam a ɓolomgbono ɗa̱ n eyi . Adama a nala , Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ta̱ Kulu Keri ka u zuwamgbana̱kai ama a ne . Kulu ka̱ ta̱ yavu kugyan ka ka wenike an eɗa̱ aza a Kashila̱ a ɗa .
49001014	An u wokoi tsu wushai Kulu Keri , mala̱la̱ ma̱ la wa , tsa reve ta̱ an Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ tsu ukuna u shinga u ɗa u zuwamgbanai . Tsu reve ta̱ kpam an Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ama a ɗa aꞌa̱ri ama a ne utsa̱ra̱ u kaci u ɗa u shaɗangi . Nala wa zuwa ta̱ ama a cikpala Kashila̱ kpaci wa̱ ta̱ n tsupige .
49001015	An u wokoi Kashila̱ ka zuwuka tsu una̱ u shinga naha , kavasu ka ma yan ubana ara ne adama a ɗe . Tun aꞌayin a ɗa n panai alabari a da i wushuku ɗe n Yesu Asheku , kpam ya ciga ama a Kashila̱ ,
49001016	tun aꞌayin a nala a ɗa ma̱ri a ucikpa Kashila̱ adama a ɗe maco . Aꞌayin a ɗa baci dem ma yan kavasu , n tsu yan ta̱ kavasu adama a ɗe .
49001017	Ubana a asu u Tata u tsunu ɗa ma yan kavasu , uza ɗa wa̱ri n tsupige tsu pige . Aya Kashila̱ ka Yesu Kawauwi Asheku a tsunu . N folo yi ta̱ u zuwa ɗa̱ i yain n ugboji , kpam u wenike kaci ka ne ara ɗe , tsa̱ra̱ i lyai kapala n ureve u ne .
49001018	N yan ta̱ dem kavasu u zuwa ɗa̱ i yain n ureve tsa̱ra̱ i reve ukuna u shinga u ɗa wa̱ri n u ɗa adama a ɗe . Eɗa pini ufoɓusi ya vana tsa̱ra̱ i wushi ukuna u shinga u na vi , kpaci u isa̱ ɗa̱ ta̱ i woko mmuku n ne . N yan ta̱ kpam kavasu tsa̱ra̱ i reve tsupige tsu una̱ u shinga u ɗa u yain kazuwamgbani wa na̱ka̱ ama a ne .
49001019	N yan ta̱ kpam dem kavasu tsa̱ra̱ i reve ucira u ne , u ɗa u lai ko ndya wa , u ɗa u tsu ɓa̱nga̱ tsu a̱tsu aza ɗa tsu wushuki . U ɗa gai ucira u pige u ɗa
49001020	u yankai manyan an u zuwai Kawauwi ka gono n uma , aku u zuwa yi u dusuku a asu u tsupige a kukere ku ulyaki ku ne a zuba .
49001021	Kawauwi ka lya ta̱ tsugono tsu ucira kau‑kau u ɗa wa̱ri pini , ko an u wokoi aꞌa̱ ta̱ n ucira . Kala ka ne ka la ta̱ gba̱ aꞌala a aza a tsugono tsupige . Ukuna u mayun u ɗa na vi gogo‑na , kpam wa woko ta̱ mayun a aꞌayin a utuwa̱ .
49001022	Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ta̱ kpam Kawauwi tsugono a kaci ka ili gba̱ , u zuwai kpam u woko Kaci ka Atoni ; wata , ikyamba i ne iꞌya la vi .
49001023	Atoni yi ikyamba i Kawauwi iꞌya , aya u tsu shaɗangu le n ucira u ne kpam u tsu na̱ka̱ ko ndya uma ko nte wa .
49002001	Caupa iꞌa̱ri ta̱ yavu akushe , kpaci i ꞌyuwain upana̱ka Kashila̱ , kpam ya yansa unyushi u cingi .
49002002	I tsu rongo ta̱ a uyansa tyoku ɗa ama a likimba a tsu yansa . I pana̱kai Kanangasi , uza ɗa wa lya tsugono tsu ityoni i cingi iꞌya ya rongo a kalishi . Kanangasi ki uwule u cingi u ɗa wa yan manyan u ɗa , kpam wa tono n aza ɗa a ꞌyuwain upana̱ka Kashila̱ .
49002003	Caupa gba̱ tsunu tsa̱ri ta̱ tyoku u le . Gba̱ ili i cingi iꞌya i luwa tsu uyan iꞌya tsa yansa . Tsa tono ili iꞌya uyawunsa n maluwa ma cingi ma tsunu ma tonuko tsu tsu yain . An u wokoi tsa̱ri tsa yansa ili i cingi , dere ɗa wa̱ri Kashila̱ ka yan tsu mavura , tyoku ɗa wa yanka ama ɗa a buwai .
49002004	Shegai asuvayali a Kashila̱ a gbonguro wa wa , kpam wa ciga tsu ta̱ cika .
49002005	U ɓolomgbono tsu n Kawauwi , kpam u na̱ka̱ tsu uma u savu . U yan ta̱ nala cina tsu buwai yavu akushe adama a unyushi u cingi u tsunu . Adama a tsishinga tsu ne ɗa koshi Kashila̱ ka wauwa ɗa̱ .
49002006	U ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ tsu ta̱ a asuvu a ukpa̱ kaɓolo n Kawauwi , kpam u zuwa tsu a zuba tsa̱ra̱ tsu rongo n Kawauwi tsu lyai tsugono n eyi . Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ nala a asu u ɗa u ɓolomgbono tsu n Yesu Kawauwi .
49002007	A ure u na u ɗa u wenike tsu ukuna u shinga u ne a asuvu a Yesu Kawauwi , tsa̱ra̱ a asuvu a ayen a ɗa a ka tuwa̱ ama a wene tyoku ɗa ukuna u shinga u ne wa̱ri kpam u lai ko ndya wa .
49002008	Adama a ukuna u shinga u ne u ɗa u wenike ɗa̱ koshi , ɗa u wauwa ɗa̱ a asu u ɗa i pityanangi n Kawauwi . U wauwa ɗa̱ adama a ili i shinga iꞌya i yain wa , nala kune ku Kashila̱ ka ara ɗe ,
49002009	adama a ili iꞌya i yain ɗa wa . Ɗa gai i zuwai bawu uza wa̱ri la uza ɗa wa fuɗa wa cikpala kaci ka ne ki .
49002010	Kashila̱ ka ka yan tsu tyoku ɗa tsa̱ri . A asuvu a Yesu Kawauwi , Kashila̱ ka yan tsu ta̱ tsa̱ra̱ tsu yain manyan ma shinga . Nala u foɓusoi u ɗa tun caupa , tsa̱ra̱ tsu rongo nala .
49002011	A matsa ɗa̱ aza a Yahuda wa . Eɗa aza a Yahuda a tsu isa̱ “ aza ɗa bawu a kiɗai acombi . ” Aza ɗa a tsu isa̱ ɗa̱ “ aza ɗa bawu a kiɗai acombi ” a tsu isa̱ ta̱ kaci ka le “ aza ɗa a kiɗai acombi . ” ( Ukiɗa u acombi u le ili iꞌya a tsu yanka kaci ka le a ikyamba iꞌya koshi . )
49002012	Ciɓai , aꞌayin a ɗa bawu kotsu iꞌa̱ri i revei Kawauwi , iꞌa̱ aza a uyamba u Isaraꞌila wa . Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ kazuwamgbani n ele , shegai n a̱ɗa̱ wa . U wushuku ta̱ kpam wa yanka le ili ushani shegai n a̱ɗa̱ wa . A likimba ɗa ya rongo , shegai iꞌa̱ n ili iꞌya i zuwukai uma wa , kpam i reve Kashila̱ wa .
49002013	Caupa , iꞌa̱ri ta̱ a mɓa̱ri , shegai gogo‑na a ɓolomgbono ɗa̱ ɗe n Yesu Kawauwi , kpam Kashila̱ ka tuko ɗa̱ evu n eyi a asuvu a mpasa n Kawauwi .
49002014	Kawauwi n kaci ka ne aya u tuko tsu ndishi n shinga . Caupa , tsilala tsa tsa̱ri a mere ma aza a Yahuda n Awulawa tsa̱ri ta̱ yavu kasaga . U takpa ɗe tsilala tsu nala tsi , aku u gonukoi gba̱ ama ili i te .
49002015	Mele ma aza a Yahuda ma̱ ta̱ n udani ushani u ɗa u gain ama a toni , shegai gogo‑na Kawauwi ka zuwa ma ɗe a ikengi a asu u ukpa̱ u ne . Yan ɗa u yain nala tsa̱ra̱ u tuko aza a Yahuda n Awulawa ara ne u yain kaɓolo ka savu . Nala kpam u zuwai ndishi n shinga a mere ma le .
49002016	Uciga u Kawauwi u ɗa tsilala tsa tsa̱ri a mere ma aɓolo a re a na yi tsu cina utyoku . U zuwa le a woko ikyamba i te , u gonuko le a asu u Kashila̱ . Gba̱ nala vi , Kawauwi ka yan ta̱ iꞌya a asu u ukpa̱ u ne a mawandamgbani .
49002017	Kawauwi ka tuwa̱ ta̱ a likimba u yain kuɓari ku Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka ku yain kadyanshi ka ndishi n shinga . U yanka ɗa̱ ta̱ eɗa̱ Awulawa aza ɗa iꞌa̱ri mɓa̱ri , n a̱tsu aza a Yahuda aza ɗa tsa̱ri evu .
49002018	Gogo‑na gba̱ tsunu aza a Yahuda n Awulawa tsa fuɗa ta̱ tsa tuwa̱ a asu u Tata a asuvu a Kulu Keri ku te adama a ili iꞌya Kawauwi ka yanka tsu .
49002019	Adama a nala , eɗa̱ Awulawa iꞌa̱ kpam amoci ko kpam aza ɗa a wuta̱i a mɓa̱ri wa . Shegai i woko ɗe aza a uyamba u te n ama a Kashila̱ . Gogo‑na eɗa̱ i woko ɗe aza a kuwa ku Kashila̱ .
49002020	I wokoi aɓuku a kuma ka a mai , kpam Asuki na̱ ntsumate alya cuku tsu kuma ki , Kawauwi kpam aya katali ka ka lakai kalen cika a asu u kuma vi .
49002021	Aya wa ɓolomgbono gba̱ kuma ki . U zuwa ta̱ ka ku ꞌya̱nga̱i hal ku wokoi kuwa ku Kashila̱ ku uwulukpi .
49002022	Adama a ɗa a ɓolomgbono ɗa̱ n Kawauwi , gogo‑na Kawauwi ki ɓolomgbono ɗa wa ɓolomgbono ɗa̱ n Atoni a ɗa a buwai , tsa̱ra̱ i woko kuwa ku nala ki ka Kashila̱ ka rongo n ucira u Kulu Keri .
49003001	Mpa Bulus , ma̱ ta̱ a kuwa ku aꞌali adama a manyan ma Kirisiti Kawauwi u zuwa mu n yanka ɗa̱ eɗa̱ Awulawa .
49003002	I reve ta̱ an Kashila̱ n ukuna u shinga u ne u na̱ka̱ mu manyan ma na mi n yain tsa̱ra̱ n ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ .
49003003	Kashila̱ ka zuwai n revei afoɓi a ne a ɗa u sokongi . Ma̱ri n koronku ɗa̱ ta̱ kenu a kaci ka ukuna u na vi .
49003004	I yan baci ka̱neshi u ili iꞌya n korongi , ya reve ta̱ ili iꞌya n revei adama a afoɓi a na yi a kaci ka Kawauwi .
49003005	Kashila̱ ka wenike afoɓi a na yi a asu u ama a ɗa a rongoi caupa wa . Shegai gogo‑na u wenike a ɗa ɗe a asu u Kulu Keri . U wenikei a ɗa a asu u ama a ɗa u ɗanga̱sai a woko asuki na̱ ntsumate n ne .
49003006	Afoɓi a Kashila̱ a ɗa na : Eɗa̱ Awulawa ya wusha ta̱ una̱ u shinga u ɗa Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ , una̱ u te tyoku ɗa aza a Yahuda a ka wusha u ɗa . Awulawa n aza a Yahuda a woko ɗe ama a te . Eɗa̱ Awulawa ya wusha ta̱ dem ili iꞌya Kashila̱ ka yankai ama a ne kazuwamgbani , kpaci uɓolomgboni u ɗa iꞌa̱ri n Yesu Kawauwi . Ili iꞌya Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka danai iꞌya la vi .
49003007	Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka na ki ka ma yan kuɓari . An u wokoi Kashila̱ uza u shinga u ɗa , u na̱ka̱ mu manyan ma na mi ma utonusuko ama gba̱ Kadyanshi ka Shinga , kpam u ɓa̱nga̱ mu n yain ili i na yi n ucira u ɗa u na̱ka̱ mu .
49003008	Mpa gba̱ n lai unamba kalen asuvu a ama a Kashila̱ , shegai gba̱ n nala , Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ mu manyan ma na mi ma utonusuko Awulawa ili i shinga iꞌya Kawauwi ka na̱ka̱sa̱ . Ili i shinga i na yi i wura ta̱ ama a reve .
49003009	Kpam Kashila̱ uza ɗa u yain ili gba̱ , u na̱ka̱ mu manyan ma utonusuko ama gba̱ ukuna u afoɓi a ɗa u sokongi a kagita̱ .
49003010	U yain ili i na tsa̱ra̱ gogo‑na u wenike ucira kau‑kau u zuba tyoku ɗa wa̱ri n ugboji a ili iꞌya wa yansa gba̱ . Kashila̱ ka wenikei ili i na yi a asu u ili iꞌya u yankai Atoni a ne .
49003011	Kashila̱ ka bidiga ta̱ kaci ka ne u yain ili i na tun caupa kahu u yain likimba , kpam gogo‑na u zuwa ɗe iꞌya i gita̱ a ure u ɗa Asheku Yesu Kawauwi ka tsunu u yain .
49003012	Cinda tsu wushuki n eyi , kpam tsu ɓolomgbonoi n eyi , tsa fuɗa ta̱ tsa tuwa̱ a asu u Kashila̱ karara bawu uwonvo .
49003013	Adama a nala , ma folo ɗa̱ i namba ugbamatangu an ma so mavura adama a ɗe wa . Mavura ma na mi ma tuko ɗa̱ ta̱ tsupige .
49003014	Adama a nala , n kuɗa̱ngu ta̱ a kapala ka Tata n yanka ɗa̱ kavasu .
49003015	Aya Tata u maci u aꞌuwa gba̱ , gba̱ aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri a zuba n aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri a likimba dem .
49003016	Kashila̱ ka fuɗa ta̱ ka zuwuka ɗa̱ una̱ u shinga ushani . Ɗa n folo yi tsa̱ra̱ Kulu ku ne ku na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ucira , kotsu atakasuvu a ɗe a gbama .
49003017	Kpam n folo yi tsa̱ra̱ Kawauwi ka rongo asuvu a atakasuvu a ɗe an i pityanangi n eyi . Kavasu ka va̱ ka i rongo uciga u Kashila̱ kpam i cigamgbana . I yan baci nala ya woko ta̱ tyoku u maɗanga ma alu a ne a uwai asuvu a iyamba , kpam tyoku u kuwa ka a mai n cuku tsu ugbami .
49003018	Nala eɗa̱ n ama a Kashila̱ gba̱ ya reve ucun u uciga u ɗa Kawauwi ka ciga tsu . Wa ciga tsu ta̱ cika , uciga u ɗa u wurai ura̱tsana̱ka .
49003019	Ko an u wokoi uza wa̱ la wa fuɗa wa reve gba̱ tyoku ɗa Kawauwi ka ciga tsu wa , ma folo Kashila̱ ka a̱sa̱ka̱ i reve u ɗa , tsa̱ra̱ i woko tyoku ɗa u gain i woko ; wata , tyoku ɗa Kashila̱ ka̱ri .
49003020	Kashila̱ ka̱ ta̱ n ucira u ɗa wa yan ili iꞌya i lai iꞌya tsu folo yi u yain , hal gba̱m n ili iꞌya tsu fuɗai tsu yawunsai . Kpam she u yain iꞌya n ucira u ne ; wata , u ɗa wa yansa manyan a atakasuvu a tsunu .
49003021	A̱sa̱ka̱i tsu cikpala ni hal ubana bawu utyoku adama tsupige tsa u wenikei a ili iꞌya wa yansa a asuvu a kuwa ku Atoni , kpam n a asu u Yesu Kawauwi ! Ami .
49004001	Ma̱ ta̱ a kuwa ku aꞌali adama a ɗa ma gbashika Asheku , kpam ma folo ɗa̱ ta̱ i rongo ndishi n ɗa n rotsoi ma aza ɗa Kashila̱ ka isa̱i .
49004002	Ili iꞌya baci dem ya yan , i vakunku kaci ka ɗe , kpam i toni n ama sawu . I yain n ahankuri , kpam kotsu i yain upan aꞌayin a ɗa baci ama a ka yansa ukuna u gbani wa , kpaci ya ciga le ta̱ .
49004003	Kulu Keri ku gonuko ɗa̱ ɗe ili i te , adama a nala , yanyi gba̱ iꞌya ya yan i rongo na̱ ndishi n shinga , tsa̱ra̱ i rongo pini ili i te .
49004004	Gba̱ tsunu ikyamba i te iꞌya . Kulu ku Kashila̱ ku te ka . Kpam Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ tsu ta̱ uzuwa u uma u te an u ɗanga̱sa tsu tsu woko ama a ne .
49004005	Gba̱ tsunu Asheku a te a ɗa tsu . Uwenishike u te u ɗa tsu pityanangi n u ɗa . Ulyuɓugu u te u ɗa tsu wushai .
49004006	Gba̱ tsunu Kashila̱ ka te ka tsa gbashika , kpam aya Tata u tsunu gba̱ . Wa lya ta̱ tsugono tsu ko ndya wa . Wa̱ ta̱ ko nte wa . Aya kpam pini a asuvu a tsunu gba̱ .
49004007	Kawauwi ka na̱ka̱ ta̱ ya dem kune tsa̱ra̱ tsu yain manyan ma ne . Yan ɗa u yain nala adama a tsishinga tsupige tsu ne .
49004008	Tyoku ɗa Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u danai , “ Aꞌayin a ɗa u banai a zuba u Kashila̱ , u tono ta̱ n aza a aꞌuwa a aꞌali a ɗa u ka̱na̱i , kpam u na̱ka̱i ama kune icun kau‑kau . ”
49004009	( Gogo‑na ma ciga ta̱ i yawunsa a kaci ka udani , “ U banai a zuba u Kashila̱ . ”
49004010	U bana baci a zuba u Kashila̱ , u ka̱na̱ ta̱ u yain n kalen ; wata , caupa , wa̱ri u cipa̱ ta̱ a iyamba , a likimba u na . Vuma ɗa cipa̱i a likimba u na vi aya dem uza ɗa yuwa̱i a zuba vi , tsa̱ra̱ u gonuko ili i woko tyoku ɗa i gain i woko . )
49004011	Aya u na̱ka̱i Atoni kune ku na ki icun kau‑kau : u zuwai aza roku a woko asuki . U zuwai aza roku a woko ntsumate , aza roku kpam a dansa kadyanshi ka Kashila̱ . U zuwai aza roku a kirana n Atoni , aza roku kpam a woko awenishiki a Atoni .
49004012	Yan ɗa u yain nala tsa̱ra̱ ama a na yi a foɓuso ama a Kashila̱ a gbashika yi , tsa̱ra̱ Atoni yi , aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri ikyamba i Kawauwi a gbonguro n ucira .
49004013	Nala gba̱ tsunu tsa ɓolomgbono tsu woko ili i te a asu u uwushuku n Kashila̱ n ureve u Maku ma ne , kpam tsa woko ta̱ aza ɗa a gbonguroi . Wata , tsa woko ta̱ ushaɗangi tyoku u Kawauwi , uza ɗa wa̱ri tyoku ɗa u gain u woko .
49004014	Tsa woko kpam tyoku u mmuku wa . A ka kpatala̱sa tsu kaberikete tyoku u kpatsu ku aɓali a ka kpatala̱sa kaberikete wa . Tsa pana̱ka ama ɗa a ka ciga a yinsa̱ tsu n uwenishike u kaɓan u gbani wa .
49004015	A una̱ u nala , tsu dansa ukuna u mayun kpam tsu cigamgbana , tsa̱ra̱ tsu gbonguro kpam tsu woko una̱ u te n Kawauwi gba̱ gba̱ , eyi uza ɗa wa̱ri Kaci ka Atoni .
49004016	Kawauwi ka ɓolomgbono ta̱ ama gba̱ , tyoku ɗa karuva ka tsu ɓolomgbono apashi a ikyamba i vuma . Kapashi dem ka yan baci manyan ma ne , ka ɓa̱nga̱ ta̱ apashi a roku a gbonguro , tsa̱ra̱ ikyamba yi gba̱ i woko n alafiya , n ugbonguro , kpam ushaɗangi n uciga .
49004017	Adama a nala , n tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ kpam n rono ɗa̱ atsuvu a asuvu a kala ka Asheku , a̱sa̱ka̱i uyansa tyoku ɗa Awulawa a ka yansa . Ure u uyawunsa u le u gbani u ɗa .
49004018	Atakasuvu a le aꞌa̱ ta̱ a asuvu a karimbi , a reve ko i te wa , kpaci a pana̱ka Kashila̱ wa . Adama a nala a ka tsa̱ra̱ uma u ɗa Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ wa .
49004019	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci a yain ili i cingi , a tsu pana kpam uwono wa . A neke ɗe kaci ka le a uyansa ili iꞌya ikyamba ya ciga , kpam a ka yansa ta̱ gba̱ icun i tsishankala , kpam a a̱sa̱ka̱ uyansa ili i nala yi wa .
49004020	Eɗa̱ tani , an i revei Kawauwi , tyoku ɗa a tonuko ɗa̱ i yansa ɗa la wa .
49004021	N reve ta̱ i pana ta̱ ukuna u ne , kpam iꞌa̱ ta̱ a asuvu a ne , adama a nala a wenishike ɗa̱ ta̱ ukuna u mayun u Yesu .
49004022	A wenishike ɗa̱ ta̱ i a̱sa̱ka̱ ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri i yansai caupa . Aꞌayin a nala yi uma u ɗe u namgba ta̱ adama a ɗa i cigai uyansa gba̱ icun i ikuna i cingi .
49004023	Gogo‑na a̱sa̱ka̱i Kashila̱ ka savaɗa uma u ɗe tsa̱ra̱ i gita̱ uyawunsa a ure u savu .
49004024	A̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ ka gonuko ɗa̱ ama a savu . U yan ɗa̱ ta̱ i woko tyoku u ne , adama a nala u ka̱na̱ ta̱ i woko ama a maci kpam uwulukpi n ukuna u mayun .
49004025	U ka̱na̱ ta̱ i a̱sa̱ka̱ kaɓan . Ya dem tonusuko utoku u ne Katoni ukuna u mayun , kpaci tsa̱ ta̱ tyoku u apashi kau‑kau a ikyamba i te .
49004026	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci i yain upan , kotsu i yain unyushi u cingi wa , kiranai , kotsu i yain upan hal kaara ka rukpa̱ wa .
49004027	Kotsu i na̱ka̱ Kala̱pa̱nsi kabala u lyai kaci ka ɗe wa .
49004028	Uza ɗa baci wa̱ri kaboki , kotsu u doku u boko wa . A una̱ u nala , she u ma̱tsa̱ uyan manyan , tsa̱ra̱ u tsa̱ra̱ ili iꞌya wa na̱ka̱ aza a unambi .
49004029	Kotsu i dansa ikuna i cingi wa , shegai i dansa ikuna i shinga iꞌya ya ɓa̱nga̱ ama a gbonguro . Dansai ili iꞌya ya gbamatangu aza ɗa a ka pana̱ka ɗa̱ vi tsa̱ra̱ i yan le n kalen .
49004030	Kpam kotsu i zuwa Kulu Keri unamgbukatsuma̱ wa , kpaci ka̱ ta̱ tyoku u kugyan ka ku wenikei eɗa̱ ama a ne a ɗa . Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ta̱ Kulu , tsa̱ra̱ u wenike an wa wutukpa̱ ɗa̱ kain ka makorishi ka rawa baci .
49004031	I a̱sa̱ka̱ unamgbi u asuvu n upan n asuvu a shen . Kotsu i rongo n ibili ko kpam i yain ili iꞌya ya tuko kunangasu wa ko kenu .
49004032	A una̱ u nala , yamgbanai ili i shinga , kpam i wenike asuvayali . Cimbusuka̱i aza ɗa a nusuka ɗa̱ , tyoku ɗa Kashila̱ ka cimbusuka̱ ɗa̱ unyushi u cingi u ɗe a asu u Kawauwi .
49005001	Adama a nala rongoi tyoku u Kashila̱ , kpaci eɗa̱ mmuku n ne n ɗa , aza ɗa wa ciga cika .
49005002	I cigi ama maco , tyoku ɗa Kawauwi ka ciga tsu , hal u kuwa̱i adama a tsunu . U nekei uma u ne tyoku u uɗara̱kpa ubana a asu u Kashila̱ , kpam nala vi wa̱ ta̱ tyoku u ili i magula̱ni a asu u Kashila̱ .
49005003	Kotsu i yain tsishankala , ko ili i uwono , ko kpam kurura a mere ma ɗe wa . Icun i inyushi i cingi i nala yi i lobono a asu u ama a Kashila̱ wa .
49005004	Kpam dem u lobono i dansa kadyanshi ka icaɗi wa , kpam kotsu i dansa n utengeshi ko majari ma cingi wa . A una̱ u nala , she i cikpi Kashila̱ adama a ili iꞌya wa yansa̱ka ɗa̱ .
49005005	I reve ta̱ na vi mayun ɗa : Uza u yan baci unyushi u tsishankala , ko u yain ili i cingi , ko wa̱ri n kurura , wa uwa a tsugono tsu Kawauwi n tsu Kashila̱ wa . Uza ɗa baci dem wa yansa ili i nala yi , kameli ka wa gbashika .
49005006	Kotsu i a̱sa̱ka̱ uza roku u yinsa̱ ɗa̱ u tonusuko ɗa̱ ili iꞌya bawu iꞌa̱ri i mayun wa . A ka ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ wa , Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ upan n ama a ɗa bawu a na̱ka̱ yi karinga̱ , a ka yansa baci icun i ili i cingi i na yi .
49005007	Adama a nala , kotsu i ɓolomgbono n aza ɗa a ka yansa ikuna i cingi tyoku u nala wa .
49005008	Caupa , iꞌa̱ri ta̱ a asuvu a karimbi , shegai gogo‑na a ɓolomgbono ɗa̱ ɗe n Asheku , kpam i uwa ɗe a asuvu a katyashi . Adama a nala rongoi tyoku u ama a ɗa aꞌa̱ri aza a katyashi .
49005009	N dana ta̱ nala kpaci katyashi ka tsu zuwa ta̱ ama a yain ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri i shinga , n i maci , n i mayun .
49005010	Adama a nala ma̱tsa̱i i rotsongusu ili iꞌya ya zuwa Asheku a pana kayanyan .
49005011	Kotsu i ɓolomgbono a asu u uyan ili iꞌya ama a ɗa aꞌa̱ri a karimbi a ka yansa wa . Ili i nala yi i gbani iꞌya . A una̱ u nala , zuwai ama a reve ili i na yi i cingi iꞌya .
49005012	Ili i uwono iꞌya gba̱m a dansa ikuna iꞌya ama a yain a ukpawunsi .
49005013	Shegai aꞌayin a ɗa baci katyashi ka wakanai ara le , ya dem wa wene ta̱ ili iꞌya ili yi i rotsoi .
49005014	Kpaci katyashi ka tsu wenike ta̱ ili dem . Ɗa i zuwai a danai , “ Eɗa̱ aza ɗa ya lavuta , ꞌya̱nga̱i ! ꞌYa̱nga̱i a ukpa̱ , kpam Kawauwi ka wakana ta̱ ara ɗe . ”
49005015	Adama a nala , kiranai n tyoku ɗa ya rongo . Kotsu i rongo tyoku u atengeshi wa , shegai rongoi n kakiri .
49005016	Yanyi manyan n kabala ka iꞌa̱ri n ka mai , kpaci ama a ka yansa ta̱ tsicingi a aꞌayin a na .
49005017	Adama a nala kotsu i woko atengeshi wa , shegai i rotsongusu ili iꞌya Asheku a ka ciga ɗa̱ i yain .
49005018	Kotsu i tamgbala̱ka n uso ma̱ra̱ wa , kpaci nala wa nangasa ɗa̱ ta̱ . A una̱ u nala , a̱sa̱ka̱i Kulu ku shaɗangu ɗa̱ n ucira .
49005019	Shipai icun i ishipa i Kashila̱ gba̱ , kpam i gbamatangu atoku a ɗe . Shipai ishipa i ucikpala Asheku n atakasuvu a ɗe gba̱ .
49005020	Cikpai Kashila̱ Tata u tsunu maco a ili gba̱ adama a kala ka Asheku Yesu Kawauwi ka tsunu .
49005021	Adama a ɗa ya na̱ka̱ Kawauwi karinga̱ , she i gorimuko atoku .
49005022	Eɗa̱ aka a iyolo , gorimukoi aꞌali a ɗe tyoku ɗa i tsu gorimuko Asheku ,
49005023	adama a ɗa vali aya kaci ka uka , tyoku ɗa Kawauwi ka̱ri Kaci ka Atoni ; wata , ikyamba i ne .
49005024	Adama a nala , uka dem u gorimuko vali u ne a ili dem , tyoku ɗa Atoni a tsu gorimuko Kawauwi .
49005025	Eɗa̱ aꞌali a ɗa iꞌa̱ri n aka , ya dem cigi uka u ne , tyoku ɗa Kawauwi ka cigai Atoni hal u kuwa̱i adama a le ,
49005026	tsa̱ra̱ u gonuko le uwulukpi , an u za̱ le n mini n udani u ne .
49005027	U yan ta̱ na vi tsa̱ra̱ u gonuko Atoni yi a woko n tsulobo kpam u tuko le a kapala ka ne tyoku u ukasavu u ɗa bawu wa̱ri n kashinda̱ ko utyacira ko kpam icun i unamgba . Pini nala , a ka woko ta̱ uwulukpi kpam bawu unyushi .
49005028	Nala kpam dem aꞌali , u ka̱na̱ ta̱ a cigi aka a le , tyoku ɗa a ka ciga ikyamba i le . Uza ɗa baci wa ciga uka u ne , kaci ka ne ka wa ciga .
49005029	Uza wa̱ la wa kovo ikyamba i ne wa , shegai u lyatangu iꞌya u kirana kpam n iꞌya . Kpam ili iꞌya Kawauwi ka yankai Atoni yi iꞌya gai la vi ,
49005030	kpaci a̱tsa apashi a ikyamba i ne .
49005031	Tyoku ɗa Tagara̱da u Kashila̱ u danai , “ Vali u a̱sa̱ka̱ tata na̱ mma u ne u paɗara n uka u ne , ama a re a le a ka woko ta̱ ikyamba i te . ”
49005032	Ukuna u mayun u ɗa pini ukpawin a uwenishike u na vi . Kadyanshi ka Kawauwi n Atoni ka ma yan .
49005033	Shegai mayun ɗa ara ɗe dem : vali dem u ka̱na̱ ta̱ u cigi uka u ne tyoku ɗa wa ciga kaci ka ne , uka kpam u ka̱na̱ ta̱ u gorimuko vali u ne .
49006001	Eɗa̱ mmuku , gorimukoi isheku i ɗe kpaci eɗa̱ aza a Asheku a ɗa , kpam ili i shinga iꞌya i gain i yain iꞌya gai la vi .
49006002	Mele ma kagita̱ ma ma̱ri a asuvu a Mele Kupa ma ma korusoi n kazuwamgbani ka ka danai , “ Na̱ka̱ tata na̱ mma u vunu tsupige . ”
49006003	Kpam kazuwamgbani ka na : “ Vu na̱ka̱ baci tata na̱ mma u vunu tsupige , ili dem ya wala vu ta̱ derere , kpam va ɓa̱ra̱kpa̱ ta̱ a likimba u na . ”
49006004	Isheku , kotsu i zuwa mmuku n ɗe n yain upan wa . A una̱ u nala , kiranai n ele , na̱ka̱ le adooki kpam i wenishike le a ure u ɗa Asheku a ka ciga .
49006005	Eɗa̱ agbashi , gorimukoi azakuwa a ɗe a ɗa aꞌa̱ri pini naha a likimba . Pana le uwonvo i na̱ka̱ le karinga̱ i gbashika le kpam mayun tyoku ɗa ya gbashika Kawauwi .
49006006	Ma̱tsa̱i manyan cika a aꞌayin dem , shegai kotsu i yain tsa̱ra̱ i zuwa azakuwa a ɗe a pana kayanyan aꞌayin a ɗa a ka wundya ɗa̱ koshi wa . Shegai i yain iꞌya i lai la , i yain manyan ma ɗe n atakasuvu a ɗe gba̱ , tyoku ɗa Kashila̱ ka ciga , kpaci eɗa̱ agbashi a Kawauwi a ɗa iꞌa̱ri .
49006007	Yanyi manyan ma ɗe n maza̱nga̱ , yavu Asheku a ɗa ya yanka , shegai ama koshi wa .
49006008	Ciɓai , Asheku a ka tsupa ta̱ manyan ma shinga ma ya dem u yain , ko kagbashi ko uza ɗa bawu wa̱ri kagbashi .
49006009	Eɗa̱ azakuwa , kiranai n agbashi a ɗe dem mai . Kotsu i dana ili iꞌya ya zuwa le a pana uwonvo wa . Ciɓai , azakuwa n agbashi gba̱ aꞌa̱ ta̱ n Uzakuwa u te a zuba , kpam u tsu yanka ta̱ ya dem una̱ u te .
49006010	Akani a va̱ a makorishi a ɗa na : gbamai n ucira u Asheku u ɗa wa̱ri n ugbonguro cika kain dem , kpaci iꞌa̱ ta̱ kaɓolo n eyi .
49006011	Kasoje ka tsu foɓuso ta̱ icanga i kuvon adama a kuvon . Nala dem , u ka̱na̱ ta̱ i foɓuso gba̱ ili iꞌya Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ , tsa̱ra̱ aꞌayin a ɗa baci Kala̱pa̱nsi ka ciga ka la̱pa̱na̱sa̱ ɗa̱ , kotsu i fuɗa i shamgba n ucira a uwanda̱sa u ne .
49006012	Kuvon ku tsunu n ama icun i tsunu ɗa wa , shegai n ityoni i cingi iꞌya na̱ ngono n le n ucira kau‑kau u likimba u karimbi u na , kpam tsa yan ta̱ kuvon n ucira u cingi u ɗa wa̱ri a kalishi .
49006013	Adama a nala , ukai gba̱ icanga i kuvon iꞌya Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ . Tsa̱ra̱ i suma a kain ka cingi wa . Ya yan ta̱ kuvon hal ubana a makorishi , kpam i rongo kushani n ucira .
49006014	Adama a nala , foɓusoi kaci ka ɗe ! I dansa ukuna u mayun maco . Wa̱ ta̱ tyoku u kagbawatsu ka cuku ka vuma sirai a cuku , tsa̱ra̱ u foɓuso kaci ka ne u yain manyan . Yanyi ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri derere , kpaci uyan ili iꞌa̱ri derere iꞌa̱ ta̱ tyoku u matogo ma urim ma ma ka̱ngu iꞌya ya sawa ɗa̱ .
49006015	Lyayi kapala n uwushukusu n Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka ka tsu na̱ka̱ ndishi n shinga . Kpam ka woko ta̱ tyoku u akpata a aꞌene a ɗe , kpam ya woko ta̱ ufoɓusi mai .
49006016	Ili i roku iꞌya kpam na : lyayi kelime n upityanangusu n Yesu Kawauwi . Upityanangu u ɗe wa woko ta̱ tyoku u mara̱ga̱ ma uka̱ngusu aya a akina a ɗa uza u cingi vi wa takusu utuwa̱ ara ɗe .
49006017	I reve baci bawu mala̱la̱ an Kashila̱ ka wauwa ɗa̱ , wa̱ ta̱ tyoku u makun ma kuvon ma ma tsu ka̱ngu kaci ka ɗe . Kpam i foɓuso i yain manyan n Kadyanshi ka Kashila̱ . Wa̱ ta̱ tyoku u burundu u ɗa Kulu Keri ku na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ .
49006018	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci i yain ili i na yi , yanyi kavasu i foli Kashila̱ ka ɓa̱nga̱ ɗa̱ a ili dem maco tyoku ɗa Kulu Keri ku tonoi n a̱ɗa̱ . Kpam ya yan baci kavasu ki , i rongo ufoɓusi . Rongoi uyansa kavasu maco adama a ama a Kashila̱ .
49006019	Yanka numu dem kavasu , tsa̱ra̱ Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ mu idani i maci iꞌya ma dana n gita̱ baci kadyanshi , tsa̱ra̱ n dansa bawu uwonvo kpam n tonuko ama akani a ɗa Kashila̱ ka wenike tsu gogo‑na a Kadyanshi ka Shinga .
49006020	Yesu Kawauwi u ɗanga̱sa mu ta̱ n woko kasuki ka ne , n yain kuɓari ku Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka ne , kpam ili iꞌya i zuwai gogo‑na a sira mu n ikani a kuwa ku aꞌali ɗa gai la vi . Yanyi kavasu tsa̱ra̱ aꞌayin a ɗa baci ma yan Kadyanshi ka Shinga ki , n dansa bawu uwonvo tyoku ɗa u gain .
49006021	Ma ciga ta̱ i reve tyoku ɗa tsa̱ri n ili iꞌya tsa yansa . Ɗa i zuwai ma suku Tikiku ara ɗe . Utoku u tsunu u ɗa uza ɗa tsa ciga , kpam dem u gbashika ta̱ Asheku mai . Wa tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ ili iꞌya ya gita̱sa̱ n a̱tsu , kpam wa gbamatangusu ɗa̱ ta̱ atakasuvu . Ma ciga ta̱ i reve tyoku ɗa tsa̱ri n ili iꞌya tsa yansa . Ɗa i zuwai ma suku Tikiku ara ɗe . Utoku u tsunu u ɗa uza ɗa tsa ciga , kpam dem u gbashika ta̱ Asheku mai . Wa tonuko ɗa̱ ta̱ ili iꞌya ya gita̱sa̱ n a̱tsu , kpam wa gbamatangusu ɗa̱ ta̱ atakasuvu .
49006022	
49006023	N yan ta̱ kavasu tsa̱ra̱ Kashila̱ Tata n Asheku Yesu Kawauwi u na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ndishi n shinga , n uciga , kpam u na̱ka̱ Katoni dem upityanangu !
49006024	A̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ ka wenike tsishinga tsu ne a asu u aza ɗa gba̱ a ka ciga Asheku Yesu Kawauwi ka tsunu n uciga u ɗa bawu wa kotso .
50001001	Mpa Bulus , kpam Timoti ɗa pini na kaɓolo na̱ mpa . A̱tsu agbashi a Yesu Kirisiti Kawauwi a ɗa tsa̱ri . Nkoshi n aɓa̱ngi a kuwa ku Atoni n gba̱ Atoni a aza a Filibi aza ɗa Kashila̱ ka ɗanga̱sai alya ma koronku .
50001002	A̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ Tata u tsunu n Asheku a tsunu Yesu Kawauwi a na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ukuna u shinga na̱ ndishi n shinga .
50001003	N tsu cikpa ta̱ Kashila̱ ka va̱ aꞌayin a ɗa baci n ciɓai n a̱ɗa̱ .
50001004	Kain dem n tsu shaɗangu ta̱ n maza̱nga̱ ma yanka ɗa̱ baci kavasu ,
50001005	kpaci i woko ɗe atoku a manyan a va̱ a asu u utamburuka Kadyanshi ka Shinga a kaci ka Kawauwi . I gita̱ ta̱ uyan nala tun aꞌayin a ɗa i gita̱i i panai alabari yi , kpam ya lya kapala n uyan nala hal n gogo‑na .
50001006	Kashila̱ ka ka gita̱i manyan ma shinga ma na mi ara ɗe , kpam n reve ta̱ wa a̱sa̱ka̱ ma wa , she aꞌayin a ɗa u kotsoi ma kain ka Yesu Kawauwi wa gono .
50001007	Dere ɗa n pana nala a kaci ka ɗe . Ma ciga ɗa̱ wa wa a asuvu a katakasuvu ka va̱ kpaci tsa yamgbana ta̱ ukuna u shinga u Kashila̱ . Tsu yan ta̱ nala aꞌayin a ɗa ma̱ri a kuwa ku aꞌali n aꞌayin a ɗa a a̱sa̱ka̱ mu an n ma̱tsa̱i n yain Kadyanshi ka Shinga .
50001008	Kashila̱ ka reve ta̱ tyoku ɗa ma ciga ɗa̱ n uciga u Yesu Kawauwi . U reve ta̱ kpam tyoku ɗa ma ciga n rongo n a̱ɗa̱ .
50001009	Kavasu ka va̱ ka macigamgbani ma ya cigamgbana vi ma yain ushani hal gba̱m ma lai tyoku ɗa ma ciga ma yain . Ma yan ta̱ kpam kavasu adama a ɗa ya gbonguro a asuvu a ureve n kakiri ka ɗe .
50001010	Yan ɗa n yain kavasu ki naha kpaci ma ciga ta̱ i reve ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri i mayun kpam n kalen , tsa̱ra̱ i rongo n uma u uwulukpi kpam bawu unyushi hal kain ka Kawauwi ka gono .
50001011	Pini nala , ɗa uma u ɗe wa shaɗangu n ilimaci i nɗanga n ɗa ma zuwa uyan ili iꞌya Kashila̱ ka wushuki a yain , kpam ya tuko ta̱ tsupige n icikpali a asu u Kashila̱ . Ili i nala yi iꞌya Yesu Kawauwi zuwai a uma u ɗe .
50001012	Ama a va̱ , ma ciga ta̱ i reve n manyan ma a yanka mu vi ma zuwa ta̱ Kadyanshi ka Shinga ka lyai kelime .
50001013	Ya dem reve ta̱ an a sira mu n ikani adama a ɗa ma gbashika Kawauwi . Kpam ko asoje a ɗa a ka wundya kuwa ku magono a reve ta̱ an n gbashikai Kawauwi .
50001014	Adama a usira u va̱ a kuwa ku aꞌali , Atoni ushani pini na a tsa̱ra̱ ta̱ ugbamatangu , kpam gogo‑na a gita̱ ɗe utonusuko aza roku ukuna u Kawauwi bawu uwonvo .
50001015	Aza roku a ɗa pini adama a ɗa a ka ciga mu ɗa a ka yansa kuɓari , kpam a ka ciga a yain ukuna u ɗa wa̱ri dere . Ama a na yi a ka yansa ta̱ kuɓari an a revei Asheku a ɗa a tuko mu pini na vi tsa̱ra̱ n moɗono n dana ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri dere i Kadyanshi ka Shinga . Kpam mayun ɗa wa̱ri aza roku a ɗa pini aza ɗa a ka yansa kuɓari n malyon n tsilala . Aza roku a ɗa pini adama a ɗa a ka ciga mu ɗa a ka yansa kuɓari , kpam a ka ciga a yain ukuna u ɗa wa̱ri dere . Ama a na yi a ka yansa ta̱ kuɓari an a revei Asheku a ɗa a tuko mu pini na vi tsa̱ra̱ n moɗono n dana ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri dere i Kadyanshi ka Shinga . Kpam mayun ɗa wa̱ri aza roku a ɗa pini aza ɗa a ka yansa kuɓari n malyon n tsilala .
50001016	
50001017	Ama a nala yi aꞌa̱ n uyawunsa u maci a kaci ka kuɓari ku kadyanshi ka Kawauwi wa . N uciga u kaci u ɗa a ka yansa u ɗa , mayun ɗa le wa . Ciga ɗa a ka ciga a doku a zuwa mu n pana ikyamba an ma̱ri a kuwa ku aꞌali .
50001018	Shegai ko an uyawunsa u le wa̱ri mai ko bawu wa̱ri mai , cinda a ka yansa kuɓari ku Kawauwi , ma yan ta̱ maza̱nga̱ kpam ma lya ta̱ kelime n uyan maza̱nga̱ .
50001019	Kpaci n reve ta̱ kavasu ka ɗe n uɓa̱nga̱ u ɗa wa wutusa̱ a asu u Kulu Keri ku Yesu Kawauwi wa zuwa le ta̱ a wauwa mu .
50001020	N ma̱tsa̱ ɗe n wene n yain ili iꞌya bawu ya zuwa mu n yain uwono , shegai kain dem n rongo a uyanka Kawauwi manyan bawu uwonvo . Caupa n pana uwonvo wa , gogo‑na kpam ma ciga ta̱ n rongo pini n ucira ubana tsa̱ra̱ uma u va̱ u rongo a una̱ka̱sa̱ Kawauwi tsupige ko n uma ko bawu uma .
50001021	Ma̱ baci n uma , adama a Kawauwi a ɗa , shegai n kuwa̱ baci wa laka mu ta̱ kalen .
50001022	N lya baci kelime n urongo n uma n ikyamba i na yi , ma fuɗa ta̱ ma lya kelime n manyan ma Kawauwi . N reve iꞌya ma ɗanga̱sa wa .
50001023	Uyawunsa vi u wuyana ta̱ . Roku she n wene yavu wa laka mu ta̱ n rongo n uma , roku kpam yavu n gono a asu u Kawauwi . Urongo n Kawauwi wa laka mu ta̱ cika .
50001024	Shegai n reve ta̱ u la ta̱ kalen ara ɗe n rongo n uma a ikyamba .
50001025	Adama a ɗa i buwa mu uciga vi , n reve ta̱ ma rongo n uma tsa̱ra̱ i rongo n ugbama a asuvu a upityanangu u ɗe , pini nala , ɗa ya pana kayanyan ka upityanangu vi .
50001026	Kpam n doku baci n tuwa̱ ɗa̱ ukondo , ya tsa̱ra̱ ta̱ ili i shinga iꞌya ya zuwa i yain agoni n Yesu Kawauwi adama a va̱ .
50001027	Shegai ko ndya baci i gita̱i , i rongo uma u ɗa wa tuko Kadyanshi ka Shinga tsupige a kaci ka Kawauwi . Ko n doku baci n tuwa̱ ɗa̱ uwene , ko kpam n panai alabari a ɗe koshi , ma reve ta̱ an i shamgbai n ucira kpam i ma̱tsa̱i tsa̱ra̱ i zuwa ya dem u wushuku n Kadyanshi ka Shinga ki .
50001028	Kotsu i pana uwonvo u atokulalu a ɗe wa . Nala wa woko ta̱ iryoci ara le an Kashila̱ n kaci ka ne wa wuna le aku u wauwa ɗa̱ .
50001029	Adama a Yesu Kawauwi , Kashila̱ ka na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ta̱ ukuna u shinga u uwushuku n Kawauwi . U na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ kpam ukuna u shinga u upana ikyamba adama a ne .
50001030	I reve ta̱ tyoku ɗa n panai ikyamba , kpam gogo‑na i pana ta̱ a da hal n ara nala wa̱ri . Eɗa̱ dem nala ya pana ikyamba yi .
50002001	Iꞌa̱ n ugbamatangu u asuvu an i ɓolomgbonoi kaci n Kawauwi ? Asuvu a ɗe a dusuku adama a uciga u ne vi ? Kulu Keri ku zuwa ɗa̱ ya rongo kaɓolo ? Ya pana iyali i atoku kpam ya tono n ele ben ?
50002002	An u wokoi n revei nala wa̱ri , ma ciga ta̱ i zuwa mu n pana kayanyan cika . Ili iꞌya ma ciga i yain iꞌya na : I panamgbana n atoku a ɗe . I cigi atoku a ɗe . I yansa manyan kaɓolo n uyawunsa u te kpam i yansa ili i te .
50002003	Kotsu i yain ili adama a uciga u kaci wa , kpam kotsu i yain ili adama a ara̱ɗi wa . Shegai aꞌayin a ɗa baci dem ya yan ili i gonuko kaci ka ɗe kenu , i yawunsa uza roku u ɗa pini uza ɗa u la ɗa̱ .
50002004	Kotsu i rongo uciɓusa ukuna u ɗa u birika ɗa̱ koshi wa , shegai i yain dem n i ciɓusi a kaci ka ukuna u aza roku .
50002005	A asuvu a uma u ɗe , i yain n i ciɓusi tyoku ɗa Yesu Kawauwi u tsu ciɓusa n u yansi .
50002006	Kain dem Yesu ili i te iꞌya n Kashila̱ , shegai kain ka̱ la ka u danai a̱sa̱ka̱ u pana kayanyan tyoku ɗa Kashila̱ ka pana wa .
50002007	Shegai u gonuko ta̱ kaci ka ne kenu , u wokoi yavu kagbashi . A matsa yi ta̱ yavu vuma .
50002008	Kpam u rongoi tyoku ɗa vu revei vuma wa̱ri . U pana̱ka ta̱ Kashila̱ , u gonukoi kpam kaci ka ne kenukulu , hal u rawai u kuwa̱ a zuba u mawandamgbani .
50002009	Adama a nala Kashila̱ ka ra̱ɗa̱gba̱ yi ta̱ a zuba gba̱ gba̱ , hal u neke yi kala ka ka lai gba̱ aꞌala .
50002010	Adama a nala , ya dem wa kuɗa̱ngu ta̱ u lyai kayala u pana baci kala ka Yesu . Gba̱ aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri a zuba n likimba a ka yan ta̱ nala .
50002011	Nala dem ko una̱ u eni wa wa dana ta̱ Yesu Kawauwi Asheku a ɗa , kpam nala wa na̱ka̱ ta̱ Kashila̱ Tata tsupige .
50002012	Aje a va̱ , aꞌayin a ɗa ma̱ri n a̱ɗa̱ , kain dem i tsu pana̱ka ta̱ Kashila̱ . Gogo‑na an u wokoi bawu ma̱ri kpam kaɓolo n a̱ɗa̱ , i pana̱ka yi hal gba̱m u lai caupa . Lyayi kelime n i yanyi manyan ma ma wenike an a wauwa ɗa̱ , kpam i yain nala n una̱ka̱ karinga̱ n upana u uwonvo .
50002013	Kashila̱ ka yan ta̱ manyan a asuvu a ɗe , wa zuwusa ɗa̱ ya ciga i pana̱ka yi , kpam wa na̱ka̱sa̱ ɗa̱ ucira u ɗa ya yan ili iꞌya wa pana kayanyan .
50002014	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci ya yan ili i roku , kotsu i yain kananamgbani ko tsali wa .
50002015	Ya yan baci nala wa , ko uza wa takpa ɗa̱ n ukuna u roku wa , ko kenu . U gan ta̱ i rongo uwulukpi , uma u ɗa bawu wa̱ri n unyushi tyoku u mmuku n Kashila̱ a asuvu a likimba u karimbi u ɗa u shaɗangi n ama a cingi kpam kain dem a tsu rongo a uyansa unyushi u cingi . A̱sa̱ka̱ uma u ɗe u laɗi tyoku u atala a kapala ka ama a na yi .
50002016	Shamgbai n ugbami a akani a uma , tsa̱ra̱ Kawauwi ka gono baci , n tsa̱ra̱ ucira u ɗa ma dana n kpa̱ɗa̱ ulya kalambale ki wa , kpam manyan ma va̱ ma woko ma gbani wa .
50002017	Upityanangu u ɗe a asu u Asheku , n tyoku ɗa ya gbashika yi , u woko ta̱ yavu uɗara̱kpa ubana ara ne . Wa woko ta̱ yavu a doku a wotsongu mpasa n va̱ a asuvu a uɗara̱kpa u ɗe vi . Nala baci , ma pana ta̱ kayanyan , kpam ma ɓolomgbono ta̱ kaci ka va̱ n a̱ɗa̱ tsu pana kayanyan .
50002018	Yanyi maza̱nga̱ adama a nala yi , kpam tsu panai kayanyan kaɓolo .
50002019	Yesu Asheku u wushuku baci , n yawunsa ta̱ n sukunku ɗa̱ Timoti gogo‑na na . Aꞌayin a ɗa baci u gonoi ara va̱ , ma pana ta̱ kayanyan n pana baci alabari a ɗe .
50002020	Ma̱ n uza tyoku u ne wa , u la ta̱ ya dem pini na upana iyali i ɗe .
50002021	Dana ɗa n danai nala kpaci ya dem pini na ukuna u kaci u ne u ɗa wa ciga u ɗa wa yawunsa , shegai a ka ciɓusa ukuna u ɗa Yesu Kawauwi wa ciga wa .
50002022	I reve ta̱ tyoku ɗa Timoti wenikei kaci u woko tyoku u maku n tata u ne . U ɓa̱nga̱ mu ta̱ a asu u uyan kuɓari ku Kadyanshi ka Shinga .
50002023	Aꞌayin a ɗa baci n tuwa̱i n revei ili iꞌya a ka yanka mu , ma tutsuku yi ta̱ ara ɗe .
50002024	N zuwa ta̱ uma Asheku a ka a̱sa̱ka̱ mu ta̱ n tuwa̱ ara ɗe na n aꞌayin kenu .
50002025	I suku ta̱ Abafuradita tsa̱ra̱ u yanka mu ili iꞌya ma ciga . Utoku u va̱ ɗa asuvu a Kawauwi , u yan ta̱ manyan kaɓolo na̱ mpa kpam tsu moɗonoi yavu asoje . Gogo‑na n wene ta̱ wa laka ta̱ tsulobo n a̱sa̱ka̱ yi u gono ara ɗe .
50002026	Kpam adama a ɗa u ma̱tsa̱i wa ciga u tuwa̱ ara ɗe ɗa . U dambula ta̱ cika kpaci i reve ta̱ an bawu wa̱ri n alafiya .
50002027	Mayun ɗa bawu wa̱ri n alafiya . Wa̱ri u yan ta̱ gba̱m evu n ukpa̱ , shegai Kashila̱ ka pana ta̱ iyali i ne u wauwai uma u ne . U ɓishinka mu dem kushen adama a unamgbukatsuma̱ .
50002028	Ili iꞌya i zuwai gai n lakai uciga n tutsunku ɗa̱ n eyi iꞌya gai la vi . I wene yi baci ya laka ta̱ upana kayanyan , kpam kadambula ka va̱ ka jebe ta̱ .
50002029	Ryabusa ni a asuvu a kala ka Asheku i yain maza̱nga̱ cika . U gan ta̱ i na̱ka̱ icun i ama a nala yi tsupige .
50002030	Yanka ni nala kpaci wa̱ri u yan ɗe evu n ukpa̱ adama a manyan ma Kawauwi . Tuwa̱ ɗa u tuwa̱i tsa̱ra̱ u shaɗangu uɓa̱nga̱ u ɗa bawu eɗa̱ ya fuɗa ya ɓa̱nga̱ mu .
50003001	Gogo‑na ama a va̱ , yanyi ipeli adama a Asheku . N pana ta̱ kayanyan an ma korongu ili iꞌya n tonuko ɗa̱ caupa vi . Ya doku ta̱ gba̱m ya kirana n a̱ɗa̱ .
50003002	Kotsu i a̱sa̱ka̱ ama a cingi a naha a yinsa̱ ɗa̱ wa . Alya aꞌa̱ri n uciga u ukiɗa u acombi kaberikete , aꞌa̱ ta̱ yavu nshe n ɗa ma̱ri n icaɗi .
50003003	A̱tsu tsa̱ ta̱ n ukiɗa u acombi u maci kpaci a asuvu a Kulu ku Kashila̱ ka tsa lyasa kayala . Tsupige tsu tsunu tsu tsu tuwa̱ ta̱ adama a Yesu Kawauwi kpam tsu tsu yan ara̱ɗi n ukuna u ikyamba wa .
50003004	Gaawan mpa ma fuɗa ta̱ ma yan ara̱ɗi n ukuna u ikyamba . Uza roku wene baci yavu wa̱ n ukuna u roku u ɗa wa fuɗa wa lya kaci ka ili i na yi , ma la yi ta̱ a ili i na yi gba̱ .
50003005	Mpa n aꞌayin kulla̱ an a matsa mu ɗa a kiɗa mu kacombi . Mpa uza u aza a Isaraꞌila u ɗa , uza u kagali ka Bayami . Nala wa wenike ta̱ an mpa uza u aza a Ibirahi u mayun u ɗa . Tsu yan baci ukuna u Mele , mpa Kafarishi ka .
50003006	Caupa mpa kayain ka manyan ka cika , n tuko ta̱ Atoni upana u ikyamba . Ko uza wa fuɗa wa dana ukuna u dana Mele ma n koɗoi ma na wa .
50003007	Caupa , n tsu yawunsa ta̱ yavu ukuna u na wa̱ ta̱ n kalen cika , shegai gogo‑na ukuna u gbani u ɗa ma wundya u ɗa adama a ili iꞌya Kawauwi ka yain .
50003008	Ili iꞌya gba̱ i lakai n kalen iꞌya , n tsu wene ta̱ ko ndya wa bawu kalen n gawuntangu baci iꞌya n ureve u Yesu Kawauwi . Ureve u Kawauwi Asheku u va̱ , u la ta̱ ko ndya wa kalen , kpam mayun ɗa . Adama a ne n wotsongu ɗe ko ndya wa i va̱ , shegai gba̱ yavu kaviri ka ma a̱sa̱ka̱ ka ma wundya iꞌya tsa̱ra̱ Kirisiti Kawauwi u woko u va̱ ,
50003009	kpam kain dem ma rongo ta̱ kaɓolo n eyi . Ma pityanangu kpam n ukuna u maci u kaci u va̱ wa , ko ucira u kaci u va̱ adama a upana̱ka Mele wa , shegai n Kawauwi ka ma pityanangu tsa̱ra̱ u wauwa mu . Yan ɗa ma yan nala kpaci ure u Kashila̱ u ɗa u tsu gonuko aza a maci n kaci ka ne wa̱ ta̱ a asu u upityanangu .
50003010	Ma ciga ta̱ n reve Kawauwi , ma ciga ta̱ kpam n reve ucira u ɗa u ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ yi a ukpa̱ . Ma ciga ta̱ n ɓolomgbono kaci n eyi , tsa̱ra̱ n reve upana u ikyamba u ne . Ma ciga ta̱ kpam n ɓolomgbono n eyi a asu u ukpa̱ u ne .
50003011	Adama a nala , ma̱ ta̱ n uzuwa u uma a ka ꞌya̱nga̱sa̱ mu ta̱ a ukpa̱ !
50003012	Kotsu n yan ili i na yi gba̱ wa , kpam kotsu n kotso uwoko ili iꞌya i gain n woko wa . Shegai n lya ta̱ kelime n manyan hal she ubana a makorishi ma a ka gonuko mu ili iꞌya Kawauwi ka ciga mu n woko .
50003013	Ama a va̱ , dana ɗa n danai n ka̱na̱ ɗe ili gba̱ wa , shegai ili iꞌya n yain iꞌya : n dambula kaci ka va̱ n ili iꞌya i wurai wa , n moɗono ta̱ n ka̱na̱ ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri a kapala .
50003014	N lya ta̱ kelime na̱ n yanyi manyan tsa̱ra̱ n rawa a makorishi ma a ka na̱ka̱ mu ili i shinga , aꞌayin a ɗa Kashila̱ ka isa̱ mu ubana a zuba adama a Yesu Kawauwi .
50003015	U gan ta̱ gba̱ aza ɗa aꞌa̱ri a asuvu a tsunu , aza ɗa a gbonguroi a asuvu a kulu a yawunsa tyoku u na . Kpam ili i roku iꞌa̱ baci pini iꞌya bawu i wushuki n iꞌya , Kashila̱ ka zuwa ɗa̱ ta̱ i wene ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri i mayun .
50003016	Ili iꞌya gba̱ i lakai kalen iꞌya , tsu lyai kelime n utono ili iꞌya tsu revei iꞌa̱ri i mayun .
50003017	Ama a va̱ , tonoi tyoku ɗa mpa ma rongo , kpam i rotsongusu a asu u uwundya ili iꞌya aza ɗa a ka rongo a asuvu a iryoci iꞌya tsu na̱ka̱ le .
50003018	Nala u gain i rongo , kpaci ama ɗa pini ushani aza ɗa a ka rongo tyoku ɗa a ka wenike ele atokulalu a mawandamgbani ma Kawauwi a ɗa . Ma̱ri n tonuko ɗa̱ ɗe ukuna u na vi , kpam hal n gogo‑na kushen ka ma̱ri n meshi kpaci ukuna u na vi mayun ɗa .
50003019	Ama a na yi a rawa baci a makorishi , a ka cina ta̱ kaci ka le a ukpa̱ u ɗa bawu wa̱ri n utyoku . Ili iꞌya a ka lyasa̱ka kayala iꞌya ili iꞌya a ka ciga̱ka ikyamba koshi . A tsu tsa̱ra̱ ta̱ tsupige a ili i uwono iꞌya a ka yansa . Gba̱ atakasuvu a le aꞌa̱ ta̱ a ili i likimba u na .
50003020	Shegai a̱tsu ama a zuba a ɗa , a asu u ɗa Yesu Kawauwi wa rongo . Kpam tsu ma̱tsa̱ ɗe uvana ugono u ne tyoku u Kawauwi ka tsunu .
50003021	Wa bidya ta̱ ikyamba i tsunu pini a likimba u na vi iꞌya bawu iꞌa̱ri n ucira , u gonuko iꞌya i woko ikyamba i tsupige tyoku u i ne . Wa yan ta̱ nala n ucira u ɗa u tsu zuwa ili dem i pana̱ka yi .
50004001	Ama a va̱ , ma ciga ɗa̱ wa wa , kpam ma ciga ta̱ n wene ɗa̱ . I zuwa mu ta̱ n pana kayanyan kpam eɗa funi ɗa a na̱ka̱ mu . Adama a nala , i shamgba n ucira a asuvu a utono u Asheku .
50004002	Utoku u va̱ , vu yan ta̱ manyan kaɓolo na̱ mpa mayun , kpam n folo vu ta̱ vu ɓa̱nga̱ aka a re a ɗa aꞌa̱ri pini kaɓolo n avu . N folo ta̱ Afodiya n Sinitiki , aka a re a na yi a doku a panamgbana adama a Asheku . Caupa , a yan ta̱ manyan cika kaɓolo na̱ mpa tsa̱ra̱ tsu tonuko aza roku ukuna u Kadyanshi ka Shinga . A yan ta̱ kpam manyan n Kileme n atoku a manyan a va̱ a roku . Kashila̱ ka korongu ta̱ aꞌala a ama a na yi a Tagara̱da u Aza a Uma . Utoku u va̱ , vu yan ta̱ manyan kaɓolo na̱ mpa mayun , kpam n folo vu ta̱ vu ɓa̱nga̱ aka a re a ɗa aꞌa̱ri pini kaɓolo n avu . N folo ta̱ Afodiya n Sinitiki , aka a re a na yi a doku a panamgbana adama a Asheku . Caupa , a yan ta̱ manyan cika kaɓolo na̱ mpa tsa̱ra̱ tsu tonuko aza roku ukuna u Kadyanshi ka Shinga . A yan ta̱ kpam manyan n Kileme n atoku a manyan a va̱ a roku . Kashila̱ ka korongu ta̱ aꞌala a ama a na yi a Tagara̱da u Aza a Uma .
50004003	
50004004	Yanyi maza̱nga̱ kain dem adama a Asheku . A̱sa̱ka̱i gai n doku n dana , yanyi maza̱nga̱ !
50004005	I yain ben n atoku a ɗe . I ciɓa an utuwa̱ u Asheku wa̱ri evu .
50004006	Kotsu i dambula adama a ili i roku wa , shegai i yain kavasu i foli uɓa̱nga̱ a kaci ka ili dem . Tonukoi Kashila̱ gba̱ ili iꞌya bawu iꞌa̱ri n iꞌya , i na̱ka̱ yi ucikpa .
50004007	I yan baci nala , i reve ta̱ an Kashila̱ ka fuɗa ka zuwa atakasuvu a ɗe a rongo yuwu . Ili iꞌya i lai tsulobo iꞌya la vi cika , i lai kpam ili iꞌya katakasuvu ka uza ka reve . Pini nala , Kashila̱ ka kirana ta̱ n atakasuvu n uyawunsa u ɗe kpam i rongo n Kawauwi .
50004008	Ama a va̱ , a̱sa̱ka̱ n koruso n kadyanshi ka na : I zuwa atakasuvu a ɗe a asu u ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri i mayun , n tsupige n i maci . I yawunsa a kaci ka ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri uwulukpi n i uciga kpam n iꞌya iꞌa̱ri dere . I yawunsa a kaci ka ili iꞌya iꞌa̱ri i shinga cika iꞌya i rawai a cikpala .
50004009	Ka̱na̱i uyansa ili iꞌya i rotsongusi ara va̱ , i ka̱na̱ kpam uyansa ili iꞌya i panai n dansai . I ka̱na̱ uyansa ili iꞌya i wenei n yansai . Uyansa nala wa zuwa ta̱ Kashila̱ ka ndishi n shinga ka rongo n a̱ɗa̱ .
50004010	Caupa i kirana ta̱ na̱ mpa mai , ko an u wokoi aꞌayin a roku a ɗa pini a ɗa iꞌa̱ri ya ciga i yanka mu nala , shegai i tsa̱ kabala ka ya ɓa̱nga̱ mu wa . Gogo‑na n pana ta̱ kayanyan n Asheku kpaci i gono ɗe ya kirana na̱ mpa .
50004011	Dana ɗa n danai ili i na yi adama a ɗa n nambai ili wa , n rotsongusu ta̱ n kawunku n ili iꞌya ma̱ri n iꞌya .
50004012	N reve ta̱ tyoku ɗa u tsu woko uza u namba baci ili , n reve ta̱ kpam tyoku ɗa u tsu woko uza u tsa̱ra̱ baci ili ushani . N reve ta̱ tyoku ɗa uza wa rongo n upana kayanyan kain dem . N reve ta̱ tyoku ɗa uza wa rongo n upana kayanyan wa̱ baci n ilikulya , n tyoku ɗa wa rongo n maza̱nga̱ wa̱ baci n kambulu . N reve ta̱ tyoku ɗa uza wa rongo n upana kayanyan wa̱ baci n ili ushani , n tyoku ɗa wa rongo wa̱ baci bawu ili .
50004013	Ma fuɗa ta̱ ma yan ko ndya wa adama a ucira u ɗa Yesu Kawauwi u na̱ka̱ mu .
50004014	Shegai gba̱ n nala , i dara̱ka ta̱ an i wenike mu uciga u ɗe a asuvu a aꞌayin a upana u ikyamba u va̱ a na vi .
50004015	Kpam eɗa̱ aza a Filibi yi i reve ɗe an eɗa koshi i na̱ka̱i ikebe tsa̱ra̱ i ɓa̱nga̱ mu aꞌayin a ɗa n tuko ɗa̱ Kadyanshi ka Shinga kpam dem an n a̱sa̱ka̱i Masidaniya . Atoni a roku aꞌa̱ la aza ɗa a yain nala wa .
50004016	Ko aꞌayin a ɗa ma̱ri a Tasaloniya , i na̱ka̱ ta̱ ikebe kuten gba̱m wa .
50004017	Dana ɗa n danai nala an ma ciga kune ku roku wa , shegai ili iꞌya ma ciga iꞌya , ya wusha ta̱ katsupi ka malen ma manyan ma ɗe kpaci i wenike mu ta̱ upana u iyali u ɗe .
50004018	Gogo‑na naha , ma̱ ta̱ n gba̱ ili iꞌya ma ciga . I la ta̱ gba̱m iꞌya ma ciga . I suku ta̱ kune cika a akere a Abafuradita , kpam n wusha ta̱ ka . Kune ka ku shinga ku magula̱ni , kpam Kashila̱ ka wusha ta̱ uɗara̱kpa vi , u pana ta̱ kpam kayanyan .
50004019	Kashila̱ ka va̱ , uza ɗa wa kirana na̱ mpa , wa na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ta̱ gba̱ ili iꞌya ya ciga n utsa̱ri u ne . Utsa̱ri u ne u ɗa ili iꞌya u na̱ka̱ tsu a akere a Yesu Kawauwi .
50004020	Adama a nala gba̱ , na̱ka̱i Kashila̱ Tata u tsunu tsupige hal ubana bawu utyoku . Ami .
50004021	Dana̱sai gba̱ Atoni a ɗa aꞌa̱ri a Filibi . Atoku a ɗa aꞌa̱ri pini na kaɓolo na̱ mpa a ka suku ta̱ idyani i le .
50004022	Gba̱ Atoni a ɗa a buwai a ka sukunku ɗa̱ ta̱ dem idyani . Atoni a ɗa aꞌa̱ri a kuwa ku tsugono ku Kaisa a ka sukunku ɗa̱ ta̱ idyani mai mai .
50004023	A̱sa̱ka̱ ukuna u shinga u Yesu Kawauwi Asheku u rongo n atakasuvu a ɗe .
51001001	Mpa Bulus , Kashila̱ ka ka cigai ka ɗanga̱sa mu n woko kasuki ka Yesu Kirisiti Kawauwi . Timoti wa̱ ta̱ pini na kaɓolo na̱ mpa , eyi utoku u tsunu u ɗa .
51001002	Atoni a ɗa aꞌa̱ri a Kolosi a ɗa ma koronku . Atoku a tsunu a ɗa kpam a ka tono ta̱ Kawauwi mai . A̱sa̱ka̱ Kashila̱ Tata u tsunu u na̱ka̱ ɗa̱ ukuna u shinga na̱ ndishi n shinga .
51001003	Tsu tsu yansa̱ka ɗa̱ ta̱ kavasu maco , kpam tsu na̱ka̱ Kashila̱ Tata u Asheku a tsunu Yesu Kawauwi ucikpa .
51001004	Ili iꞌya i zuwai tani iꞌya tsu pana ta̱ a da i pityanangu ta̱ n Yesu Kawauwi kpam tsu pana ta̱ a da ya ciga ta̱ ama a Kashila̱ gba̱ .
